loans.name: Allaha Rakhi

texts.en:
Allaha Rakhi is a 45-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.  She is spending her life with her husband, two sons and a daughter.

Her husband is a very hard-working and honest person; he owns a small restaurant in which he offers types of delicious foods. Allaha Rakhi cooks some dishes for the restaurant, and people like to eat from the restaurant of her husband. He has been running his restaurant for many years and this is the reason most of the chairs, utensils and crockery have broken. He wants to buy new plastic furniture, utensils and crockery but his major income has to be spent for household expenses. 

Therefore, Allaha Rakhi has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy plastic furniture, utensils and crockery. Allaha Rakhi thanks Kiva and appreciates the warm support she has received.

loans.use: To buy crockery, utensils and food items for restaurant business.

loans.name: Dúo El Rosario De Buena Vista Group

texts.es: La encargada de este grupo es la señora Rosario quien se dedica a la fabricación y venta de zapatos para niños y adultos, y zapatillas para damas.  Cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo quien la ayuda los fines de semana a cortar, coser y pegar los zapatos. ella tiene varios pedidos pero le hace falta plantillas para la fabricación de los zapatos y debe compararlos, pero el dinero no le alcanza por eso necesita hacer un préstamo para comprar las plantillas que le hacen falta ya que no son muchas.  Su sueño es tener una gran fábrica de zapatos y darles trabajo a muchas personas que la necesiten, esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: The leader of this group is Rosario who is involved in the making and selling of shoes for children and adults and slippers for ladies. She has the unconditional support of her husband who helps her on weekends in cutting, sewing, and glueing the shoes. She has many orders but lacks templates to compare the shoes. She does not have enough money, so she needs a loan to buy the templates. Her dream is to have a shoe factory and give work to many people in need. She hopes that you can help with her requested credit.

loans.use: to buy templates for making shoes

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Rattha

texts.en: Rattha is 53 years old, a widow with one son, at Kampong Chhnang Province. She has been a retailer at home since 2009 and her son has been a construction laborer since 2012. They can earn $10 per day. Now she would like to ask for loan of $1,000 to buy more products for her small business. This loan is helpful for her to attract more customers and to make more income to feed her family.

loans.use: To buy more products for her small business

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 45-year-old man from Usenge, married to Jael, who is a domestic farmer in the same county. They have four children, aged 17, 16, 13, and nine years old.

Joseph operates a phone accessories shop, a business he has done for the last five years, earning an income of KES 24,000 per month. He is taking his second loan, in the amount of KES 45,000, with VisionFund Kenya, to purchase more phone accessories.

The income thereafter will be used to repay his loan. Joseph's dream is to open a bigger shop, with digital equipment.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of phone accessories, like chargers, housings, and batteries.

loans.name: Shakeela

texts.en:
Shakeela is a 26-year-old lady, living with her spouse and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother; her younger son goes to school in morning and for tutoring in the evening every day. 

Her husband drives an auto rickshaw, and he wants to grow his income so he can easily supply the basic needs of his family. So he decided to buy an additional rickshaw to rent out for a daily fare. He has much in savings but some amount is short still now; this is the reason Shakeela requested a loan.
 
She requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so her husband can be able to buy the new auto rickshaw. 

Shakeela hopes that she will be able to put aside enough in savings by the time of the marriages of her children. She thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy an additional auto rickshaw for transportation services.

loans.name: Len

texts.en: Len is 32 years old, a married woman with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province. To earn a living, she works at a garment factory and her husband works as a construction laborer and motor-taxi driver. Both of them can earn $6 per day. Now Len would like to ask for a loan of $800 to buy farmland in order to increase her harvest and to make her family’s standard of living better.

loans.use: To buy farmland to do farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a resident of Kakiika in Mbarara District with four children, all in school. He started a brick-making factory some 10 years back, but could not yield anything because of lack of capital to buy advanced machines to use. That is when he got to know about Ugafode microfinance and acquired a loan of UGX.1,000,000 which helped him get one machine. Because of Robert’s hard work, he continued expanding and increasing his income. Now he is requesting a loan of UGX 2,000,000 to finish his house so that his family can live modestly.

loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila is the age of 41 and is living with her four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a mechanic by profession. He repairs and renews the punctured tyres of vehicles. He has been doing this business for many years. He provides the services nearby to the road. 

He wants to offer new tyres and tubes as well, but he does not have enough cash in hand to make the purchase. Most of his customers demand a new tyre, but he has to refuse them. 

Therefore, Jamila requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband would be able to buy new tyres, tubes and unreinforced inner tube repair patches.

Jamila thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy tyres, tubes and raw materials to fix punctures.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр ведет свой бизнес в с.Нововодяное. Уже 16 лет он выращивает огурцы, сначала с мамой, теперь со своей семьей. Этот овощ лучше всего получается выращивать, но это растение очень теплолюбивое. Александр знает от знакомых, что с отоплением можно получать гораздо большую прибыль, поэтому хочет чтобы и  его теплицы  отапливались. Также у Александра две теплицы низкие и растения плохо проветриваются и болеют, поэтому нужно их переделать и сделать выше. 

Для того чтобы всё это осуществить нужны большие вложения, поэтому он решил обратиться за кредитом.
Полученный кредит поможет Александру вырастить более ранний урожай и обеспечить достаток в его семье.
У Александра двое маленьких детей и он как заботливый отец хочет дать им все необходимое.

Примечание: на фото Александр с одним из своих сыновей.
texts.en:
Alexander has a business in S.Novovodyanoe. For 16 years, he has been growing cucumbers, first with his mother, and now with his family. This vegetable is grows best, but it loves warm weather. Alexander knows from friends that heating can bring a larger profit. Therefore, he wants to heat his greenhouses. Furthermore, his two greenhouses are low ant plants are poorly ventilated and sickly.  Thus, he needs to remodel them and make them higher. In order to do this, he needs a large investment, so he has decided to apply for a loan. This loan will help Alexander grow an earlier harvest and ensure prosperity for his family.  Alexander has two small children and, being a caring father, he wants to give them everything they need.

Note: Alexander pictured with one of his sons.

loans.use: to remodel green houses, install heating, and make them higher

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María de 49 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Es originaria del Sauce lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos y familiares. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad lucha día a día  para brindarles a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida, y cumplir su mayor sueño como es ver formado a su hijo en un profesional.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica un pequeno comedor y venta de comida casera en su casa de habitacion como pollo asada,carne asada, manuelita carne desmenusada,   Ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El  objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. María agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
María is 49 years old, married and with two children under her care. She is from El Sauce, a place located in the north part of the country. She characterizes for being a hardworking person, responsible and with a desire of personal improvement. In her free time she enjoys of the company of her children and relatives. Unfortunately, because of the lack of economic resources she wasn’t able to study a professional career and she was forced to work at an early age to help with the household expenditures. Nowadays she makes her best to give her children a better quality of life, and to reach her biggest dream that is to see her older son become a professional. 

Thanks to her effort and her willingness to succeed she has a small business right at her house selling homemade food like roasted chicken, grilled meat, shredded meat, fried meat, beans, tacos and fried cheese. She spends 12 hours every day in her business selling her products. The reason of the loan is to invest in working capital and to supply her business for the sale and purchase of food products, so in a not too distant future she can obtain greater profits. María is thankful for the help that Kiva investors give to people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have a decent work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make the food she sells like roasted chicken, grilled meat, shredded meat, fried meat, beans, tacos and fried cheese

loans.name: Norbegim

texts.en: Norbegim is 51-years-old. Her husband died seven years ago. Norbegim is a careful mother of nine children. Norbegim works hard to provide her nine children with all necessary things. She has worked in a hospital as a cleaning woman for more than 32 years. Norbegim has a small salary and that’s why she lives poor. She does not have enough money to organize the wedding party of her son. Her son wants to be married but he does not have the opportunity to organize his wedding party. Norbegim is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni to organize a wedding party. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To organize her son's wedding party

loans.name: Blanca Vanessa

texts.es: Blanca Vanessa de 35 años de edad, estableció una pequeña pulpería en su casa para vivir de las ganancias junto a su familia y mantener a sus tres hijos siendo el mayor de quince años, todos estudiantes de primaria y secundaria, Blanca Vanessa cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposo quien es maestro de obra de manera independiente. Este es su primer crédito que solicita	para la instalación de servicio higiénico y tuberías, gracias al financiamiento podrá comprar los materiales para realizar la obra y mejorar las condiciones en su hogar.
texts.en:
Blanca Vanessa is 35 years old. She opened a small grocery store at home in order to support her family with the profits. She has three children. The eldest one is 15 years old; they all go to school. Her husband is an independent general contractor and helps her with the expenses.

This is her first loan. She wants to install a toilet and the piping system. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to buy the materials she needs to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a toilet, pipes, bricks, cement, sand and iron bars.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael, tiene la edad de 50 años, está casado y vive con su esposa y tres hijos actualmente. El quiere  el crédito para la compra de  algunos insumos y un poco de almacigo. El cuenta con el terreno y lo que quiere es resembrar las zonas más dañadas para así aumentar la cosecha próxima y crecer como un caficultor de la zona. El pretende con estas mejoras generar mayor producción de café y así también le genere ganancias para seguir adelante con su proyecto y mejorar su bienestar Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rafael, 50, is married and lives with his wife and three children. He is requesting the loan to buy some supplies and a few seedlings. He already has the land and wants to replant the most damaged areas to increase the next harvest and grow as a coffee farmer in the area. 

With these improvements, he aims to generate a higher production of coffee and also earn income to continue forward with his project and improve his wellbeing. 

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has never before had a loan from state banks but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and a fumigation sprayer

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz Mary es una mujer soñadora y enamorada  de la vida, tiene un hermoso hijo llamado Samuel y junto al  amado esposo David luchan día tras día para darle lo mejor, luz es feliz ciertamente y está muy agradecida con cada una de las cosas que le ha dado el creador.
Sin embargo, ella siente que hay algo que le hace falta para continuar adelante con cada una de las  metas  y proyectos que tiene en mente,  siempre le ha atraído la estética, no solo porque es una profesión muy bonita sino porque ella siente que a través de esta puede ayudar a muchas personas a sentirse mejor consigo mismas, así que decide presentarse a campo alto desea tener la oportunidad de ingresar a estudiar para así cumplir con esa visión y esas expectativa de vida que tiene.							 					
También siente que al lograrlo el hijo se sentiría orgulloso de ella y así el vería un verdadero ejemplo de superación personal en la mama, como es una estudiante nueva, ella le parece bueno el convenio que tiene la institución con kiva, ya que le permite tener la facilidad de pago y con el valor de las cuotas , mensuales más económicas.
texts.en: Luz Mary is a dreamer and a woman in love with life.  She has a beautiful son named Samuel, and she and her beloved husband David work very hard day after day to provide the best for him.  Luz is certainly happy and is thankful for every single thing the creator has given her.  However, she feels that something is missing which she needs to move forward with all the goals and projects she has in mind.  She has always been interested in cosmetology, not just because it is a nice profession but because she feels that it would allow her to help lots of people feel better about themselves.  So she decided to go to CampoAlto.  She wants to have the opportunity to enroll in school there to fulfill her vision and her aspirations for her life.  She also feels that this achievement would make her son feel proud of her and show him a real example of personal self-improvement in his mom.  As a new student, she thinks the agreement the institution has with Kiva is good because it allows her to have a payment plan and the monthly payments are more affordable.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester

loans.name: Sok Keng

texts.en:
Sok Keng is 21 years old and is now the mother of a little child.  To overcome the hardships and resolve financial difficulty, Sok Keng has been engaged in a farming business to supplement her husband's income.  She owns and manages two hectares of land for cultivating rice, which is the main source of her income.  Due to a good location of business, Sok Keng can deal with her farming chores two times a year and is able to earn a good income for her family.  She has been farming for more than five years now.

To help her improve sanitation practices, she would like to acquire a loan to build a hygienic latrine for her family.  Her HKL credit agent encouraged Sok Keng to think of sanitation and take advantage of a water loan program, which is offered with a low interest rate.  She is very thankful to all Kiva lenders who have donated via the program to enable poor families to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her family.

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Этого предприимчивого молодого человека зовут Далер. Он родом из района Вахш, ему 28 лет. Далер женат и уже имеет одного ребенка. Он с женой и маленьким сыночком живет в одном доме с родителями и и братом. Жена Далера дома занимается шитьем. Сам Далер работает в сельском хозяйстве. Он на своем земельном участке выращивает пшеницу и люцерну. Сейчас он хочет увеличить семейный бюджет и благополучие семьи. Поэтому Далер параллельно с растениеводством планирует начать животноводство. У Далера проблем с кормом для скотов не будет. Он уже запасся люцерной, собранной со своих земель и высушенной им самим. К тому же у него при дворе есть старый сарай, который он будет использовать в качестве коровника. Чтобы купить 5 голов бычков Далеру не хватает его собственных сбережений и он решил обратиться за кредитом. Далеру очень нужен данный кредит. Он надеется на Вашу отзывчивость.
texts.en: This enterprising young man is named Daler. He is from the Vaksh region and is 28 years old. Daler is married and already has one child. He, his wife and his little son live in the same house with his parents and brother. Daler's wife is a seamstress who works from home. Daler himself works in agriculture. He grows wheat and alfalfa on his plot of land. Now, he wants to increase the family income and improve his family's well-being. Therefore, Daler plans to start raising livestock in addition to farming. Daler will not have problems feeding the livestock. He has already stocked alfalfa collected from his land and dried it himself. Moreover, he has an old barn in his yard which he will use as a cowshed. Daler does not have enough money to purchase 5 heads of cattle, so h decided to apply for a loan. Daler really needs this loan. He hopes for your response.

loans.use: To purchase 5 heads of cattle in order to start a livestock business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Melissa Alejandra

texts.es:
La señora  Ana de  43  años de edad casada, tiene 1 hijo que depende de ella, vive en una comunidad de  San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia.
Doña Ana hace unos 03 años que cambio de rubro de negocio y hoy se dedica a la venta de golosinas, frescos y comida, útiles escolares  sus clientes le prefieren por su atención y buen trato, es una mujer muy emprendedora  que lucha día con día por tener una mejor vida.
Doña Ana  está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de frescos, cebolla, chile verde, harina, frijoles, mantequilla, manteca y también útiles escolares para así tener más mercadería para atender a sus clientes  que son lo que ella necesita para atender mejor a sus clientes.
Doña Ana  ya se acerca la época escolar y tiene bastante demanda de útiles está muy contenta de que  Prisma le dé la oportunidad de hacer su trámite de crédito y  surtir su negocio su deseo es tener su negocio más grande y que su hijo estudie en la universidad. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Enero del 2014
texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old. She is married and has one son who depends on her. She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, a valley in southern Honduras. She has her own house.  

Three years ago, Ana changed her type of business and now she sells snacks, juices, food, and school supplies. Her customers prefer her because of her service and good treatment. She is a very enterprising woman who fights day to day to have a better life.

Ana is asking for the loan to buy juices, onion, green chiles, flour, beans, butter, lard, and school supplies so that she can have more merchandise to serve her customers. These are what she needs to better serve her customers. 

The school year is approaching and Ana has a lot of demand for school supplies. She is very happy that Prisma is giving her the opportunity to take out a loan and stock her business. She wants to have a bigger business and for her son to go to college.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January, 2014

loans.use: to buy juices, onions, green chiles, flour, beans, butter, and lard for her business.

loans.name: Thary

texts.en:
Thary is a married woman who has three children.  She is 35 years old and she is a factory laborer.  Her husband is a baker.  Together, they earn only $6 per day

At this time, she would like to request a loan of $1,000 to buy and raise a cow.  Once the cow gives birth, she will sell it and generate more income to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy and raise a cow for resale.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah, 34 years old, is from Nyahururu. She is single and blessed with two children who are five and one year old.

She has been running her business selling clothes for a period of five years. To enable her to buy more stocks of clothes to sell to her customers, she has applied for her fourth loan of KES 27,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

Her monthly income right now is KES 10,000 and her intention is to use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to educate her children, expand her business further and pay back her loan to VisionFund Kenya

In the future, Monicah hopes to open a boutique shop in her area

loans.use: To buy more stocks of clothes to sell

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea is a married woman who has three children.  She is 45 years old and she is a cattlewoman.  Her husband is a motor-taxi driver.  Together, they can earn around $3 per day. 

She would like to apply for a loan of $1,500 to buy and feed cows.  Then she can sell the cows and generate more income to improve her family’s standard of living.  In the future, she would like to run a small business, to build a wooden house and to provide an opportunity for her children to ear bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to buy  cows, to feed them until they multiply and to sell them to make a profit.

loans.name: Nuriddin

texts.ru: Нуриддин живет с женой и сыном на районе Руми. Ему 42 года. Его жене 41 год. Ее зовут Гулсара. Гулсара умеет шить, и она решила воспользоваться свои талантом и брать заказы на шитье национальной одежды. Ее муж Нуриддин полностью ее поддерживает и помогает. Нуриддин решил купить своей жене швейную машинку. Но у него не хватает средств, чтобы совершить покупку, по этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Он надеется, что ему помогут, и он сделает жене подарок.
texts.en: Nuriddin lives with his wife and son in the Rumi region. He is 42 years old. His wife is 41 years old. Her name is Gulsara. Gulsara knows how to sew, and she decided to use her talent to take orders for sewing ethnic clothes. Her husband Nuriddin fully supports her and helps her. Nuriddin has decided to buy his wife a sewing machine. However, he does not have enough money to make the purchase, so he has applied for a loan. He hopes that people will help him, and he will be able to buy a gift for his wife.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for his wife

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, and noodles.

loans.name: Yoeun

texts.en: Yoeun, 41 years old, is a widowed man from Kampong Chhnang Province. He has been a construction laborer since 2006. He can earn $5 per day. He lives with his mother and two siblings. He would like to ask for a loan of $1,300 to buy cows to raise and to multiply. Through this loan, his family’s living conditions will be much better.

loans.use: To buy cows to breed

loans.name: Zilpah

texts.en:
Zilpah is 50 years old and married. She has three children who are 18, 16 and 13 years old. She owns a retail shop where she sells assorted foodstuffs and other items like soap and washing detergents. She has been in the business for a period of four years earning an income of KES 10,000.

She is now servicing her fourth loan of KES 75,000 with VisionFund Kenya. She intends to purchase stock of sugar, tea leaves and bread in bulk to sell.

The profit she earns will be used to improve the living standards of her family. Her dream is to ensure her business expands.

loans.use: To purchase stock of sugar, tea leaves and bread for sale.

loans.name: Sam Bath

texts.en:
Sam Bath is a 48-year-old married woman and the mother of four children, who are living with her and her husband in Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham, Cambodia. Like other villagers, Sam Bath and her husband are engaged in farming, which is a traditional family business and a major source of their income. Together they are able to earn well to support their family’s needs.

With the loan amount Sam Bath has requested from HKL (Hattha Kaksekar Limited), she aims to buy a water pump for balancing the water at her rice paddy and to buy fertilizers for her crops. This way she can continue working her farming business and gradually develop it. In the future, she wants to buy additional plots of land for farming and renovate her home to ensure a comfortable living for her family.

loans.use: to buy a water pump for balancing the water at her rice paddy and to buy fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Oy

texts.en:
Originally from a remote area of Kampong Cham province, Oy is 71 of age and an experienced farmer who has devoted her life to a farming business. Being a widow, she currently lives with her two unmarried children while the other one has started a new family and lives separately. Oy owns a few pieces of land, on which she primarily grows and harvests rice to sell. From her current business, she can earn a decent income to help support her daily needs.

In order to help her further develop her farming business, she is asking for a loan in the amount of USD500 to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance of the rice fields. She can also use this machine to work for local farmers for additional income. She hopes this loan will be approved and granted to her so that she can manage her business in a sustainable way.

loans.use: to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance of the rice fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale.

loans.name: Ivon Paola

texts.es:
Su nombre es Ivón Paola es una niña de estrato dos, menor de siete hermanos con 17 años, tiene muchos sueños y aspiraciones, acaba de graduarse de bachiller  y el mayor deseo es estudiar y poder ser profesional. 
Se Inscribió a Campo Alto el presente año en el programa Cosmetología y Estética Integral, ella  no cuenta con los recursos económicos  para entrar a una universidad, pues proviene de una familia humilde. Vive en una casa arrendada con la mamá y una sobrina de cuatro años,  la madre es empleada y es cabeza de hogar con 51 años.
Se inclinó a esta carrera por el  gran gusto por la belleza, por la buena apariencia corporal y facial, por esta razón decidió entrar a Campo Alto con grandes aptitudes y actitudes de poder estudiar y sacar adelante  la carrera. Para ella es muy importante este convenio Kiva ya que como la Madre es cabeza de hogar es una gran ayuda para poder culminar los estudios.
La mayor aspiración de Ivón Paola es estudiar, capacitarse y ejercer profesionalmente, para poder tener el SPA propio y así tener la accesibilidad de ayudar a mucha gente con trabajo y capacitaciones de esta misma profesión. Con un buen SPA y buena estabilidad económica ella podrá ayudar a muchas personas que tengan el sueño de salir adelante, de poder estudiar y trabajar, como la chica ivon lo está haciendo, poniendo todo el empeño para poder lograr las metas.  
Es por esto que ella se encuentra muy satisfecha de poder entrar a Campo Alto e iniciar los estudios  con el gran apoyo y ayuda del convenio Kiva, con  todos los esfuerzos y anhelos ella va poder salir adelante y poder ayudar a la familia a surgir, salir adelante y poder tener una estabilidad económica trabajando y produciendo como una gran empresaria de la Cosmetología y Estética.
texts.en:
Her name is Ivón Paola. She is a girl from stratus two. She is the youngest of seven siblings and she is 17 years' old. She has a lot of dreams and aspirations. She just graduated from high school and her biggest wish is to study and graduate from college.  
 
She registered in Campo Alto this year in the Integral Cosmetology and Aesthetics program. She doesn't have the financial resources to go to college, because she comes from a humble family. She lives in a rented house with her mother and a four year old niece. Her mother is a maid and the head of household. She is is 51 years old. 

She went into this major because she has great interest in beauty and in good facial and body appearance. That is why she decided to enter Campo Alto with her great aptitude and attitude to get ahead and get ahead in her major. For her this agreement with Kiva is very important, because since her mother is a head of house hold, it is a very big help for her to finish her education.   

Ivón Paola's biggest aspiration is to study, train and practice her profession to be able to have her own spa and help a lot of people with working and training in the same profession. With a good spa and financial stability she will be able to help a lot of people who dream of getting ahead, studying and working, like she has been doing, putting all of her effort into meeting her goals.
  
That is why she is very satisfied to be able to go to Campo Alto and start her education with the great help and support of the Kiva agreement and all of the effort and wishes she has to get ahead and help her family rise, get ahead and be able to have financial stability, working and producing as a great businesswoman in Cosmetology Aesthetics.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's enrollment.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a resident of Kakoba division in Mbarara District. She started banana farming some five years back, but could not yield anything because of lack of capital. 

That is when she got to know about UGAFODE Microfinance and acquired a loan of 1,000,000, which helped her business grow. Because of Agnes’ hard work, she continued expanding. 

Now she is requesting another loan of UGX 2,000,000 to complete the construction of her residential house. She will buy paint, lime and cement to complete the process. Her family will be able to get decent accommodations with the loan.

loans.use: to complete construction of her residential house.

loans.name: Tiburcio

texts.es:
Tiburcio de 74 años de edad,  nunca fue a la escuela, aprendió a firmar gracias a talleres de alfabetización que se han llevado a cabo en las comunidades,  sus hijos son mayores de edad. él es agricultor y vive solo con su compañera de vida. Tiene dos hijos en el exterior los cuales le ayudan económicamente,  para el sustento de su hogar todo el tiempo se ha dedicado a la agricultura y tiene que levantarse temprano para comenzar la labor.

El necesita el dinero para la recolección de la cosecha y para pagar el alquiler de la tierra, le ayudara a no vender  la cosecha en temporada ya que se la pagan a muy bajo costo.

Él sueña con tener a sus hijos cerca de él y compartir con ellos los últimos años de su vida, se siente muy feliz de contar con sus hijos y  agradece a Dios por habérselos dado.
texts.en:
Tiburcio is 74 years old. He never went to school and learned how to sign his name thanks to literacy workshops help in the communities. His children are adults. He is a farmer and lives alone with his life's companion. Two of his children are abroad and they help him financially to support the home. He has always worked in agriculture and he has to get up early to start his work.

He needs the money to reap the harvest and to pay for the rental of the land. It will help him to not sell the harvest in season because they pay a very low price. 

He dreams of having his children close by and sharing the last years of his life with them. He is very happy to have his children and thankful that God gave them to him.

loans.use: to reap the harvest and to pay for the rental of the land.

loans.name: Moeurn

texts.en:
Moeurn is a resident from a peaceful village in the Santuk district, Kampong Thom province. She is 40 years of age and married with four children. To help share the costs of living, Moeurn plants and harvests rice on a few pieces of land to use for food and to sell. She has been engaged in this occupation for over 20 years and earns approximately USD 2.5 per day.

Now she is taking out a loan from a reliable institution known as Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL) to build a safe latrine for the household. Through this loan, she will be able to buy construction materials and pay for the labor costs. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by HKL, Moeurn is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to buy materials and pay labor costs to build a safe latrine for the household.

loans.name: Phebe

texts.en:
Phoebe is a 45 years old and she lives in the Kisumu region in the western part of Kenya.  She is a married mother of two children who are 24 and 16 years old.

Phoebe runs a beauty salon, a business she has owned for the last six years.  She generates a monthly income of KES 30,000.

Phoebe has applied for her third loan from Vision Fund Kenya, which she will use to purchase more products for resale. 

Pheobe will use the anticipated profit to plow back into her business.  Her dream is to have a stable business so she can support her family.

loans.use: to buy  hair piece and other assorted cosmetics.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
For the last three years John has been selling scrap metal in Nakuru.  He makes a monthly income of KES. 8,000.

He has applied for his first loan of KES. 11,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a welding machine and scrap metal.

With the increased profits anticipated from his business, John will repay his loan back to VisionFund Kenya, educate his child and expand his business.

John is 30 years old, married and blessed with a three year old child.  In the future, he hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine and scrap metal.

loans.name: Khusrav

texts.en:
Khusrav was born in 1994.  He is single and lives happily with his parents, sister and brother. 

He is a history and law student at Tajikistan State University.  He tries to be the best students.  Khusrav reads many books. 

Khusrav is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition, because he has no money.  He awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is 52 years old, married and has two children. His elder son is attending 10th grade, his younger son is attending ninth grade. Ali’s wife is a housewife. They are living in the Boyuk Bahmanli village in Fuzuli region, which is near the war zone. But Ali’s family is an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city. Twenty-one years ago, their motherland, Fuzuli city, was occupied by Armenians and since then, they have been living in the Fuzuli region. Ali has been in the animal breeding business for long years. Today, he needs a loan of 1,900 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy hay, straw, etc. Ali gives great thanks to the Kiva organization and the lenders for help.

loans.use: to buy hay, straw, etc

loans.name: Sreyleang

texts.en:
Sreyleang lives in the village of Bakan district, Pursat, Cambodia. She is 39 years old, married and has four children. All of the children are out of school because of the family’s financial constraints, and they help Sreyleang with her farming chores. Sreyleang is eager to send them back to school again one day. Her main source of income is from farming activities. With her little income, Sreyleang is able to provide decent food for her children.

Sreyleang has gained access to this financial service in order to help improve her family’s water and sanitation as she has heard about HKL's water loan program, which offers with a special interest rate. She will use her loan to build a safe latrine for her family, especially for the sake of her children, who need it for their privacy.

loans.use: to build a safe latrine for her family.

loans.name: Kiomy Candy

texts.es: Kiomy  tiene 18 años, es estudiante en una Universidad local.Kiomy estudia la carrera de Administración Turismo y hotelería profesión que le interesa mucho porque desea ser parte del desarrollo turístico del país, este es su segundo año de estudios, aun le faltan 03 años y se siente muy entusiasmada, semanalmente se dedica a sus estudios aproximadamente 10 horas, en el futuro le gustaría trabajar en una agencia de viajes o en algún hotel de prestigio, para Kiomy la parte económica siempre ha sido un obstáculo para continuar con sus estudios; por eso esta agradecida a los inversionista de KIVA por este segundo préstamo  que le permite seguir estudiando,con el dinero podrá  pagar las mensualidades de un ciclo en la universidad y podrá cumplir sus objetivos.
texts.en: Kiomy is 18 years old.  She is a student at a local university.  Kiomy is studying tourism administration and hospitality.  This profession interests her greatly because she wants to be part of the touristic development of her country.  This is her second year of study; she has three years left and she is very enthusiastic.  She dedicates about 10 hours to her studies weekly.  In the future she would like to work at a travel agency or a prestigious hotel.  The financial aspect has been an obstacle for Kiomy in continuing her studies.  For this reason, she is thankful to Kiva's lenders for this second loan, which will allow her to keep studying.  With the money, she will be able to pay the monthly expenses of one university course and she will be able to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay monthly university expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, fruits, and vegetables

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DANAYA est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 42 ans et 6 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de TONGA commune de Wacoro
préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de condiments, de céréales, de savons, poisons fumés. Les femmes du groupe DANAYA sont à leur troisième  prêt solidaire. Ces montants seront utilisés pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées. 
 La cliente HAWA la troisième personne à partir de la gauche dans le rang debout n’a pas été à l’école. Elle est actuellement restauratrice au village depuis quatre ans chose qu’elle a appris lors de son séjour en Côte d’Ivoire. Elle compte acheter du riz, l’huile et des condiments  au marché. La vente des plats alimentaires se fait en espèce à une clientèle mixte dans son mini restaurant de Tonga village. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 15 000FCFA. Ce bénéfice mensuel sera utilisé dans l’élevage de chèvres.
texts.en:
The group DANAYA is composed of married women, who average 42 years of age and 6 children each. The women all live in traditional families in the village of TONGA, in Commune de Wacoro, Préfecture de Dioila, Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They work in food service and do commerce in condiments, grains, soaps, and smoked fish. 

The women of the group DANAYA are on their third solidarity loan. The funds will be used to purchase their goods, as cited above. 

This client, HAWA, the third persons standing from the left, has not been to school. She has been a restauranteur in the village for four years. It is a business she learned during her stay in Cote d'Ivoire.  She intends to purchase some rice, oil, and condiments at the market. Sales of her food are made in cash to a mixed customer base in her mini-restaurant in the village of Tonga. She plans on making a monthly profit of 15,000 francs CFA. This monthly profit will be used to raise goats.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her restaurant

loans.name: Homidjon

texts.en: Homidjon is a hard-working man. He was born in 1979. He works in a bakery workshop. His salary is not enough to provide for his family. He is married and has a child. Homidjon tries for the well-being of his family. Homidjon wants to organize a new business. He wants to buy a truck. Homidjon is going to serve in transportation services. He is a very kind and responsible person. He is asking for a loan of 5000 Somoni to buy a truck. This loan will help him to organize a new business and in this way to improve his living conditions. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a truck for organizing a new business

loans.name: Jorge David

texts.es:
Jorge David es un joven de 24 años de edad que desea estudiar la carrera de auxiliar en enfermería, pues está convencido que esta es una profesión de un alto compromiso ético y humano. Igualmente en una labor prospera con la cual podrá lograr las metas, esas que a lo largo de la vida ha deseado conseguir, las cuales son:  
Seguir trabajando para poder estudiar enfermería y del mismo modo pagar algunas deudas. Este joven se graduara y seguirá la especialización de enfermero jefe, con esto lograra mejorar el perfil profesional, dándole no solo una mejor calidad de vida al poder aumentar los ingresos, sino también formándolo como una persona de grandes conocimientos, los cuales podrá poner en práctica tanto en lo laboral como lo personal, de esta manera piensa el que podrá aportar a la construcción de un mejor país. 
Finalmente Jorge desea tener la casa propia, un vehículo y si la vida se lo permitiera una casa de campo. Poder sentir  alegría y felicidad por el mismo al ver que todo aquello que se propuso con disciplina,  lo consiguió  para que los padres y hermanos se sientan orgullosos, y de esta manera seguir siendo un buen hijo, hermano, padre y amigo. 
Con el convenio kiva que tiene la institución donde ingresara a estudiar, el siente que es una ayuda económica grande para así poder lograr las metas anteriormente mencionadas y las que tenga más adelante.
texts.en:
Jorge David is a young man, 24 years old, who wants to study in the Nursing Assistant Program, as he believes that it is a profession with a strong ethical and human commitment.  

Having a good job, with which he will be able to achieve his goals, is one of the dreams that he has wanted to fulfill in his life.  His goals are to be able to study nursing, and pay some debts. 

This young man will graduate and continue studying in the Head of Nursing Program. With this, he will be able to improve his professional profile and his quality of life—not only by increasing his income, but also by becoming a knowledgeable person.  He can put his knowledge into practice in both his professional and personal life, and in this way, he believes that he will be able to contribute to building a better country.

Ultimately, Jorge would like to have his own house and a vehicle. And, if fortune allows, he would like to have a house in the country.

He will be able to feel proud and happy when, with discipline, he accomplishes all that he set out to accomplish, so that his parents and his siblings will be proud of him.  In this way, he will continue to be a good son, brother, father, and friend.

He feels that the agreement that Kiva has with the institution where he will be enrolled will be of great financial help to him in accomplishing  the goals that he has mentioned above, and those that he will have in the future.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is an old client of Ugafode Microfinance who applied for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX. He runs a small shop in a central market of Mbarara town,  dealing in shoes. He has been doing this for more than seven years. Emmanuel is a hard-working man who has managed to save money from his sales which has enabled him to acquire a small piece of land in Mbarara town and construct a house. The purpose of the loan is to restock his business and complete his house. This will help him to serve the needs of his clients and also increase his turnover and profits.

loans.use: To buy retail stock

loans.name: Woury's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  est créé le 12 octobre 2010 au jour d’inauguration du banc villageois Dialicounda Naforé. Il est composé de  femmes qui sont issues du même village. Elles ont su au cours des sept cycles passés ensemble développer une solidarité et soutien mutuel. Elles fréquentent toutes le marché international de la zone pour y mener leurs activités de  petit commerce.

Madame Woury (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 garçons. Elle est vendeuse de tarots ignames sauvage cuites et crues selon les besoins du client. Elle a une bonne expérience dans cette activité vu qu’elle la pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle pense acheter une dizaine de sacs à raison de 10 000 F CFA l’unité.

Elle compte utiliser les bénéfices dans le renforcement de la dépense quotidienne dans le but d’améliorer la qualité des repas.
texts.en:
This group was created on October 12, 2010, on the day the 'banc villageois' Dialicounda Naforé was inaugurated. The group is composed of women from the same village. Over the course of the seven past loan cycles together, they found out how to develop solidarity and mutual support. They all go to the area's international market to carry out their work in small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Woury (sitting at the far right with her hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is married and the mother of six boys. She is a vendor of wild taro root and yams, cooked and uncooked, according the customer's needs. She has good experience in this business, since she has been at it for several years. 

With her new loan, she is thinking of purchasing a dozen sacks [of root vegetables] at 10,000 francs CFA each. 

She plans on using the profit to help cover day-to-day expenses with the goal of improving the quality of her dishes.

loans.use: to purchase a dozen sacs [of root vegetables] at 10,000 francs each.

loans.name: Khar

texts.fr:
Ce membre fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 20 avril 2010. Ce banc regroupe des femmes du même village. Elles vivent une solidarité notoire entre elles et font comme activité principale le commerce.
Khar, âgée de 41 ans est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont 3 filles, le cadet a 7 ans. Elle mène comme activité le commerce de bissap, elle stock en quantité suffisante chez elle car détenant un magasin. Elle s'approvisionne et écoule ses marchandises dans les marchés hebdomadaires de la localité.
Le crédit va lui permettre d'acheter 40 bassines à raison de 2000 à 2500f la bassine cela dépend de la variété du bissap. Pour la vente la bassine peut lui revenir à 3000f. les frais de transport et de convoyage des marchandises lui coute 8000f.
Avec les bénéfices, elle renforce son commerce et améliore les conditions de vie de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This member is part of the 'banc villageois' that was created on April 20, 2010. It is composed of women of the same village who have a well-known solidarity among themselves. Their main work involves commerce. 

Khar, aged 41, is married and the mother of seven children, including three girls. The youngest is 7 years old. Khar runs a business selling bissap (dried hibiscus flowers). She stocks enough of it at her home because of her store. She gets her supplies and makes her sales at her town's weekly markets. 

The loan will enable her to purchase 40 basins at 2,000 to 2,500 francs per basin depending on the type of bissap. Each basin may bring in 3,000 francs. Transport and escorting of the merchandise cost her 8,000 francs. 

With the profits, she is bolstering her business and improving her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase dried hibiscus flowers to sell

loans.name: Reina Margarita

texts.es:
Reina de 61 años de edad, estudio hasta 3 grado de básica es casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y hacer viajes con su carreta, con ellos viven dos hijos y dos nietos que estudian, los hijos ayudan en el hogar.

Ella hace tamales para vender y también recibe ayuda de sus familiares en el exterior,  se levanta muy temprano a hacer la preparación para los tamales, para mandarlos a vender y así colabora en los ingresos para su hogar

Necesita el dinero, para los trámites de la escritura de su vivienda,  ya que por 30 años ha tenido que esperar y ahora por fin dice podrá legalizar los documentos.

Ella sueña con tener su propiedad a su nombre y que sus hijos se superen, también dice que le gustaría que sus hijos estén pendientes de ella cuando sea mucho mayor.
texts.en:
Reina, who is 61 years old, went to school through the third grade of basic education. She is married, and her husband works in agriculture and makes trips with his cart. Living with them are two children and two grandchildren, who are in school. The children help in the household.

She makes tamales to sell, and she also receives help from relatives who are abroad. She gets up very early to do the preparation for the tamales, to send them to be sold, and thus she contributes to the income for her household.

She needs the money for the paperwork to register the deed for her house, since she has had to wait for 30 years, and now she will finally be able to legalize the documents.

She dreams of having her property in her name and having her children advance themselves. She also says that she would like to have her children be attentive to her when she is much older.

loans.use: to pay for the paperwork to register the deed for her house.

loans.name: Aissatou Korka's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  est créé le 12 octobre 2010 au jour d’inauguration du banc villageois Dialicounda Naforé. Il est composé de  femmes qui sont issues du même village. Elles ont su au cours des sept cycles passés ensemble développer une solidarité et soutien mutuel. Elles fréquentent toutes le marché international de la zone pour y mener leurs activités de  petit commerce.

Madame Aïssatou  (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 51 ans, est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont une fille et 04 garçons. Elle s’active dans la vente de produits agricoles et légumes plus précisément de feuille de manioc et de patate douce, produits qu’elle obtient au prés de producteurs pour la revente au marché international de la sous région.  

Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle désire acheter une balle de feuille de manioc et 15 sacs de patate douce à 10 000 le sac.

Avec les bénéfices seront exclusivement utilisés à l’entretien de ses enfants concernant leur scolarité, habillement et à améliorer la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
This group was created on October 12, 2010, on the day the 'banc villageois' Dialicounda Naforé was inaugurated. It is composed of women from the same village. Over the course of seven loan cycles together, they found out how to develop solidarity and mutual support. They all go to the area's international market to carry out their work in small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Aïssatou (sitting at the far right with a hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is 51 years old, married, and the mother of five children (a girl and four boys). She is active in selling farm products and vegetables, that is, cassava leaves and sweet potatoes. These are produce she obtains from producers in order to resell them at the sub-region's international market. 

With this new loan, she would like to purchase a bale of cassava leaves and 15 sacks of sweet potatoes at 10,000 francs per sack. 

The profits will be used exclusively to care for her children regarding their schooling and clothing and to help with day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase cassava leaves  and sweet potoatoes

loans.name: Aminata's Group

texts.fr: Le groupe est créé depuis l’inauguration du banc villageois le 17/05/2010, les femmes entretiennent de bonnes relations. MBENE l'emprunteuse en vedette est âgée de 61ans, elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants dont 02 filles et 02 garçons. Elle fait du commerce de légumes. En plus de cette activité elle fait de l'embouche ovine. Avec son crédit elle va acheter de la marchandise 75000F de légumes et  trois moutons à 30000F l'unité. Avec ses bénéfices  elle veut participer à la construction de sa maison et assurer la prise en charge de ses enfants.
texts.en: This group was created after the 'banc villageois' was inaugurated on May 17, 2010. The women maintain good relations among themselves. MBENE, who is the featured borrower, is 61 years old, married, and the mother of four children (two girls and two boys). In addition to her business, she raises sheep. With her loan, she is going to purchase some merchandise: 7,500 francs of vegetables and 3 head of sheep at 30,000 francs each. With the profits, she is going to build her own house and to ensure her children are supported.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables

loans.name: Hoem

texts.en:
Hoem is 49 years old and an experienced farmer from Bakan district, Pursat province. She owns and manages a rice farming business on one and a half hectares of farmland in the local community. She has been in this business for almost 30 years and earns approximately USD 4.00 per day. She has three grown-up children who live with her and her husband and help her with her farming chores.

Hoem would like to improve sanitation practices, so she is now asking for a loan to build a hygienic latrine for her family. The reason she was encouraged to think of sanitation is because she was promoted by an HKL credit agent regarding a water loan program, which offers a low interest rate. She is very thankful to all Kiva lenders who have donated their funds via the program to enable poor families to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her family.

loans.name: Yudy Marcela

texts.es:
Ella  es  Yudy  Marcela,   tiene  31  años, trabaja en un empresa  hace  9  años  en  el  área  de  supervisión  y  mercadeo,  estudio  en  la academia  francesa  de  belleza   el  curso  de cosmetología  en  belleza  integral,   termino  la  carrera  como técnico laboral en  administración  de  empresas,  esta  muy  motivada  a  seguir  la  carrera  de  estética,   pues  quiere  independizarse  y  tener  un  excelente  negocio, al  cual  pueda  brindar  todo  el  aprendizaje  en  las  diferentes  carreras  que  le  he  propuesto  a  hacer ,  el  área  de  estética  facial  y  corporal  le  ha llamado  mucho  la  atención  desde hace  mucho  tiempo  y  cree  que  es  la hora  de  hacer  realidad  el  sueño  de ser una  gran  esteticista,  espera  recibir  toda  la  colaboración  por  parte  de kiva y dar  todo  de  mi  para  poder  terminar a  cabalidad  la carrera,  le  parece  muy  buena  la  opción  que  le  dan  de  poder  cancelar  mensual el  semestre,  pues  así  es  mucho  mas  fácil   para  muchas  personas  que  queremos  seguir  estudiando.

La  meta  a  largo  plazo  es  poder  tener  un  excelente  salón  de belleza  con  spa  y  poder  brindar  a  los clientes  la mejor  atención  y  trabajar  con  la  mejor calidad ,  para  así  poder  crecer  y   ya  no  tener  un  salón  si  no  llegar  a tener una  gran  empresa,  confía en  la  ayuda  de  Dios,  y  las  ganas  que  tiene de  salir  adelante,  sabe  que  lo  va  a  poder  conseguir,  puesto  que  es  una  persona  muy  positiva  y  gracias  a  Dios  hasta  el  momento  ha  podido  conseguir  lo  que  me  se ha  propuesto,  para  ella  no  hay  nada  imposible, es  una  persona  valiente y  sabe que  con  todo  esto  conseguirá  esta   nueva  meta  que  se  ha  propuesto.


Espera  cumplir  con  todas  las  exigencias  que  le  pongan  en  el  instituto  y  al mismo  tiempo  recibir  la mejor  enseñanza, terminar  con gran  satisfacción  la carrera    y    lograr  este  gran  reto.
texts.en:
This is Yudy Marcela. She is 31 years old. She has been working for 9 years in a business in the area of supervision and marketing. She took a cosmetology course in integral beauty in the French academy of beauty. She finished as a working technician in business administration. She is very motivated to continue the program in aesthetics, since she wants to become independent and have an excellent business, in which she could offer all the training in the various areas that she proposes to work in. The area of facial and body aesthetics has called her attention for a long time, and she believes that it is the time to make a reality of her dream to be a great aesthetician. She hopes to receive all the cooperation from Kiva and give all of herself to be able to completely finish the program. The option that they have given her to pay for the semester in monthly payments appears very good to her, since this is much easier for many people who want to continue studying.

Her long-term goal is to be able to have an excellent beauty salon with a spa and be able to offer customers the best attention and work with the best quality, to thus be able to grow, since she wouldn't want to have a salon if it didn't become a great business. She trusts in the help of God and the will that she has to advance. She knows that she is going to be able to succeed, since she is a very positive person, and thanks to God up to now she has been able to achieve what she set out to do . For her, there is nothing impossible. She is a courageous person and knows that with all this she will achieve this new goal that she has proposed.

She hopes to satisfy all the requirements of the institute and at the same time receive the best training, finish her program with great satisfaction, and achieve this great goal.

loans.use: to pay fees for a semester

loans.name: Bellavista  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Bellavista está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio, ellos comparten gratos momentos al mismo tiempo que se apoyan mutuamente, el objetivo de todos es el brindar un mejor bienestar a sus hijos, son personas amables y gentiles que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Vive por la parroquia Victoria del Portete en Cuenca, lugar que goza de un clima frió y de amplias llanuras que son propicias para la crianza de ganado, su fuente de ingresos es especialmente la crianza de animales y la agricultura, también muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María, tiene 64 años de edad, es madre soltera  de 8 hijos mayores de edad que son casados y viven independientes, no tiene casa propia por lo que viven en una casa que le prestaron para que cuide.
Doña María desde muy pequeña se dedica trabajo del campo, trabajo que le dio la oportunidad de salir adelante y brindarles a sus hijos mejores oportunidades para que progresen, ella se dedica a la cría de gallinas, cuyes y ganado del cual vende la leche, también cultiva y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su casa y para la venta. 
Su crédito es para comprar ganado. Su meta es seguir creciendo en la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
The "Bellavista" loan group consists of eight women and one man. They share pleasant moments at the same time that they support each other. Everyone's goal is to offer better well-being to their children. They are kind and gracious people who still maintain the culture and traditions of their towns. They live throughout the Victoria del Portete parish in Cuenca, a place that enjoys a cool climate and wide plains that are suitable for raising livestock. Their source of income is especially raising animals and agriculture. Many people also work at various jobs in the city.

One of the members of this group is Señora Maria. She is 64 years old. She is a single mother with eight adult children who are married and live independently. She does not have her own house, so she lives in a house that they lend to her so that she can take care of it.

Since she was very young, Doña Maria has done farm work, work that gave her the opportunity to advance and offer her children better opportunities to advance. She raises chickens, guinea pigs, and cattle, from which she sells the milk. She also farms, and what she harvests is for use in her home and also for sale.

Her loan is to buy cattle. Her goal is to continue growing in her animal-raising business.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: David Humberto

texts.es: David es un joven de 28 años en la actualidad está estudiando una segunda carrera Ingeniería civil, decidió estudiar esta profesión porque quiere complementar su primera especialidad que es Ingeniería de transportes, actualmente cursa el segundo año de la carrera para culminarla le faltan 03 años. David esta laborando en una empresa del estado donde desarrolla todos los conocimientos adquiridos, en el futuro le gustaría trabajar en una constructora de renombre. El préstamo que ha solicitado lo invertirá básicamente para pagar la mensualidad de un ciclo en la universidad, así podra dedicarse a sus estudios sin preocuparse por el pago de la universidad, su mayor deseo es culminar su carrera encontrar un buen trabajo para poder ayudar a sus padres, también agradece a los inversionistas  de KIVA que hacen posible su préstamo.
texts.en:
David is a young, 28-year-old man.  He is currently studying Civil Engineering as his second career path.  He decided to study this profession because he wanted to complement his first specialty, Transportation Engineering.  Presently, he is in his second year of classes, although he still has three more years to finish his degree.  

David is working at a state enterprise where he is able to develop new skills and knowledge.  In the future, he would like to work at a well-known construction company.

The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for monthly university fees.  This will allow him to continue with his studies without worrying about being able to pay the university.  His greatest wish is to finish his studies and to find a good job so that he can help his parents.  He is grateful to the Kiva lenders for making this loan possible.

loans.use: to pay monthly university fees.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana de 68 años de edad, es madre de 13 hijos, es viuda.  Trabaja la agricultura desde que era una niña.

El crédito se invertirá en la compra de dos cerdos,  con los cuales iniciara su negocio que consistirá en la compra y venta de ellos.


Planea seguir cultivando el maíz y el crédito le ayudara para su negocio de la compra y venta de cerdos que será un medio de ingreso económico, para dar a su familia el sustento diario, porque con el cultivo del maíz tiene trabajo solo en esa temporada en cambio con su negocio tendrá ingresos económicos permanente.
texts.en:
Ana is 68 years old.  She has thirteen children and is a widow.  She has worked in agriculture since she was a little girl.

She will invest the loan in the purchase of two pigs; with these animals, she will begin her business of buying and selling pigs. 

She also plans to continue growing corn.  The loan will help her business buying and selling pigs, which will become another means of economic income, allowing her to provide her family with what they need on a daily basis.  She only has work during certain seasons with her corn crop; with her pig business, she will have a more consistent economic income.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar de 43 años de edad,  asistió un tiempo a la escuela, pero no pudo aprender a leer, la esposa trabaja vendiendo yuca, papas, y nuegados tienen 4 hijos, 3 de ellos están acompañados, 2 de ellos son bachilleres, uno estudio 8° grado y la última hembra estudio solo sexto y ya se acompañó y el cliente con su esposa viven solo con un hijo de 17 años.

El cliente cultivo maíz desde que vivía con su papá, pero se independizo desde hace 25 años que son los que tiene de casado, en el cultivo del maíz se involucra un hijo que tiene 17 años de edad actualmente está soltero.

El crédito lo invertirá en arreglar el maíz y pagar el resto del crédito que tiene en la institución, con el crédito mejorara porque tendrá segura la alimentación,  ya que el maíz es  vital para la alimentación en las comunidades.

El cliente desea,  seguir trabajando para tener siempre el sustento diario y para el futuro sueña con tener unas tres vaquitas paridas.
texts.en:
Oscar, who is 43 years old, attended school for a time, but he was not able to learn how to read. 

His wife works selling yucca, potatoes, and nuegados (syrup-coated fried dumplings).  

They have four children, three of whom have partners.  Two of their children have graduated from high school, one studied through the 8th grade, and the youngest girl, who only studied through the 6th grade, already has a partner.   Only their 17-year-old son lives with the client and his wife.

The client has been growing corn since he lived with his father; but he became independent 25 years ago—which is the number of years that he has been married.  His son, who is seventeen years old and single, helps him to cultivate the corn.

He will use the loan to tend to the corn, and to repay the remainder of the loan that he has with the institution.  The loan will help him to improve because he will have a secure food supply, as corn is a vital source of food in the communities.

The client wants to continue working, in order to always make a living, and for the future, he dreams of having three dairy cows.

loans.use: to tend to his corn and to repay the rest of the loan that he has with the institution.

loans.name: Diana Alexandra

texts.es:
Diana Alexandra era una chica de bajos recursos económicos que  vivía  con la familia en el campo,  conformada por la madre y 2 hermanos, uno de 24 años y el otro de 15 años. Ella se encargaba de ayudarle a la madre en las labores de la finca y hogar. Termino  de  hacer el bachillerato y no se animó a seguir estudiando por falta de recursos, así pasaron varios años, con dificultades y uno que otro sin sabor. 
En la mente rondaba la idea de salir de la casa para estudiar y  superase, aprender cosas nuevas, culturizarse, conseguir un buen empleo y poder ayudar a la familia.  Fue así como le resulto un trabajo en la ciudad y con la idea de darle un cambio a la vida lo tomo, se puso a trabajar, ya trabajando y divisando nuevos horizontes, Diana valoro la idea  de comenzar a estudiar algo, para prepararse mejor y tener más opción laboral, así, orientada en la forma de ser  y en los gustos  decidió buscar un  buen centro  donde poder estudiar enfermería, buscando y recomendada por amigos encontró  Campo Alto,  empezó a realizar el proceso de inscripción para entrar  al  programa auxiliar de enfermería.
Diana empezó con esfuerzo, dedicación y compromiso, consiguiendo con las amigas y conocidas los recursos morales y pedagógicos  que necesitaba para realizar los estudios. Ella contaba con la voluntad  de  Dios para que todo le saliera bien, pero ya que los recursos económicos no son muy estables ella pide la colaboración del convenio con kiva, para así poder terminar el curso con gran esfuerzo y  alto merito por la dedicación y esfuerzo, durante todo el curso  y  prácticas.  Hoy en día Diana consiguió un buen empleo y ahora es auxiliar de enfermería  en un reconocido hospital.
texts.en:
Diana Alexandra was a young girl with few economic resources who lived in the countryside with her family.  Her family consisted of her mother and her two brothers (24 years old and 15 years old).  She was in charge of helping her mother with the farm tasks and household chores.  She finished high school but was not enthusiastic about continuing to study due to a lack of resources.  Several years of hardship passed.

She always thought of leaving home to study and improve herself, learning new things, becoming more cultured, and finding a good job and being able to  help her family.  With this in mind, she found a job in the city and began to contemplate new life plans and goals.  Diana valued the idea of starting to study something in order to prepare oneself and to have more job opportunities.  She therefore decided to search for a good study center where she would be able to study nursing.  Through recommendations from friends, she found Campo Alto and began the registration process to enter the nursing program.

Diana began with a lot of determination, dedication, and promise, learning with her friends and classmates about the morals and methodologies they would need in order to complete their studies.  She counted on God's will for everything to go well; however, her source of economic resources was very unstable, and so she requested help from Kiva so that she would be able to complete her coursework with high honors for her dedication and efforts.

Today, Diana has found a good job as a nursing assistant at a well-known hospital.

loans.use: to pay for semester registration fees.

loans.name: Cristian Jesus

texts.es: Cristian, tiene 24 años es estudiante de Odontología; carrera que cursa en una universidad local, eligió esta profesión por vocación porque le gusta la especialidad de ciencias de la salud, son 03 años que lleva estudiando   toda la carrera tiene como duración 05 años. Cuando culmine quiere dedicarse a su profesión y poner su propio consultorio dental, en la actualidad está trabajando como asistente contable, también se dedica a la música que es algo que lo apasiona y  los fines de semana toca con algunas orquestas locales. Cristian solicito este préstamo para poder solventarla compra de instrumental odontológico para poder realizar sus prácticas, el dinero que percibe por su trabajo no le es suficiente ya que esta carrera es costoso, por eso está muy agradecido a los inversionistas de KIVA  que permiten que obtenga este crédito.
texts.en:
Christian, age 24, is a dentistry student who is studying at a local university.  He chose this profession as his vocation because he likes the health sciences field.   He has been studying for three years of the five-year program. 

When he finishes, he wants to dedicate himself to his profession and establish his own dental office. 

Currently, he is working as an accounting assistant.  He also plays music, which is something that he is passionate about, and he plays with some local orchestras on the weekends. 

Christian is seeking this loan so that he can purchase dental instruments that he needs to practice, as the money he receives from his work is not enough.  This program is expensive, and this is why he is grateful to the Kiva lenders who are giving him this loan.

loans.use: to purchase dental instruments in order to practice.

loans.name: Dursun

texts.en:
Dursun is married, and she lives with her family at Dilagarda Village of  the Fuzuli region. But they are an IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons) from Füzuli city. Dursun’s eldest son is married, has a child and lives with his family and parents. Her daughter is married too. Dursun has been in the poultry business, and she earns money by selling eggs and chickens to regular customer neighbors. 

Today Dursun wants to increase her business and applied to Komak Company for a loan in the amount of 2,100 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan she wants to buy more poultry. With an increase in her business, the number of clients will be more and the monthly income will be better. She says she is thankful to the Kiva organization for aid. In the future she wants to have a poultry enterprise.

loans.use: to buy more poultry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, cassava, eddoe, pepper, bitter ball, and plantains for her business

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.en: Dilorom is 28 years old. She is an industrious woman. Dilorom is not married and she lives with her parents. She has her own business. Dilorom is a tailor. She sews national women's dresses. Dilorom has been busy with this business for more than four years. She has her regular clients. Dilorom always tries for the well being of her family. Her brother has no job in Tajikistan. He is going to go to Russia to find a job. Dilorom wants to buy an air ticket for her brother. She is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni to buy the air ticket. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy an air ticket to Russia for her brother

loans.name: Ugul

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Угуль, она уроженка города Душанбе - столицы Таджикистана. Она замужем за ювелира. У них двое детей. Дочери 27 лет. Сыну 29 лет. Сын работает в одном из компании мобильной связи Таджикистана. Сама Угуль занимается продажей одежды. Данной деятельности она занимается около 7 лет. Ей ее работа нравиться. Он проводит время с удовольствием. Угуль планирует остаться в этом бизнесе в ближайшие несколько лет. 
   Она запрашивает кредит, чтобы привести больше товара на продажу, пополнить свои запасы и тем самым увеличить доходность. Она надеется, что с Вашей помощью Угуль соберет необходимую часть денег и расширит торговую деятельность.
texts.en: Her name is Ugul, and she is a native of the city of Dushanbe - the capital of Tajikistan.  She is married to a jeweler.  They have two children.  The daughter is 27 years old and the son is 29 years old.  The son works at one of the mobile companies of Tajikistan.  Ugul is involved in selling clothing.  She has been in this business for about 7 years.  She likes her work.  She enjoys spending her time.  Ugul plans to stay in this business in the next few years.  She is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for sale, refill her inventories and, thus, increase her income.  She hopes that with Your help, she will get the necessary sum of money and expand her retail business.

loans.use: to increase goods turnover

loans.name: Mamadur

texts.ru:
Мамадур 41 год. Она из района Гиссар и живет там с мужем и пятерьмя детьми. Ее муж торговец. Он занимается куплей и продажей фисташек. А дети учатся в школе. 
Мамадур трудолюбивая, ответственная и усердная сельская женщина. Она занята в сфере сельского хозяйства вот уже 7 лет и занимается посевом пшеницы и льняного масла. Муж после работы и дети после учебы помогают ей в ведении сельского хозяйства. Мамадур в данный момент проводит посевные работы. Она нуждается в кредите, чтобы купить семена пшеницы и минеральные удобрения. С помощью кредита она сможет закончить посевные работы на своем земельном участке и в дальнейшем получить хороший урожай.
texts.en: Mamadur is 41 years old.  She is from the Gissar district and lives there with her husband and five children.  Her husband is a seller.  He is involved in reselling pistachios.  And the children attend a school.  Mamadur is a hardworking, responsible and diligent country woman.  She has been involved in the agricultural business for 7 years and sows wheat and cottonseed oil.  Her husband, after work, and children, after school, help her with running the agricultural business.  Mamadur is currently involved in sowing work.  She needs a loan to purchase wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to finish the sowing work on her land plot and get a good harvest in the future.

loans.use: to purchase wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Karomatulo

texts.ru: Кароматуло родился в районе Фархор и по сей день проживает там со своей семьей. Ему 57 лет. Он муж, отец пятерых детей и уже дедушка. Кароматулло образованный человек. Он бухгалтер и все эти годы работал по профессии в управлении водоснабжения своего села. Его семья расширяется и их семейный доход не покрывает семейные расходы. В связи с этим Кароматуло решил начать новый прибыльный бизнес в сфере животноводства. Он будет совмещать работу с бизнесом. Кароматуло собирается открыть бизнес откорм-продажа крупнорогатого скота. Он имеет начальный капитал в размере 100 долларов и коровник. На сумму кредита и своего сбережения Кароматулло планирует приобрести двух молодых бычков вместе с кормом для скота. Кредит поможет ему создать новый источник дохода и улучшить финансовое положение семьи.
texts.en: Karomatulo was born in the Farkhor district and lives there to this day with his family.  He is 57 years old.  He is a husband, a father of five children and already a grandfather.  Karomatulo is an educated man.  He is an accountant and has worked in his profession at the water supply department of his village.  His family is expanding and their family income does not cover the family expenses.  This is why Karomatulo decided to start a new profitable business in the animal husbandry area.  He will combine his work with business.  Karomatulo is planning to open a business of fattening up and reselling cattle.  He has an initial capital of 100 dollars and a cowshed.  Karomatulo plans to use the loan amount and his savings to buy two young bulls along with livestock feed.  The loan will help him create a new source of income and improve his family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy two young bulls and livestock feed in order to start a new business

loans.name: Azar

texts.en:
Azar has a store. He is 40 years old, married, and has four children. His wife is a housewife. They live in the Absheron region, but Azar’s family are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city. 

In the store, Azar sells daily food products. Today, he wants to increase his business, so Azar wants to buy more products for sale. For this reason he needs a loan in the amount of 2,000 Azerbaijan New Manats (AZN). 

Previously, Azar took a loan from Kiva, and all of it was paid on time. Azar says great thanks to the Kiva organization and lenders for help.

loans.use: to buy more food products to sell

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru: Айнагул 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Двое старших сыновей женаты и проживают отдельно со своими семьями, а младший проживает с Айнагул.
