This will enable Tarina to manage her child's school fees and improve the family's living conditions. They are thankful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to start a milk supply and dairy products business.

loans.name: Saradini

texts.en:
Saradini is a 34-year-old who is living in Maynaguri with her husband and two children. Both of the adults are illiterate and can only sign their names. Saradini has admitted her children to the village school so that they can prepare themselves to be fit for modern society and lead better lives in the future.

Saradini's husband is a van puller. He rents a van from a local owner and that’s why he cannot keep the whole profit for his family. Saradini decided to help her husband financially to improve their family's living situation, so she took the initiative of starting a new agricultural business farming mustard seeds in her own field.

Saradini would like to request a loan from Kiva’s partner Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to buy farm supplies, such as fertilizer and mustard seeds. She knows that the complete application of farm inputs to her farmland will enable her to obtain a plentiful harvest and better income next crop season. She hopes to set a tube well in her "kaccha" house (a house made of straw and mud) with the profit from her mustard cultivation as they have to face many problems getting a supply of drinking water.

Saradini is thankful to BJS and Kiva for funding her.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies, such as fertilizer and seeds for growing mustard seeds.

loans.name: La Luz De Villa Sol Group

texts.es: Verónica de 40  años es soltera vive con su abuelita y  sus 2 hijos mayores de  20 y 21 años respectivamente. Ella trabaja en una textil donde confeccionan camisas, debido a esto decidió abrir su propio negocio donde confecciona y vende  ropa, todo esto con la finalidad  de ayudar a su familia, en su negocio recibe la ayuda de  uno de sus hijos que se dedica a la venta, sus mejores clientes son sus amistades, familiares y personas en general, sus ventas son buenas porque vende sus productos a  buenos precios. Verónica solicito este  préstamo para comprar telas para confeccionar las prendas que le solicitan, así podrá aumentar sus ganancias. Mas adelante espera abrir una tienda  para ofrecer sus prendas directamente a los clientes, ella junto a su grupo “ LA LUZ DE VILLA SOL” están agradecidos a los inversionistas por este préstamo logrado en la foto es la 4ta de la izquierda viste blusa color celeste.
texts.en:
Verónica is 40 years old. She is single and lives with her grandmother and her two children aged 20 and 21. She worked in a textile company where she sewed shirts. Because of this she decided to open her own business where she makes and sells clothing, with the aim of helping her family. One of her children works doing the sales. Her best clients are friends acquaintances and the general public. Her sales are good as her products are sold at a good price. 

 Verónica is requesting a loan to buy fabric to make clothing that has already been ordered, thus she can increase her revenues. Later she hopes to open a store where she can offer her work directly to the clients. She belongs to the “ LA LUZ DE VILLA SOL” communal bank. She is grateful to the lenders for making this loan possible. She is the fourth person from the left wearing a light blue blouse.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.ru: Жамиле 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Старший сын работает, двое средних -студенты, самая младшая дочь-школьница. Супруг-таксист. У Жамили - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жамила занимается животноводством, стартовав 26 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жамилы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь, 12 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жамила обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Жамила планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома для старшего сына.
texts.en: Jamila is 44 years old, married, and is raising four children with her husband. Her eldest son works abroad, her two middle children are students, and the youngest daughter is a schoolgirl.  Her husband is a taxi driver.  Jamila has a secondary education.  As the main source of income for her family, Jamila works in animal production.  She started 26 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 1,000 soms.  Thanks to her hard work, Jamila's farm now includes: one cow, one horse and twelve sheep.  Her monthly income is 15,000 soms.  In order to further grow her business, Jamila applied for a loan at the Bank Bai Tushum to purchase heifers for cattle breeding. With income from the loan, Jamila plans to invest in further increasing the number of domestic animals on her farm, and plans to save enough money to build a new home for her eldest son.

loans.use: to buy heifers

loans.name: Sandhya

texts.en:
Sandhya is a very strong-minded 26-year-old housewife of Maynaguri town. She is the mother of two children. One of them is receiving education, and the other one is too small to go to school. She wants her children to lead very successful lives with a good education. Sandhya and her husband both are less educated, so giving an education to her children is very important to her.

Her husband is a farmer involved in the agricultural business. He usually cultivates bananas and sells them to the market. Sandhya gives assistance to him in his business. She wants the loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy banana suckers (seedlings) and fertilizers to cultivate bananas in their field. 

With the profit, she can purchase more land to increase her business and hopes to improve their family’s financial condition, as well as for the family’s good fortune. 

She is grateful to Kiva and BJS for this loan.

loans.use: to buy banana suckers (seedlings) and fertilizer to cultivate bananas on her own plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Margarita Amadora

texts.es:
Margarita Amadora tiene 60 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Morropon, una ciudad conocida como la Capital del Tondero, una baile tradicional de la zona y del país, su población se dedica al comercio de artesanías, agricultura, y ganadería, ubicada en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la preparación y venta de chicha de jora, una bebida tradicional de la zona norte de nuestro país, Margarita realiza esta labor desde 04 años por lo que cuenta con clientela considerable.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos de su bebidas como sacos de maíz, azúcar entre otros y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Margarita Amadora is 60 years old and lives with her husband in the district of Morropon, a city known as the capital of Tondero, a traditional dance of that zone. The local population is dedicated to businesses such as artisan crafts, agriculture, and cattle raising. The area is located in the Piura region on Peru's north coast.

Margarita prepares and sells corn beer, a traditional drink of the northern zone of our country. She has been doing this for the last 4 years, and can count on a sizable clientele.

Margarita has requested a loan of 2,000 new pesos to purchase inputs for making her drinks, including sacks of corn and sugar, among other items. In this manner, she can continue to offer her production to her customers, generating greater income for her family.

loans.use: buy inputs for making the local corn beer.

loans.name: Maira Patricia

texts.es:
Maira de 45 años de edad, es una persona que estudio educación media y es casada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y albañilería. Ella se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. Junto a su esposo  para realizar sus actividades diarias, mientras sus hijos van a estudiar.


Maira se dedica a trabajar en la sastrería y agricultura oficio que le ha enseño su madre, durante la mañana trabajan en las parcelas camina 3 K.m. Para llegar y en el transcurso de la tarde se dedica a elaborar ropa para damas y caballeros.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar tela, botones, zipperes, broches, hilo, etc  para elaborar ropa, ya que actualmente no cubre el mercado lo que le genera menos ingresos para el sustento de su familia.

 Maira  planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de la elaboración de prendas de vestir  y  de la siembra, podrá comprar una maquina de coser nueva ya que la que tiene esta bastante obsoleta.
texts.en:
Maira is 45 years old. She has her secondary education. She is married, her husband is a farmer and and a bricklayer. She gets up at 4:30 in the morning. Together with her husband she does the daily chores and the children go to school. Maria works as a dressmaker and a farmer, things that her mother taught her. In the mornings she works in the fields which are located 3 kilometers away. They walk to get there. In the course of the afternoon she sews clothing for men and women. 

The loan which Maira is requesting is to buy fabric, buttons, zippers, fasteners, thread etc to make clothing. What she makes in the market right now does not cover the household expenses of her family. Maira plans to use the money she makes from making this clothing to buy a new sewing machine as the one she has is obsolete.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers, fasteners etc. to make clothing.

loans.name: Mariama's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé en Décembre 2009. Elles jouissent d’une grande expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois pour avoir faire en majorité plus de 5 cycles. Elles sont toutes issues du même quartier et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Mariama (debout à gauche), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est marié et mère de 08 enfants dont 03 garçons et 05 filles. Malgré son âge avancé c’est l’une des plus braves femmes du groupement. Elle est vendeuse de jus naturel de bissap, gingembre, tamarin et pain de singe à la gare routière. Elle fait cette activité depuis plus d’une vingtaine d’année et maîtrise très bien les circuits d’approvisionnement et de vente de ses produits.

Avec son nouveau crédit, elle compte acquérir un congélateur à 280 000 F CFA et le reste s’approvisionner en bissap, tamarin, pain de singe, deux sacs de sucre et divers colorants alimentaires.

Elle compte utiliser les bénéfices tirés de son activité à soutenir son mari à la retraite dans les charges familiales surtout la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
This group is made up of women who are very active in the village bank, created in December 2009. They have considerable experience in the village bank programme as a majority of them have already enjoyed over five rotations. They all come from the same district and get on well together. Their main activity is small businesses.

Mrs. Mariama (standing on the left), is the star borrower of the group. She is married with eight children of which three boys and five girls. In spite of her advanced age, she is one of the most courageous women of the group. She sells natural juice made from hibiscus, ginger, tamarind and baobab fruit at the bus station. She has been in this business for over 20 years and manages the supply sources and the sales of her products very well.

With her new loan, she plans to acquire a freezer for 280 000 F CFA and to use the rest for supplies of hibiscus, tamarind, baobab, two bags of sugar and various food colouring products.

She plans to use the profits from her business to support her husband who is retired, with the family expenses, especially daily costs.

loans.use: to acquire a freezer for 280 000 F CFA and  to stock up on hibiscus, tamarind, baobab fruit, two sacks of sugar and various food colouring products.

loans.name: Archana

texts.en:
Archana is a 39-year-old married woman raising two sons together with her husband. She passed Class IX (Grade 9) while her husband is illiterate, only able to sign his name. Their sons read in Class IV (Grade 4) and Class IX (Grade 9). Archana and her husband, Sadhan, have a respectful relationship with each other. They live in their own "kaccha" house (mud- and straw-made house) in the village of Tekatuli in the small town of Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.

Archana's husband is 47 years old. He has a small cattle shed in the locality and has sufficient experience in this field. Archana is also a very hardworking and purposeful lady, giving financial support to her husband. She has been engaged in a milk supply business for the last few years. 

Archana applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to purchase a cow. Her aim is to further develop her business as there is a high demand for milk in the locality. She hopes to earn enough profit from her business to enable her to give good financial support to her family and a good education to her sons.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for expanding her milk supply business.

loans.name: Nurjamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал 36 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 сына. Супруг работает мастером в районной электростанции, имеет ежемесячную зарплату. Сын учится в школе. У Нуржамал - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Нуржамал занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нуржамал, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 кобылы, 10 овец.  На доходы от животноводства Нуржамал открыла небольшой павильон по продаже продуктов питания на дому, дополнительно занимается торговлей. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нуржамал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку автомашины.
texts.en: Nurjamal is 36 and married with one son. Her husband works at the local electrical station and receives a monthly salary. Her son is in school. Nurjamal has a high school education and works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she started nine years ago with the purchase of livestock for 20,000 KGS. Thanks to her hard work, she now has two milking cows, two mares and 10 sheep. With the profits from her farm, Nurjamal opened a small stall selling groceries and household goods and also works there selling her wares. Her aggregate monthly income is 15,000 KGS. With the goal of further developing her business, Nurjamal has turned to bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan to purchase cows to increase her head count of livestock. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further increasing the number of animals she raises, and to save toward buying a car.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: German Nicolas

texts.es:
Germán Nicolas tiene 22 años de edad estado civil unión libre  vive con su esposa en Mocache Provincia de los Ríos.
Es integrante de ventanilla  Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantana, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Germán Nicolas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para los insumos que necesita para la agricultura como  abono, insecticida,  fertilizantes, urea, fungicida.

La compra lo realiza en Ventanas en el Comercial Franco. El sueño es comprar un terreno y mejorar en el negocio. El desafío al que se enfrenta es las plagas en el cultivo. En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar pelota y cuidar de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Germán Nicolas is 22 years old and in a common-law relationship. He lives with his wife in Mocache, which is in Los Ríos Province.

Germán is a member of the Communal Bank "Victoria", which is located in the neighborhood of Pantana in the canton of Ventanas. The members are farm workers and livestock breeders.

Germán Nicolas is a farmer who grows corn. He is requesting a loan in order to buy farming supplies that he needs such as compost, insecticides, fertilizers, urea, and fungicides. His purchases are conducted in Ventanas at the Franco commercial district. Germán dreams of buying a plot of land and improving in his business. The challenges he faces include dealing with crop diseases.

In his free time, Germán enjoys playing ball and looking after his crops.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, fertilizers, urea, and fungicides.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru: Наталье 43 года, вместе с супругом воспитывает 1 сына. Наталья в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается торговлей хлебо-булочных изделий на местном рынке, стартовав 20 лет назад с 5,000 сом KGS. Наталья арендует торговое место. В ассортименте -хлеб разного вида "Бородинский", "Московский", "Подовой", "Крестьянский". Благодаря упорному труду, Наталья смогла развить свой небольшой бизнес и привлечь постоянных клиентов. Ежемесячный доход составляет 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Наталья обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом.Наталья планирует сделать ремонт торгового места, что приведет к улучшению условий труда, а также увеличит объем продаж. Доходы от кредита Наталья планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, и планирует накопить средства на обучение сына.
texts.en:
Nataliya is 43. She and her husband are raising one son. As the main source of income for her family, Nataliya works selling bread at the local market, a business she started 20 years ago with 5,000 KGS. Nataliya rents her stall, and her selection of breads includes types such as Borodinskiy, Moskovskiy, Podovoy and Krestyanskiy. Thanks to her hard work, Nataliya has been able to grow her small business and attract a regular clientele. Her monthly income is 20,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Nataliya has turned to microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan. She plans to renovate her market stall, which will lead to better working conditions as well as increasing the space she has to display goods. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further development of her business, and to save toward her son's education.

loans.use: to renovate her stall at the market

loans.name: Sarathi

texts.en:
Sarathi is a 35-year-old woman who lives in a small town called Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband and three children (two sons, one daughter) in their own "kachha" house (mud-, straw- and bamboo-made house). Her three children are school-going and read in grade 8, grade 5, and grade 4. Both the husband and wife are uneducated and can only sign their names.

Her husband, Sudhir, 42 years old, is a cycle-van puller by profession. He earns money by carrying goods and people in his van. He is the only source of income for the family. He can't give sufficient financial sustenance to this family of five members, especially when the prices of everything are going up.

Thus, Sarathi has taken out a loan from Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to purchase a dairy cow to start a business selling milk and dairy products. After the cow is purchased, the family will start producing dairy products, like cheese, butter, curd, etc., for sale. They will also use the milk products for family consumption.

Sarathi hopes that the new business initiative will give her a chance to have financial stability and an increased monthly income.  Her goals are to give her children higher education and upgrade their house to a concrete-made one.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for starting a milk supply and milk products business.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насибе 28 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 4 года назад она начала свой бизнес куплей продажей женской одежды. Его эффективность помогает ему быть успешным в бизнесе. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. У нее тонкий вкус и она умеет выбрать товар, который имеет большой спрос. Несмотря на все ее достоинства, мощная конкуренция  делового мира, заставляет ее быть внимательным и обновлять товар каждый сезон. Она должна купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 Сомони  для покупки женской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nasiba is 28 and married with three children. With the goal of taking care of her family in all ways possible, she began a business four years ago buying and selling women's clothing. Her efficiency helps her to be successful in her business. She sells her goods at the local market and has a large circle of clients, as she has good taste and is able to choose goods that are in high demand. Despite the value of her goods, the powerful competition in her business requires Nasiba to renew her selection of merchandise every season. She needs to buy clothing to sell for the new season, but doesn't have enough capital to do this. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase women's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing for resale

loans.name: Reina Margarita

texts.es:
Reina, se ha decidido por otro crédito por los buenos resultados que ha tenido, en esta ocasión lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos tales como frijol, maíz, café, entre otros productos para surtir el inventario de su tienda.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a fortalecer el negocio con lo que tuvo mejores ingresos, mayor afluencia de clientes y una mejor economía para cumplir con los compromisos económicos.
texts.en:
Reina has decided to apply for another loan because of the good results that she has had. On this occasion, she will invest in the purchase of staple grains such as beans, corn, coffee, and other products to stock her inventory. 

Her previous loan helped her to strengthen her business, with which she had more income, a greater influx of customers, and a better economic situation to meet her financial obligations.

loans.use: to buy staple grains.

loans.name: Raja'i

texts.en:
Raja’i is 31 years old and lives with his family in Gaza. He left his education at the secondary stage. Two years ago, he started his own Internet coffee shop business for games and internet usage in his town. It was an impressive step forward, and that's why he is working hard to improve it.

Raja’i still needs to improve his business, so he asked Ryada for this loan to buy two other computers and an electronic generator to increase his customers, which will lead to an increase in his income.

Raja’i hopes that someday his shop will be the most well-known shop in his town.

loans.use: to buy two other computers and an electronic generator to increase his customers, which will lead to an increase in his income.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмире 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Элмира счастливая мама, так как достойно воспитывает детей, старший сын находится на заработках в России, дочь-домохозяйка, помогает матери по хозяйству, остальные дети школьного возраста. Супруг-таксист, занимается перевозкой пассажиров по селам. У Элмиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Элмира занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Элмиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, 2 бычка, 3 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Элмира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Элмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Elmira is 44 and married with five children. She is a happy mother as she has raised her children well: her oldest son is working in Russia, her daughter helps her mother around the house, and the remaining children are still in school. Her husband is a taxi driver, taking passengers from village to village. 

Elmira has a high school education and works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 14 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 20,000 KGS. Thanks to her hard work she now has two milk cows, one horse, two bulls and three sheep, with a monthly income of 13,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Elmira has turned to bank Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase cows to increase her head count of livestock. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further augmenting the size of her herd, as well as saving toward her children's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир занимается выращиванием цветов, у него 2 теплицы — одна на 3 сотки, другая на 8. В бизнесе работает вся семья — и жена, и 2 сыновей. 
Владимир надеется вложить 10 000 гривен в работу теплиц в наступающем весеннем сезоне. Он собирается закупить семена на сумму в 8 000 гривен, а также удобрения на 2 000 гривен. Очень хочет построить еще одну теплицу, так как у него еще много земли.
texts.en:
Vladimir works growing flowers. He has two greenhouses - one is 300 square metres and the other is 800. His whole family - his wife and two sons - work with him in the business.

Vladimir hopes to put 10,000 griven into work on his greenhouses for the coming spring season. He is preparing to buy seeds for 8,000 griven, and fertilizer for 2,000. He really wants to build one more greenhouse so that he has even more growing space.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Maya

texts.en:
Maya is a 30-year-old housewife from a remote village, Boragari, in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband and two children (one son and one daughter) in their own house. Both the husband and wife have primary education.  They are providing education to their children, who are in grade 4 and grade 3 respectively.

Maya's husband, Bijoy, age 35 years, is an experienced farmer. He works on his own ancestral land.  He is the main breadwinner of the family. With the help of his wife, Maya, he cultivates green vegetables. This is a very important source of income for them. His income, however, is so low that he cannot afford a living based on that alone.

To continue running this agribusiness in a sustainable way and to start potato cultivation, Maya has taken a loan from BJS to purchase potato seeds and fertilizers. She wants to start potato cultivation as early as possible so that she can help her family economically and assist her husband to run the family well.

She wants to purchase a mini-truck in the future with the profit generated from this business.

She is grateful to her lenders (BJS and Kiva).

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivation of potatoes.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto tiene 43 años de edad, cliente vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Pomahuaca, un distrito situado en la carretera Fernando Belaunde Terry, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El tiene una bodeguita donde ofrecen productos de primera necesidad y venta de fruta de estación granadilla, naranja, chirimoya, lima entre otros, su negocio se ubica en su domicilio desde hace 2 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abarrotes para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Edilberto is forty-three years old. He lives with his wife in the district of Pomahuaca, which is located off the Fernando Belaunde Terry Highway. Its people work in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry. It is located in the Jaén Province in the Cajamarca Region, which is located in the northern mountains of Peru. 

Edilberto has a small grocery store where he sells essential products and seasonal fruit, such as granadillas, oranges, cherimoyas, lemons, and limes, among others. He has had his grocery store, which he runs out of his home, for two years. He has applied for a loan of 500 Nuevos Soles to stock his grocery store; in this manner, he can earn a greater income for his family.

loans.use: to stock his grocery store.

loans.name: Nilifa

texts.en:
Nilifa is a 27-year-old energetic lady living with her husband and two children (one son and one daughter), both of whom go to school (grade 1 and kg. level).  She is a housewife and illiterate, and can only sign her name. They live in the small village of Altagram in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. They have a kachha house (a house made of straw, bamboo and mud).

Her husband, Rafikul, age 24 years, runs a grocery shop, which is the only source of income for the family. He sells rice, grains, lentils, edible oil, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc. in his shop. He has a very good relationship with his customers in the village. 

Nilifa helps her husband in his work, after managing her household work, but the income from this shop is too low to maintain all the necessities of their family, due to lack of grocery stock.

Thus, Nilifa wants to help her husband. She has a plan to make the shop bigger and keep multiple things in the shop to satisfy the customers, so she has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to purchase toothpaste, toothbrushes, soft drinks, wheat flour and other household consumables.

She hopes to earn additional profit to fulfill her dream, such as to give a better education to her children. Her profit from business will definitely help sustain her family's daily needs. She dreams to upgrade their house to a pacca one (concrete-made).

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items for her existing grocery shop.

loans.name: Rosa Ester

texts.es:
Rosa, es un madre de familia vive junto a su familia, tiene tres hijos, para sacar adelante a sus hijos hizo la apertura de una tienda en su casa, en la que ofrece productos de uso hogareño, por el momento no ha presentado ninguna dificultad en administrar este negocio.
La inversión la será utilizada para comprar detergentes, pastas, granos básicos, bebidas, golosinas, etc., para tener más y mejores productos con los que dará a sus clientes un mejor servicio, espera aumentar sus ventas y mejorar su economía.
El sueño de Rosa es tener un negocio más rentable para mejorar el estilo de vida de su familia y poder hacer modificaciones en el local.
texts.en:
Rosa is a mother of three children who lives with her family. In order to provide for her children, she opened up a store in her home where she sells household products. For the time being, she hasn't had any issue with managing her business.

This loan will be used to buy to buy pasta products, staple grains, beverages, candy, detergents, and so forth in order to have more and better products to better serve her customers. She hopes to increase her sales and improve her financial situation.

Rosa's dreams are to have a more profitable business to improve her family's way of life and remodel her business site.

loans.use: to buy pasta products, staple grains, beverages, candy, detergents, and so forth.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María Victoria tiene 58 años de edad, vive junto a su madre e hija en el caserío Las Juntas del distrito de Pomahuaca, su polacion se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, situado en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una bodega ubicada en su propio domicilio donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, también se dedica a la venta de cerveza y comercio de granos, es una madre emprendedora que se esfuerza por mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de abarrotes para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: María Victoria, who is 58 years old lives with her mother and daughter in the small village of Las Juntas, district of Pomahuaca. It is located in the Province of Jaen, which belongs to the Region of Cajamarca in the northern Andes of Peru. Its population works in agriculture, commerce and cattle raising. She has a grocery store located in her own house, where she offers basic needs products. She also sells beer and grains. She is an enterprising mother who works hard to improve her quality of life. She has requested a loan of 1,500 new soles to buy a variety of groceries to offer her customers, and in this way earn more income for her family.

loans.use: To buy a variety of groceries to offer her customers.

loans.name: Ghatagaon Tarini Asd Group

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Khurda district of Odisha, India, Laxmi is aged 28 years old and married. The lady standing with her hand raised is Laxmi. She and her husband have three children and earn a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. With her current business, she is able to earn approximately 4,000 INR per day to support her family.

This is the first loan for Laxmi with Kiva’s partner, People's Forum. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to purchase fertilizers and seeds and pay for harvesting fees. She hopes to have more crop yields and sell the crops at a good price, so as to improve her lifestyle.

All the members of this "Ghatagaon Tarini ASD" self-help group are from the same village, and all the group members are engaged in different business activities like milk selling, animal rearing, etc. All are very happy and grateful for this support.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds, and pay for harvesting fees.

loans.name: Santos Reyes

texts.es:
Santos, es un señor de 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos, todos dependen económica mente de los ingresos que el genera al dedicarse a la crianza y comercialización de ganado, es una actividad que aprendió de su padre y hace 20 años lo hace de forma independiente, no posee ayuda del extranjero. Para obtener otros ingresos también hace trabajos de albañilería y siembra de granos básicos.
El crédito lo invertirá para comprar ganado, que engordara y ofrecerá a sus clientes esperando tener mayores ganancias, con las cuales cancelara sus cuotas y continuara cubriendo los gastos familiares.
Sueña con tener un negocio mucho más rentable para cancelar lo más pronto posible su deuda.
texts.en:
Santos is 44 years old. He lives with his wife and three children. Everyone economically depends on the income generated from raising and selling livestock. This is a business that he learned from his father. Twenty years ago, he became independent. He doesn't receive outside help. To earn more income, he also does construction projects and grows basic grains. 
This loan will be invested in the purchase of livestock that he will fatten and offer to customers. He hopes to have higher profits. With these profits, he will repay his debts and continue covering his family's expenses. He dreams about having a much more profitable business in order to repay his debt as quickly as possible.

loans.use: purchase livestock.

loans.name: Diogenes Fernando

texts.es:
Diógenes  tiene 23 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con su esposa y su  hijo en el Cantón Mocache,  Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Diógenes  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz.  Solicita el crédito para la compra  de insumos y fertilizantes agrícolas. Las compras lo realizan en la ciudad de Ventanas en el Comercial Franco.

El sueño es tener salud para seguir trabajando y tener una buena producción. Los desafíos que se enfrenta son las plagas y las enfermedades, falta de capital para trabajar. En el tiempo libre le gusta compartir con la familia.
texts.en:
Diógenes is 23 years old, in a common law marriage, and lives with his wife and son in the Mocache settlement, within the Los Rios province.

He is a member of the Victoria group, located in the Pantano área of the Ventanas settlement.  He is a farmer and raises livestock.

Diógenes raises corn and is asking for a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer.  He makes his purchases in the commercial part of Ventanas.

His dream is to be healthy so he can continue working and have good production.  The challenges he faces are plant disease and insects and lack of working capital.  He likes to spend time with his family in his spare time.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Ana Melba

texts.es:
Ana de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta sétimo año, está felizmente casada, en este momento su pareja trabaja en las campañas electorales para la elección del nuevo presidente. En la casa viven sus dos hijos y una sobrina que también cuidan. 

Ella siempre ha sido una mujer muy trabajadora, cuando salía de estudiar en el colegio viajaba en bus al centro de la ciudad, para ir a trabajar en un bazar, de esta manera lograba llevar un poco de dinero a su familia, se casó cuando cumplió los 18 años. Con el tiempo decidió cambiar de trabajo y  luego vendía ropa de forma ambulante en  las calles de la ciudad. Fue hasta hace 2 años que decidió junto con su esposo dedicarse al comercio de frutas y verduras en la comunidad donde viven,  lo realizan un carrito año 93 que poseen, las cosas les ha resultado bien y esperan seguir incrementando sus ganancias.

El préstamo solicitado, es para comprar más mercadería frutas y verduras  y aprovechar esta fecha de san Valentín, que es cuando aumenta un poco la demanda de producto.

Ana sueña con poder tener una tienda de ropa  y también un puesto de frutas y verduras, de esta manera se establecerían económicamente y podrían tener una vida digna para ellos y su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is 38 years old and has a seventh grade education.  She is happily married and her husband works the presidential election campaign.  Her two children and her niece live with her.

In time she decided to change her job and began selling clothing on foot in the streets.  Two years ago she and her husband began selling fruits and vegetables in the community.  The have a 1993 car and things have gone well for them and they expect to increase their earnings.

She has always been hardworking and when she used to go to school she would travel by bus to the city center to go work at a shop so she could take some money to her family.  She married at age 18.

She is asking for this loan to buy fruits and vegetables so she can take advantage of the Valentine’s Day season, which is when her product demand increases. 

Ana dreams of being able to have a clothing store and fruit and vegetable stand.  In this way she can set herself up financially and be able to have a dignified life with her family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна — из Виноградово. У нее есть 47 сотки земли, 4 теплицы. В бизнесе задействована вся семья. Татьяна занимается тепличным бизнесом уже 20 лет, выращивает помидоры, капусту и огурцы. Татьяна — замужем, у нее 4 детей. Не так давно сильный ветер порвал   пленку в теплице, где были посеяны овощи, но, к счастью, семья смогла снова перекрыть теплицу. 
Татьяна хочет закупить для теплицы удобрения и семена, а также приобрести пленку для перетяжки теплиц — на общую сумму в 20 000 гривен. Очень хочет в будущем купить минитрактор для хозяйства, чтобы продолжать его развивать и укреплять.
texts.en:
Tatyana is from Vinogradovo. She has 47,000 square meters [about 1.2 acres] of land and four greenhouses. Her entire family is involved in the business. Tatyana has been growing greenhouse produce for 20 years. She grows tomatoes, cabbage and cucumbers. Tatyana is married and has four children. Not that long away strong winds had damaged the  plastic film in one of the greenhouses where she had vegetables planted  but ,luckily,  Tatyana's family was able to replace the film.

Tatyana would like to buy fertilizers and seeds,  as well  replacement film to be installed in her greenhouses, for a total amount of 20,000 UAH. In the future, she would really like to buy a mini tractor in order to keep developing and strengthening her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and plastic film for greenhouses.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Espinoza es un joven emprendedor, mayor de edad, casado, hace dos años inicio a atrabajar en la Alcaldía San Francisco del Norte, lo que le ha ayudado a salir adelante y motivado a seguir estudiando, actualmente esta en segundo año de Ing. Agropecuaria, solicita a Ceprodel un crédito para pago de Matricula y aranceles del primer semestre de la Universidad.
texts.en: Luis Espinoza is a young entrepreneur, married, and two years ago began working with the San Francisco del Norte communal bank.  He has gotten ahead and this motivates him to continue attending school.  He is in his second year of an agricultural engineering degree.  He is asking CEPRODEL for a loan to pay tuition for his first semester at university.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Manzarsho

texts.ru:
Манзаршо молодой и активный житель района Дж.руми. Сейчас ему 28 лет. Он женат и в одном доме вместе с ними также живут его мать, отец, двое братьев, сестра и младший брат. Его жена сидит дома и зарабатывает шитьем. Сам Манзаршо в данный момент нигде не работает, но готовится к открытию своего бизнеса. У него есть сбережение в размере 100 долларов США. Он хочет как его отец заняться услугой перевозки товара. За счет кредит и своего сбережения он хочет купить мотороллер. Он будет предоставлять свои услуги в местном рынке.
Манзаршо очень надеется на вашу помощь. Он хочет по быстрее приобрести мотороллер и обеспечить себя работой.
texts.en:
Manzarsho is a young and energetic inhabitants of the J.Rumy district. He is 28 years old. He is married. In the same house with him and his wife also live his mother, father, two brothers a sister and younger brother. His wife is a homemaker and earns some money by taking sewing orders. As to Manzarsho himself, at present he does not work,  but is preparing to launch his own business. He has savings in the amount of 100 USD. He would like to transport goods, like his father. He would like to buy a motorbike using his savings and the loan funds. He will offer his services at the local market.
Manzarsho is really hoping for your help. He would like to buy a motorbike as soon as possible and find work for himself.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike in order to start transporting goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase organic manure.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
Efrain tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Buenos Aires, comunidad que se formo por pobladores de ciudades como Morropon, Olmos, Catacaos que buscaban una tierra que les permitiera cultivar productos para poder subsistir, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de arroz, desde hace más de tres años, con la ayuda de su esposa se dedica a esta actividad desde hace tres años, Efraín, ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1 00 nuevos soles para pago de mano de obra tanto para riego de agua y cosecha y de esta manera tener una oportuna producción para ofrecer a su clientes.
texts.en:
Efrain, 34, lives with his wife in the district of Buenos Aires, a community that was formed by residents of cities such as Morropon, Olmos, and Catacaos who were looking for land that allowed them to cultivate products to make a living. The population works in agriculture, sales, and ranching. This community is located in Morropon province, which belongs to the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

Efrain has been cultivating rice for three years. He has requested a loan of 1,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to pay a worker and to irrigate his crops. This will allow him to have a better product to offer his customers.

loans.use: to pay a worker who harvests his rice crop.

loans.name: Ieva

texts.ru:
Ева работает в Виноградово. Она торгует мужской и женской кожаной обувью на местном рынке. Место для организации торговли она арендует. Наемных работников у нее нет. Бизнесом Ева занимается уже 20 лет. Она — вдова, живет с дочерью в собственном доме. Очень любит заниматься выращиванием цветов. 
Ева хочет закупить партию кожаной обуви на 30 000 гривен под реализацию весной этого года. Деньги, полученные от реализации закупленного товара, Ева хочет снова вложить в развитие бизнеса, а именно продолжать увеличивать количество товара и открыть со временем свой собственный магазин.
texts.en:
Ieva works in Vinogradovo. She sells leather shoes for men and women at the local market. Her market space is rented and she has no employees of her own.  Ieva has had her business for 20 years now. She is window and lives with her daughter in her own house. In her spare time she loves growing flowers. 

Ieva wants to purchase a batch of leather shoes for 30,000 griven for resale in spring. She will invest the profits from this venture back into her business, specifically by offering more variety of shoes in her store and eventually purchasing her own space.

loans.use: to purchase leather boots and shoes for spring sales

loans.name: Nazurulo

texts.ru:
Назуруло 46 лет. Он с семьей живет на районе Восеъ города Куляб.  У Назуруло большая семья, состоящая из его отца, жены, и четверо детей. Семью кормит только Назуруло. Его отцу 80 лет. Он пенсионер. Жена Назуруло домохозяйка. Она селит за детьми и за порядком дома. Старший сын Назурулло студент. Двое его младших сыновей и дочка учатся в школе. Назуруло ответственно относится к обучению детей. 
  Основным и единственным источником дохода в их семью является деятельность животноводства. Назуруло этим видом деятельности занимается более 10 лет. Обращаться с животными и работать в этой сфере деятельности Назуруло научился от своего отца. 
   Сейчас Назуруло хочет расширить свою деятельность с надеждой на то что увеличиться его доходность от данного бизнеса. Ведь раходы его семьи увеличивается. У Назуруло нет достаточной суммы, чтобы купить большее скотов на выращивание, поэтому он обратился за помощью.
texts.en: Nazurolo is 46 years old. He lives with his family in Kulob, in Vose region of Tajikistan. Nazurolo has a large family, consisting of his father, his wife and his four children. Nazurolo is the sole provider, as his father is 80 year old retiree and his wife is a home maker, taking care of the kids and the household. Nazurolo's eldest son is a college student, while the other two sons and his daughter still attend school. His children's education is very important to him. The sole source of income for the family is livestock. Nazurolo has been raising cattle for more then 10 years. He has learned how to take care of livestock from his father. Currently Nazurolo wants to expand his herd in hopes of increasing his profits, as his family's needs are growing, Nazurollo doesn't have enough savings to buy more cattle so he has turned to Kiva for help.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Zenayda

texts.es: Zenayda junto a su esposo de acuerdo a su  capacidad le han brindado sus estudios básicos a sus hijos mayores, aun tiene uno en edad escolar. Doña Zenayda se desempeña como encargada del Cementerio Municipal de su municipio,  se siente muy agradecida con Kiva por la oportunidad del crédito que ha sabido invertir en mejorar su vivienda, ahora necesita el financiamiento para empezar a realizar anexo que destinara para dormitorios.
texts.en: Zenayda, along with her husband, have provided a primary education to their older children. One of their children is not yet school-age. Zenayda works as a manager of the Municipal Cemetery in her town. She is very grateful to Kiva for the opportunity to get this loan, which she invested into improving her home. She now needs a loan to start building an annex that will be used as bedrooms.

loans.use: to buy quarry stones, cement, and iron, and to pay a worker.

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
Юрий — предприниматель, торгует автозапчастями. Работает сам, наемных работников нет. Торговое место арендует, бизнесом занимается уже 12 лет. 
Юрий собирается использовать 30 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить больше товара, а именно, масло, фильтры, домкраты, буксировочные тросы, чехлы на сиденья, коврики-подстилочные коврики, антифриз, аккумуляторы и т.д. Юрий планирует открыть еще одну точку с данным товаром, вкладывая в бизнес полученную прибыль.
texts.en: Yuryi is an entrepreneur who sells automotive parts and supplies. He works by himself and has no employees. Yuryi's store space is rented and he has been managing his business for 12 years. Yuryi is planning to use his 30,000 griven loan to purchase additional inventory for sale, such as motor oil, filters, tire jacks, towing ropes, car seat covers, antifreeze substance and accumulator units. Yuryi plans to open a second store with this inventory and invest the profits from this venture back into his business.

loans.use: to purchase oil, filters, tire jacks, towing ropes, car seat covers, antifreeze substance and accumulator units

loans.name: Rosa Delia

texts.es:
Rosa, necesita capital para invertirlo en la compra de útiles escolares, verduras, papel higiénico, jabón, etc., asi como tambien ingredientes para la comida, para aprovechar la época escolar y tener debidamente surtido el inventario del negocio para ofrecer mejores opciones de compra a sus clientes.
A Rosa el crédito anterior le ha permitido tener mercadería nueva y a mejor precio con lo que sus ventas han aumentado, y sus ingresos son mejores. Ella ha comprado electrodomésticos para el hogar lo que le da un estilo de vida mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa needs capital to invest in the purchase of school supplies, vegetables, toilet paper, soap, and more, so she can take advantage of the school season properly supplying the business inventory in order to offer the best purchase options to her customers, and she also needs meal ingredients.

Rosa's previous loan permitted her to buy new merchandise at the best price and her sales have increased and her earnings are better. She has bought home appliances for the home offering a better life style for her family.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, vegetables, toilet paper, soap, and ingredients for the meals she serves

loans.name: Aslam

texts.ru:
Аслам житель одной из дружелюбных и гостеприимных районов Хамадони. Ему 42 года. Аслам женат. Аслам работает водителем такси. Он около 3 лет в данной сфере деятельности. У Аслама среднее техническое образование но по специальности он не нашел работу. Основным источником дохода в семью является доход от услуги такси. 
  Недавно Аслам был вынужден остановить работу, так как его машина не пригодна для работы. Чтобы починить автомобиль, не обходимо купить запчасти. Запчасти стоят очень дорого, и у него нет достаточной суммы денег, чтобы их купить. Поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Он надеется, что Вы ему поможете!
texts.en: Aslam is a resident of of one of the most friendly and hospitable regions of Hamadoni. He is 42 years old, married and has been working as a taxi driver for three years. Aslam has a professional degree but hasn't been able to find work for his profession. So the main source of income for the family is his taxi service. Recently Aslam was forced to stop working because his car broke down. In order to repair the car Aslam needs to purchase spare parts, which are too expensive for Aslam to buy on his own. That is why he has turned to Kiva for a loan. He hopes that You will be able to help him!

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his car, so that he can continue offering taxi services

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru:
Мария занимается выращиванием помидор, огурцов и капусты. В ее распоряжении — 50 соток земли, 5 теплиц. Она замужем, есть двое сыновей, у обоих детей проблемы со зрением.
Мария планирует закупить семена на сумму в 10 000 гривен, а также установить отопление в теплицах на сумму в 5 000 гривен. Полученную прибыль Мария надеется вложить в лечение сыновей, поехав с ними на операцию по коррекции зрения. Со временем Наталия хотела бы построить еще одну теплицу и расширить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Mariya grows tomatoes, cucumbers and cabbage. She owns 1.2 acres of land and 5 greenhouses. Mariya is married and has two children. Both of her sons have problems with their eyes and require surgery. Mariya plans to use this loan to purchase seeds for 10,000 griven, and also install heating units in her greenhouses for 5,000 riven. She will use the profits from this loan to pay for her sons' eye surgery and the necessary travel expenses. In the future Mariya hopes to build another greenhouse and expand her farming business.

loans.use: to install heating systems in her greenhouses and buy seeds for the upcoming agricultural season

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия живет в Виноградово. Она — замужем, у нее двое дочерей и сын. Более того, Наталия беременна, она ждет четвертого ребенка. Она занимается реализацией кондитерских изделий, тортов, пирожных, конфет. Наталия торгует сама, наемных рабочих нет. Торговая точка у нее своя. Наталия торгует уже 12 лет. Она решила заниматься этим видом торговли потому что на тот момент ей нужна была работа. Решив попробовать себя в бизнесе, она увидела, что это выгодно и поэтому продолжает заниматься полюбившимся делом. 
Сумма в 21 000 гривен нужна Наталье для того, чтобы докупить партию свежего разнообразного товара, а именно печенья, шоколадок, пирожных, конфет и вафель для последующей реализации.
texts.en:
Nataliya lives near Vinogradovo. She is married and has two daughters and a son. Nataliya is also pregnant and is expecting her fourth child. She sells
 confectionaries and baked goods for a living in a rented store space. She has no employees but works on her own and has been managing her business for the last 12 years. Nataliya chose this line of work because she needed employment at the time, but after she tried her hand in business, she saw that is was profitable and has continued to work in retail because she likes it. Nataliya is requesting a 21,000 given loan to purchase new inventory at wholesale prices. She will be purchasing cookies, chocolates, cupcakes, candy and waffles for subsequent resale.

loans.use: to buy more new products, such as cookies, chocolate, pastries, candy, and wafers

loans.name: Mujeres Del Mañana Group

texts.es: “MUJERES DEL MAÑANA” es una alcancía conformada por  06 socias todas con diferentes negocios. Una de sus socias es Jovanna de 40 años  casada con  4 hijos, hace 05 años de dedica al negocio de cabinas de Internet donde presta servicio de alquiler de computadoras y también locutorio de llamadas, su negocio está abierto todos los días, los clientes que acuden a su negocio son en su mayoría jóvenes estudiantes y personas en general. El préstamo que ha solicitado lo invertirá para mejorar sus cabinas con el mantenimiento de computadoras, este  préstamo es una gran ayuda para ella porque le permite trabajar y ayudar con los gastos de su familia, mas adelante quiere invertir en la compra de maquinas nuevas. Jovanna quiere dar gracias a los inversionistas de KIVA que han permitido que tanto ella y su grupo comunal accedan a este crédito. Jovanna es la primera de la izquierda viste blusa negra.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Mujeres del Mañana” is made up of 6 members. All of them have different businesses. 

One of the members is Jovanna. She is 40 years old and married with 4 children. She has been working for 5 years in an Internet cafe business providing computer rental and telephone calls. Her business is open every day and her main clients are young students and people in general.

She is asking for a loan to invest in improving her booths and to maintain her computers. This loan will be a great help to her permitting her to work and help with the household expenses. Later on she would like to invest in the purchase of new machines.

Jovanna wants to thank the Kiva loaners that have permitted her and her communal bank group to access loans. 

Jovanna is wearing a black blouse and is first on the left.

loans.use: to pay for computer maintenance

loans.name: Mehrbonu

texts.ru:
Мехрбону умелая и ловкая продавщица из города Душанбе. Ей 36 лет. Она занимается продажей национальных одеяний для невесток. Мехрбону на центральном рынке столицы имеет свою торговую точку, где в основном продает тюбетейки расшитые золотом, халаты и платья  с красивыми вышивками для невест. Она занимается этим торговым бизнесом вместе с мужем на протяжении 8 лет. Их бизнес очень востребованный. Каждая девушка, вышедшая замуж одевает такие одеяния в течение определенного периода. Это древние таджикские традиции, которые по сей день соблюдаются.
В связи с этим Мехрбону хочет расширить свой бизнес. Она просит кредит, чтобы привезти разнообразный ассортимент тюбетеек, халатов и платьев для невест и таким образом увеличить доходность бизнеса.
Мехрбону и ее муж работают усердно ради своих четверых детей. У них растут трое сыновей и одна дочь, которым они хотят дать хорошее образование, чтобы в будущем им не было трудно устроить свою жизнь.
texts.en:
Mehrbonu is a smart and skillful sales woman in Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. She is 36 years old. Mehrbonu sells traditional wedding clothes for brides. She has her own retail store at the central market of the capital where she primarily sells gold embroidered hats, robes and dresses with beautiful embroideries. Mehrbonu has managed her business with her husband for 8 years now. The store is popular as every newlywed woman wears these clothes for a while after the wedding. It is an ancient Tajik traditions which is still popular in modern Tajikistan.

Because of her store's popularity Mehrbonu wants to expand it. She would like to take out a loan so that she can purchase more wedding clothes for resale and earn more profits. Mehrbonu and her husband work tirelessly to support their four children. They have three sons and a daughter and they want to provide their children with a good education so that their future life is not full of hardships.

loans.use: to purchase traditional wedding hats, robes and dresses for brides in order to expand her business

loans.name: Segundo Damian

texts.es:
Segundo Damián tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad que se caracteriza por su clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la carretera Olmos - Corral Quemado, ubicado en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al comercio de chivos, la compra lo realiza en caseríos aledaños y la venta lo realiza en el distrito de Pomahuaca, también se dedica al cultivo de cacao y arroz, Segundo ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de ganado caprino y de esta manera poder ofrecer a sus clientes generando ingresos mayores para su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo Damián is 40 years old and lives with his wife and children in Pomahuaca district, located on the Olmos-Coral Quemado highway in Jaén province, which is part of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru. It is a community noted for its warm climate. Its inhabitants work in farming, livestock-raising and commerce. 

He sells goats that he purchases in the surrounding villages and sells in Pomahuaca district. He also raises cacao and rice. 

Segundo has requested a loan of 1000 nuevos soles  to purchase goats to sell to his customers, and generate greater income for his family.

loans.use: To purchase goats to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Sector La Unión Ll Group

texts.es:
Susana es una señora soltera de 24 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en el Departamento de Sololá. Ella se encuentra ubicada en la parte izquierda de la fotografía.
Ella se dedica a la compraventa de útiles en una librería que tiene a unos metros de su vivienda. Eligió esta actividad porque es un producto indispensable y rentable en donde obtiene buenos ingresos y ganancias que le ayudan a contribuir a la economía de su familia. 
Comenta que esta labor lo viene realizando desde hace un año,  por lo que ha tomado la decisión de formar un grupo para incrementar el negocio con el fin de mejorar la economía de sus familias. De manera que el préstamo lo utilizaran para la compra de útiles ya que desean darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Su sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia para que en un futuro tengan mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Susana is a single, 24 year old, woman who lives with her son in the Solola department.  She appears to the left of the photograph.

She buys and sells supplies at a bookstore that she set up a few minutes from her home.  She chose this activity because the products are indispensable and profitable and earns a good income which she uses to help her family financially.

She says that she has been doing this work for a year and decided to form a group and grow her business so she can improve her family finances.  She will use the money from this loan to buy supplies so she can provide better customer service.

Her dream is to improve her family’s quality of life so they can have better opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru: 31 летний Курбонали из района Хамадони работает механиком в автосервисе. Он семейный человек. Курбонали всегда находит время для семьи и успевает на работе. Сейчас Курбонали много времени проводит в автосервисе. Он хочет купить автозапчасти, чтобы его клиентам было удобно приобрести необходимые запчасти. Так он сэкономит время, доходность увеличится, и он больше времени будет проводить с семьей. Но к сожалению для купли разной запчасти у него нет достаточной суммы, поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Помогите ему купить автозапчасти для его автосервиса.
texts.en: Qurbonali is a 31 year old auto-mechanic from Hamadoni region. He is a family man. Qurbonali always finds time for his family AND his work. Currently Qurbonali spends a lot of time in his auto repair shop. He wants to offer spare parts for sale so that it is convenient for his clients to purchase parts. This way he will be able to save time, increase profits and spend more time with his family. Unfortunately, Qurbonali doesn't have enough savings to buy a wholesale shipment of spare parts, so he has turned to Kiva for a loan. Please help him improve his auto repair shop!

loans.use: to purchase spare automotive parts for his auto repair shop

loans.name: Ruben Antonio

texts.es:
Rubén, es un señor casado, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, se dedica a su negocio que consiste en una sastrería, un molino de nixtamal y también cultiva granos básicos, realiza estas actividades con el fin de reunir los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos familiares. Lo aprendió de su padre, su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.
El capital lo necesita para comprar una tolva y un motor más grande para el molino de nixtamal, con lo que  ofrecerá un mejor servicio a sus clientes y a si mismo tendrá las ganancias que necesita para cancelar las cuotas del préstamo y mejorar las condiciones familiares.
Su mayor anhelo es dar  a sus hijos oportunidades para que estudien una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Ruben is married and lives with his wife and their three children. He is dedicated to his business which consists of a tailor, a corn mill and also he cultivates basic grains. He performs these activities with the goal of earning the necessary income to cover his family's living expenses. He learned from his father. He works from 7AM to 5PM.

The capital he needs is to buy a chute and a bigger motor for the corn mill with which he will offer better service to his customers and, at the same time, will have the income he needs to repay his loan and improve his family's conditions.

He greatest goal is to give his children opportunities to study at university.

loans.use: to buy a chute and a bigger motor for the corn mill.

loans.name: Empresarios De Laura Caller Group

texts.es: La Alcancía “Empresarios de Laura Caller” está conformada por 06 socios todos trabajadores en diversos negocios. Una de las socias es Virginia quien se integro al grupo invitada por una vecina. Ella tiene 51 años es casada y sus  03  hijos son mayores de edad,  hace 07 años se dedica a confeccionar y bordar vestuarios típicos sus clientas son artistas folclóricas que siempre acuden a su domicilio  para prestar sus servicios, también realiza trabajos de costura y compostura. Gracias a su trabajo puede solventar algunos gastos familiares y ayudar a su esposo, su último crédito lo destinará para invertir en su negocio con la compra de materiales de costura hilos, telas y encajes. Virginia agradece  a las personas que hicieron posible el crédito para ella y su grupo comunal, en la foto es
texts.en: The "Empresarios de Laura Caller" (Laura Caller Entrepreneurs) Community Bank is made up of six members, all of whom are workers in different businesses. One of the members is Virginia who joined the group after an invitation from a neighbor. She is 51 years old, is married and her three children are adults. For seven years, she has been dedicated to making and embroidering typical costumes. Her customers are folk artists who always come to her house to engage her services. Also, she does sewing and repair work. Thanks to her work, she can pay some of her family's expenses and help her husband. Her last loan was destined to be invested in her business through buying sewing materials, thread and lace. Virginia is thankful to the people who made this loan possible for her and her community group.

loans.use: to purchase sewing materials.

loans.name: Vilma Soledad

texts.es:
Vilma Soledad tiene 33 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de animales menores conejos, patos, cuyes, en la parte posterior a su domicilio, es una madre emprendedora también se dedica a la venta y elaboración de chupetes y a su respectiva venta, Vilma se dedica a esta labor para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles, para la compra de bebidas gaseosas, galletas entre otros para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma Soledad is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the Lagunas district, a community that is dedicated to farming, trade and livestock, located in the Chiclayo province that belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

She is dedicated to selling young animals such as rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, in the area behind her house. She is an entrepreneurial mother who is also dedicated to selling and making pacifiers. Vilma is dedicated to this work in order to support her husband with the family's expenses. She has requested a loan of 1,500 PEN to buy sodas, cookies among other items to stock her business and, in this way, generate greater income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of candies and other products to offer to her customers.

loans.name: Aijan

texts.ru: Айжан 41 год, незамужем, имеет 1 дочь Диану 1995 года рождения-студентка 1 курса. С 2004 года Айжан начала заниматься торговлей женской одежды, стартовав с суммой в 30,000 сом (KGS), за этот период у Айжан значительно увеличился товарооборот, Айжан обрела достаточно опыта в данной сфере. Айжан сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Айжан обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом на оптовую покупку женской одежды для дальнейшей розничной продажи. Айжан планирует вложить доходы от бизнеса в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента товара, а также в будущем намерена сделать ремонт своей квартиры.
texts.en: Aijan is 41 years old, single and has one daughter. Her daughter Diana was born in 1995 and is now a freshman in college. Aijan has been selling women's clothes since 2004. She started with 30,000 som (KGS) and was able to significantly increase inventory turnover rate and become an experienced saleswoman. Her business's monthly profits are 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her business Aijan has turned to "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan. She will use the money to purchase women's clothes wholesale for subsequent resale at retail prices. Aijan plans to invest the profits from this loan by further expanding inventory and hopes to save enough to repair her apartment in the future.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes wholesale

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel de 20 años de edad, estudio hasta bachiller, esta soltero, no tiene hijos y actualmente vive con sus padres y 3 hermanos.


Manuel  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tiene 10 años, pues fue su papá quien le enseño el trabajo
siempre le dijo que era bueno estudiar, pero que es necesario a prender a trabajar. Actualmente trabaja en una gasolinera desde hace un año gracias a Dios solo salio de estudiar y ha conseguido empleo, pero su sueño es seguir estudiando y preparase en una carrera universitaria, para tener una mejor oportunidad. Él camina  a pie 25 minutos para llegar donde trabaja, trabaja el horario de la tarde, que comienza a la 1:00 PM, y regresa a su casa a las 8:30 PM. 


El préstamo será utilizado, para construir una habitacion a la par de la  casa de sus padres, tiene un empleo quiere comenzar a comprar sus cosas para ser independiente, con el préstamo comprara 1000 ladrillos, 60 bolsas de cemennto, 3 quintales de hierro, una camionada de piedra, y una de arena. 

Manuel sueña  en poder construir su habitacion, y amueblarlo además, sueña con seguir estudiando y prepararse en una carrera universitaria, pagar el crédito y tener las puertas abiertas y luego casare.
texts.en:
Manuel is 20 years old. He finished his secondary school studies. He is single, has no children and lives with his parents and 3 siblings. Manuel has worked in agriculture since he was 10 years old. His father taught him this work saying that study was good, but it is necessary to know how to work.

He currently works in a gas station. He has been there for one year. He just graduated from school and thanks to God he found work. But his dream is to continue to study and prepare for university in order to have better opportunities. He walks to work in 25 minutes and works the afternoon shift. He starts work at 1 pm and leaves for home at 8:30 pm. 

The loan will be used to build a room attached to his parents house. As he works he wants to spend his money to become independent. He'll buy 1000  bricks, 60 bags of cement, 300 pounds of re-bar, a truck load of gravel and a truckload of sand. Manuel dreams of being able to build a room and furnish it.
He dreams of continuing his studies and preparing for university, pay off this loan, keep his options open and later get married.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, re-bar, gravel and sand.

loans.name: Dilovar

texts.ru:
Диловар молодой, но опытный мастер из города Турсунзаде. Ему 22 года. Он занимается производством деревянных окон и дверей. Диловар занимается этим делом с 16 лет и уже 6 лет как продолжает его. Ему передалось это ремесло от отца. Диловар недавно женился. Он хочет, чтобы у него родился сын, продолжатель его рода и его ремесла. 
В данный момент Диловар обратился за кредитом, на сумму которого он собирается приобрести необходимые рабочие инструменты по изготовлению деревянных окон и дверей. С помощью новых рабочих инструментов темп его работы будет быстрее и качественнее.
texts.en: Dilovar is a young, but experienced master woodworker from Tursun-zoda. He is 22 years old. Dilovar makes wooden doors and windows and has been a woodworker since he was 16 years old. He learned this trade from his father. Recently Dilovar got married and he hopes that he, too, will have a son who will continue the family traditions. Currently Dilovar needs a loan for purchasing woodworking tools. With new tools he will be able to work faster and produce higher quality products.

loans.use: to purchase tools for making wooden doors and windows

loans.name: Ma'ruf

texts.ru: Маъруф 50-летний житель района Джиликуль. Он человек с ограниченными возможностями и передвигается на костылях. Хотя жизнь оказалась суровой по отношению к нему, он не потерял свой оптимизм и положительные взгляды на жизнь. В данный момент Маъруф безработный и поэтому собирается начать новый бизнес. Он хочет чувствовать себя частью общества и самостоятельно зарабатывать, чтобы обеспечивать свою семью. Хотя его сын работает, он занимается куплей-продажей угля, но Маъруф больше не хочет быть зависимым. Маъруф планирует во дворе своего дома выращивать крупнорогатый скот. Он рассчитал и по его словам он справится с этим бизнесом. У него есть место для содержания скота и корм для скота. Маъруф берет кредит, чтобы купить 4 голов крупнорогатого скота с целью дальнейшего откорма перепродажи. Он верит и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Ma'ruf is a 50-year-old resident of the Jilikul district of Tajikistan. He has a physical disability and uses crutches to move around. Although his life has been a harsh one, he has never lost his optimism and positive outlook.  Ma'ruf is currently unemployed and planning to start his own business. He wants to feel a part of society and to make his own a living in order to provide for his family.  Maruf's son has a job: he buys and sells coal, but Ma'ruf no longer wants to be a dependent.  He is therefore planning to raise cattle at home.  He has done a lot of thinking into this and believes that he will do well at his business.  He has the necessary space to keep cattle and already has some cattle feed.  He is taking a loan to buy four head of cattle for further fattening and resale.  He is hoping to get some support and believes in his success.

loans.use: to buy four head of cattle and start his new business.

loans.name: Oscar Yndalecio

texts.es:
Oscar Yndalecio tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Pucalá, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de productos de artesanía, miel de abeja, algarrobina y polen, cuenta con cliente de la zona y distritos aledaños, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevo soles para la compra de dichos productos en mayor cantidad y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar Yndalecio is 39 years old and lives together with his wife in the district of Pucalá, in the Province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru. The people here farm, trade and raise livestock. 

Oscar sells handicrafts, honey, algarrobina and bee pollen. He has clients in his area and the surrounding districts. He has requested a loan of 3,000 PEN to buy the aformentioned products in greater quantities to offer to his clients, generating more revenue for his family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products like bee's honey, algarrobina (a sweet syrup made from the tree of the same name), etc. to offer to his clients.

loans.name: Fredis Orlando

texts.es:
Fredis, se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar repuestos que necesita para reparar el molino de nixtamal que posee y así continuar brindando un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
La inversión anterior le ayudo a tener los recursos necesarios para darle mantenimiento y reparación al equipo, con  lo que sus clientes se encuentran muy satisfechos, sus ingresos son mejores y las circunstancias familiares son de mejor calidad.
texts.en: Fredis sees the  need to request a new loan to buy parts that he needs to repair the corn mill that he possesses and thus continue providing a better service to his customers. The previous investment helped him to have the necessary resources to maintain and repair the equipment with which his cusomters were very satisfied. His income is better and his family's circumstances are improved.

loans.use: to buy parts.

loans.name: Cesar Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio es un hombre de 23 años de edad, la vida ha estado rodeada del mundo de la mecánica, empezó a asistir a diferentes programas de macanica y se fue interesando poco a poco, ahora quiere obtener el titulo en mecánica automotriz lo cual le ha llamado la atención hace mucho tiempo, con la esperanza de mejorar los ingresos personales, actualmente trabaja en la plaza de mercado para poder pagar los estudios, pero con el convenio de kiva seria una ayuda grande para el, ya que las cuotas le quedarían con un valor mas económico, en el tiempo libre va al taller de un amigo para adquirir mas conocimiento sobre la carrera que quiere y esta estudiando.
texts.en: Mauricio is a 23 year old man who's life has revolved around the world of mechanics. He started to attend different mechanic's programs and became more and more interested. Now he wants to get his degree in Automotive Mechanics which has attracted him for a long time. He hopes to improve his personal income. He actually works in a marketplace to pay for his studies. But a loan from Kiva would be a big help for him, as the installments would be more economical. In his spare time he goes to the shop of a friend in order to gain more knowledge about the career he is studying and enjoys.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра веселая,добродушная женщина. Ей 39 лет. Замужем. Мать троих детей. Eё дети учатся в школе. Старший сын в этом году заканчивает школу. У Гулчехры очень дружная заботливая семья. С мужем она работает для благополучия семьи, чтобы дети жили в достатке. В данный момент муж Гулчехры Ойбек находиться в Р.Ф. работает таксистом. Сама Гулчехра торгует на центральном рынке района. У нее имеется не большая точка, где она продает конфеты, сладости. Товары Гулчехра привозит с города. Дела у Гулчехры идут хорошо и она хотела бы расширить свой бизнес, разнообразить ассортимент товара. Но ей не хватает денег. Поэтому Гулчехра обратилась в МДО "Арванд" за кредитом. Она очень надеется на поддержку Арванда,ведь благодаря таким организациям улучшается жизнь местных жителей и дела начинающих предпринимателей.
