texts.en: Gulchehra is a happy and content woman. She is 39 years old, married and has three children. Her kids attend school. Her eldest son is finishing high school this year. Gulchehra has a wonderful and caring family and both her and her husband work tirelessly for the well being of their children. Currently Gulchehra's husband is working in Russia as a taxi driver, while she herself sells groceries at the local market. Gulchehra has a small market stall where she sells candies and sweets, which she brings from the main city. Her business is doing well and she would like to expand it by purchasing more varieties of candies for sale. But this purchase requires more savings then Gulchehra has at the moment. That is why she has turned to micro-finance bank "Arvand" for a loan. Gulchehra hopes for Arvand's support as this organization has been able to improve lives of local residents and local businesses.

loans.use: to buy sweets

loans.name: Muhbira

texts.ru: Мухбира родилась в 1990 году. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 маленьких детей. Мухбира учится в Таджикском Государственном Университете Коммерции. Она учится по специальности Бухгалтер и аудит. Она является студентом 5 курса. Мухбира учится в заочное отделение. Она параллельно  работает в учебном центре. Она преподает компьютерные курсы. Она обучает программы MS WORD и MS EXCELL. Мухбира умная женщина, трудолюбивый работник и заботливая мать. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 350 долларов США для оплаты обучения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhbira was born in 1990.  She is married and raising two small children.  She is enrolled at the Tajik State University of Commerce where she is studying towards a degree in accounting and audit.  She is currently in her fifth year of studies and completing her coursework by correspondence.  In addition to her studies, she also works in a training center, teaching computer classes (MS Word and MS Excel).  She is a very intelligent and hardworking woman, and a caring mother.  She is taking a loan of 350 USD to pay her tuition.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her education.

loans.name: Harold Stiven

texts.es:
Harold  es un joven de 17 años de edad es bachiller y desea seguir estudiando en algo que le ha llamado la atención desde pequeño lo cual es la mecánica automotriz, un día estaba en la casa cuando llego un amigo y le dijo que le ayudara a reparar un daño que tenía la moto él le ayudo con gran facilidad, al empezar a buscar en que estudiar quiso desempeñarse en la mecánica lo que él cree que es fácil y se desenvolvía muy bien en este campo.
Con el apoyo de los familiares él se fue motivando más, hasta el punto de buscar una institución donde estudiar ya que siente que tiene varias virtudes para la mecánica automotriz.
Él quiere obtener un título en lo que le ha gustado la mayoría de tiempo de la  vida con la esperanza de obtener un título y de que los ingresos económicos mejoren, ya que por medio del convenio con kiva pagaría mensualidades mucho mas cómodas y a si pueda gozar  de una mejor vida laboral y social.
texts.en:
Harold is a 17 year old young man. He is a bachelor and wishes to keep studying something that has caught his attention since he was little which is auto 
mechanics. One day he was at home when a friend arrived and asked him to help repair damage to his car. He helped him with great ease. When he began to search for what to study, he wanted to do mechanics which he believed was easy and unfolded very well in this field. With the support of family, he was more motivated to the point of looking for an institution where he could study since he feels he has various virtues for auto mechanics.

He wishes to obtain a degree in something that he has liked for most of his life  and that the income improves since through the agreement with Kiva he would pay monthly much more comfortably and thus be able to enjoy a better working and social life.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha tiene 51 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Lagunas, una comunidad tranquila, su población en la mayoría se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de tamales, en el mercado de su distrito, su hijo le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos para los preparativos de su producto, pollo, maíz, plátano, entre otros y de esta manera ofrecer variedad de tamales a sus cliente, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Martha, age 51, lives in a peaceful community in the Lagunas district.  Most of the people there devote themselves to farming, commerce, and livestock.  It is in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells tamales at the market in her district.  Her son helps her with this work.  She has requested a loan for 1,000 soles to buy supplies like chicken, corn, and bananas, among others, to prepare her product.  This way she will offer her customers a variety of tamales, and she will generate greater income for her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make tamales.

loans.name: Sri Satya Sai Shg Group

texts.en:
From a small village of Khurda district, Odisha state, India, sixteen women stepped out and made a self-help group having the name of "Sri Satya Sai Shg" to earn some money from different activities to support their families. All the group members are engaged in different business activities like paddy cultivation, vegetable cultivation, etc.

Ranjarani, age 41, is a married lady with one daughter. The lady standing with her hand raised is Ranjarani. To provide her living, she has been planting rice and farming for twelve years. Her farming earned an income of 3,500 INR per month.

Now she is the group leader of this group, and they are seeking their first loan with People's Forum (Kiva’s partner) for 240,000 INR. As the group leader, she is going to use her loan portion to buy rice seeds and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes her rice will gain a good crop yield for her to earn a profit to support her business.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
Juana María tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se encuentra cerca al valle del río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, su población también se dedica al comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores patos, pavos y cerdos en la parte posterior a su domicilio, Juanita como a si la conocen sus vecinos se dedica a esta labor para apoyar con los gastos familiares, tiene una familia unida, su esposo brinda servicio de labores agrícolas, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Juana María is 42 years old. She lives with her husband in the district of Zaña, located in the province of Chiclayo, which is part of the region of Lambayeque, on the North Coast of Peru. This community is located beside the Jequetepeque River valley which allows it to develop it's agriculture. It's inhabitants also trade and raise livestock.

Juana raises small animals like ducks, turkeys and pigs at the back of her house. Juana like her neighbors does this in order to support her household expenses. They have a close family, her husband offer his services as an agricultural laborer. Juana has requested a loan of 2,000 Pen to buy balanced feeds to fatten her animals and in this way make more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Shaiymkan

texts.ru: Шайымкан 40 лет, не замужем, имеет взрослых детей. С ней проживает младший сын со снохой, помогают в ведении хозяйства. У Шайымкан - медицинское образование, она предприимчивая и очень старательная, работает медсестрой в районной больнице, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Шайымкан занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Шайымкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 5 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,80 ГА, на которой выращивает пшеницу для собственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шайымкан планирует увеличить поголовье скота, тем самым она увеличит прибыль от оборота скота, прибыль от приплода и дохода реализации молока. В связи с этим Шайымкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Шайымкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку бытовой техники.
texts.en: Shaiymkan is 40 years old, single and has adult children. Her youngest son and his wife live with her and help with managing the household. Shaiymkan has a medical degree and works as a nurse in the local hospital. She is an entrepreneurial and hard working woman who also earns additional income by raising cattle. Shaiymkan started 13 years ago by purchasing livestock with 20,000 KGS. Due to her hard work she currently owns a milk cow, 5 sheep as well as 4.5 acres of land where she grows wheat for family consumption and resale. Monthly profits from the farm and livestock add up to 15,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her farm Shaiymkan plans to purchase more cattle and so increase profits from milk and animal sales. She has turned to "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan which she will use to buy a few young calves, fatten them and resell at the market with significant profits. She will use the profits from this venture to continue expanding her herd of livestock as well as save enough money to upgrade her household appliances.

loans.use: to buy steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Hector Jose

texts.es:
El es hector jose, uno  de los propósitos por el cual eligió  esta carrera es porque quiere enfocarse en todo lo que tenga que ver con medicamentos y  todo lo que desarrolla la farmacia,  no solo esto,  si no darle un apoyo o ayuda a la sociedad en cualquier caso o emergencia que se presente, y crear mas recurso de vida para la gente que rodea el entorno.  En la vida de el esta carrera la quiere   ejercer  es porque quiere crear la propia mini empresa y no solo eso, el quiere ser independiente. 
Otro de los propósitos por el cual se enfoco en esta carrera,  es por crear más conocimiento de las diferentes definiciones que tiene la farmacia  y aportes que se pueden dar,  como crear preparaciones de medicamentos, esta carrera tiene diferentes ramas, en la cual se desprende muchas  materias  interesantes para lograr ser  un buen farmacéutico.
texts.en:
This is Hector Jose.  One of the reasons that he chose this career is because he wants to focus on everything that has to do with medicine and all that the pharmacy does.  However, it is not just this.  He wants to support or help society in any situation or emergency that occurs.  He wants to create more life resources for the people around his environment.  He wants to practice this career in his life because he wants to create his own mini-business.  Also, he wants to be independent.

Another reason that he focused on this career is to gain more knowledge of the different definitions that the pharmacy uses and the contributions that he can make like preparing the medication.  This career has different branches in which there are many interesting subjects to master in order to become a good pharmacist.

loans.use: to pay for registration for a semester.

loans.name: Aichurok

texts.ru: Айчурок 19 лет, замужем. Сразу же после окончания школы в 17 лет Айчурок вышла замуж. У Айчурок - неоконченное-высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айчурок занимается животноводством, супруг занимается куплей-продажей скота на местном рынке. Айчурок начала заниматься животноводством 2 года назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айчурок, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айчурок обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айчурок планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Aichurok is 19 years old and married. She married at 17, straight out of high school. Aichurok has an unfinished college degree and is raising livestock for a living, while her husband sells the animals at the meat market. This is the main source of income for the family. Aichurok started her herd two years ago with 8,000 som (KGS). Due to her hard work she now owns 2 milk cows and a calf and the monthly profits from the animals are 9,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her business Aichurok has turned to "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan. She will use the loan to purchase a few sheep and plans to invest the profits from the loan back into her livestock business.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru:
Фарход 33 летний житель городка Турсунзаде. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Фарход ответственный вежливый и интеллигентный мужчина. Он занимается изготовлением дверей. Опыт и мастерство в этой сфере деятельности ему досталось от отца. Вот уже 11 лет своей жизни Фарход зарабатывает себе и своей семье на жизнь с помощью изготовлением межкомнатных и внутренних дверей. 
   Процесс работы требует много времени и Фарход решил купить необходимое оборудование, чтобы ускорить процесс работы. Но оборудование стоит дорого. Фарход решил обратиться за кредитом, чтобы собрать не достающую часть денег. Он ждет Вашей поддержки. Помогите ему!
texts.en: Farhod is a 33-year-old resident of the city of Tursunzoda.  He is married and the father of two children.  He is a responsible, polite and intelligent man who manufactures doors for a living.  He learned this trade from his father and he is now experienced and skilled in his field.  He has been making exterior as well as interior doors for the past 11 years already.  Manufacturing doors takes a long time, and Farhod wants to buy some equipment to speed up the process.  However, equipment is expensive and Farhod is applying for a loan to receive some of the money he doesn't have.  He is awaiting your support.  Please help him.

loans.use: to buy some equipment to make doors.

loans.name: Amalfi

texts.es: Amalfi de 22 años de edad, es una estilista de belleza y desde hace 6 años se dedica a esta actividad, que aprendió desde muy niña con una amiga de su familia. Al ver que a su amiga le resultaba muy rentable, Amalfi poco a poco fue construyendo su sueño emprendedor, hasta que logró estudiar y perfeccionar su saber,  mediante el aprendizaje de  técnicas especiales que hoy aplica. En la actualidad trabaja en su propio negocio, desde los lunes a domingos y desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, ofreciendo los servicios de peinado, corte, tinturado y en general mantenimiento capilar y de la imagen personal de mujeres, hombres y niños . Su meta es lograr cada vez mas reconocimiento de sus servicios y a futuro tener sucursales, ampliando el número de clientes, que es su mayor desafío. Actualmente está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará productos  e insumos de belleza, tintes, shampo, enjuagues, aliser, los cuales usa para mejorar  la imagen de sus clientes directamente y vende a estos posterior a su asesoría. Su éxito consiste en responder a las necesidades de su clientela, en el marco de los productos que aplica y vende a ellos.
texts.en:
Amalfi, age 22, has been a beauty stylist for six years.  She learned from a friend of her family when she was very little.  When she saw that it was very profitable for her friend, Amalfi gradually built her entrepreneurial dream.  She managed to go to school and perfect her knowledge by learning the special techniques that she now uses.  

She currently works in her own business from Mondays through Sundays from eight in the morning until eight at night.  She provides hair styling, cutting, and dying services.  She also provides general hair maintenance and personal image maintenance for women, men, and children.

Her goal is to manage to become more and more well-known for her services.  In the future she would like to have branches and expand her number of customers, which is her biggest challenge.  

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy products and beauty supplies, dyes, shampoo, rinses, and straighteners.  She will use them to improve her customer’s image and to sell for their later use.  Her success consists of responding to the needs of her clientele and in the brand of the products that she uses and sells to them.

loans.use: to buy products and beauty supplies, dyes, shampoo, rinses, and straighteners.

loans.name: Las Chocolá Group

texts.es:
María (al centro en la fotografía, blusa color violeta) es una mujer de 36 años de edad, casada, tiene tres hijos; actualmente vive junto a ellos en el departamento de Suchitepéquez.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y específicamente de trajes típicos que la gente de su comunidad usa. La venta de la ropa lo realiza en la casa donde vive. La venta de este producto la lleva a cabo con sus vecinos y también lo vende en el mercado de su comunidad. Esta actividad la realiza porque es algo que tiene mucha demanda y le genera los ingresos necesarios para aportar al sostenimiento de su familia. 
Tiene 8 años realizando esta labor; además de esta actividad ella también se dedica al injerto de plantaciones de café, con lo cual complementa su presupuesto familiar
Ella decidió organizar un grupo con el objetivo de ayudarse mutuamente con su compañeras y asi mejorar sus niveles de vida. Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería (ropa típica).
María sueña con darles una excelente calidad de vida a sus hijos y que en  un futuro sean personas con una preparación académica.
texts.en:
María (in the center of the photograph wearing a violet colored blouse) is a 36 year old woman, married with 3 children and currently they live together in the department of Suchitepéquez. 

She works selling clothing, specifically typical clothing, for the people of her community to wear. She sells from her home. She sells her products to her neighbors and also she sells them in the community market. She works in this activity because it is something that has a high demand and it generates the needed income to support her family. She has been doing this for 8 years, and in addition she also works grafting at coffee plantations, which augments the family budget. 

She decided to organize a group with the objective of supporting one another in order to  improve their living standards. She will use the loan to buy more merchandise of typical clothing.

María dreams of giving her children an excellent quality of life and hopes that in the future they become academically prepared.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise consisting of typical clothing

loans.name: Johanna Marisela

texts.es:
Johanna tiene 22 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con su esposo y su hijo de 5 años  en el Cantón  Ventanas Provincia Los Ríos.

Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Johanna se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, soya y maíz. Solicita el crédito para la compra de lo necesario para sembrar maíz y arroz.  Las compras lo realizan en la ciudad de Ventanas en Agripac.

El sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida y poder comprar terreno. Los desafíos que enfrenta es presencia de mucha lluvia. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Johanna is 22 years old and is married. She lives with her husband and five-year-old son in the Ventanas canton of the Los Ríos province.

Johanna is a member of the Victoria communal bank, in the Pantano area of the Ventanas. Here the people make a living in farming and raising livestock.

Johanna works in farming, growing rice, soya beans and corn. She is applying for this loan in order to buy the necessary supplies to sow rice and corn. Johanna makes her purchases at Agripac, in the city of Ventanas.

Johanna's dream is to improve her living conditions and to buy land. One challenge that she is facing is the heavy rains. In her spare time Johanna likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Juan Everaldo

texts.es:
Juan  tiene 40 años de edad estado civil unión libre, vive con sus dos hijos  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia Los Ríos.

Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto PantanO, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Juan se dedica a la siembra de maíz.  Solicita el préstamo para  poder comprar los fertilizantes para la siembra y para arrendar terrenos.  Las compras lo realiza en el cantón ventanas y en Mocache. 

Su sueño es superarse económicamente para tener una mejor calidad de  vida. El desafío  que enfrenta es combatir contra las malezas.  En su tiempo libre la gusta jugar futbol y pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 40 years old and is married. He lives with his two children in the Ventanas canton of the Los Ríos province.

Juan is a member of the Victoria communal bank, in the Pantano area of the Ventanas. Here the people make a living in farming and raising livestock.

Juan makes a living growing corn. He is applying for this loan in order to buy fertilisers to sow his seeds, and to rent land. Juan makes his purchases in Ventanas and in Mocache.

Juan's dream is to do better financially in order to have a better quality of life. One challenge that he is facing is beating the weeds. In his spare time Juan likes to play football and spend time with his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Yarmukhamed

texts.ru: Ярмухамед уроженец села района Руми. Он семейный человек в возрасте 43 лет. Ярмухамед кормит семью с помощью деятельности растениеводства. Он на своем земельном участке выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Теперь Ярмухамед решил начать разводить скотов. Он будет заниматься животноводством и растениеводством параллельно. У него имеется коровник, где он будет содержать скотов и не большой опыт, который достался от предков. Только финансовое положение Ярмухамеда не позволяет ему начать бизнес животноводства. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом. На деньги от кредита он купит маленьких скотов.
texts.en: Yarmukhamed was born in a village in the Rumi district. He is 32, married, and supports his family by farming. He has his own plot of land and grows crops. Now he would like to start breeding cattle. He will both raise livestock and farm at the same time. He has a barn for cattle and some experience from his parents. His financial situation is the only thing keeping him from starting a livestock business, so he applied for a loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to start a livestock business.

loans.name: Nurgyz

texts.ru: Нургыз 35 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Все дети школьного возраста. У Нургыз - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Нургыз занимается животноводством и полеводством, так как животноводство и полеводство является основной деятельностью в сельской местности. Нургыз стартовала 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нургыз, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нургыз обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку породистого жеребенка для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Нургыз планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку бытовой техники.
texts.en: Nurgyz is 35 years old, married, and is raising three children with her husband. All of their children are still school age. Nurgyz has a high school degree and, like all the residents in the region, is raising livestock and crops as the main source of income for her family. She started the farm 15 years ago by purchasing livestock with 5,000 som (KGS). Due to her hard work and perseverance the family now owns two milk cows, a horse and 10 sheep. The monthly income from the farm is 11,000 som (KGS). In order to continue expanding the business Nurgyz has turned to "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan which she will use to buy a thoroughbred foal. She plans to use the profits from this loan to purchase more livestock and eventually upgrade the household appliances.

loans.use: to buy a thoroughbred foal

loans.name: Shahnozakhon

texts.ru: Шахнозахон жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Шахнозахон учится на 3 курсе Политехнического Института Технологического Университета Таджикистана. Она учится успешно. Шахнозахон хочет организовать свой бизнес. Она хочет начать бизнес купле продажей национальных сувениров, произведёнными таджикскими женщинами. С такой идеей она участвовала в конкурсе «Лучший бизнес идея» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она активно участвовала в конкурсе и показала свою целеустремленность. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3500 долларов США для покупки сувениров. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Shahnozakhon is a happy and hardworking woman, She is 20 years old. She is single and lives with her parents. Shahnozakhon is a junior at the Technical Institute of the Tajik National University. She is a successful student. Shahnozakhon wants to start her own business. She wants to sell Tajik souvenirs made by Tajik women. With this idea she participated in the "Best Business Idea" competitions organized by the Association of Business Women. She actively participated in the competition and showed her dedication. Now she is requesting a loan of 3500 US dollars to purchase souvenirs. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to buy souvenirs for organizing a new business

loans.name: Kevin Javier

texts.es:
Kevin de 20 años de edad es un joven con muchos sueños, y sus deseos es seguir estudiando, ha terminado sus estudios en educación básica (noveno grado) está soltero, no tiene hijos y vive con sus padres y sus hermanos.

Kevin ayudaba a trabajar en la siembra de maíz y sorgo con su padre, desde la edad de 12 años, en los tiempos libres que tenía cuando no asistia a clases.Tiene conocimientos en cómo preparar los suelos y los cultibos para el proceso de producción de dichos cultivos. La necesidad de ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, lo llevo a tomar una decisión difícil, la cual fue de iniciar a trabajar y abandonar los estudios. Así fue como logro ingresar en una maquila, donde está encargado de la elaboración de elásticos. Sus turnos son de 7:00am a 4:00pm y le toca viajar todos los días, en bus y recorre aproximadamente 20 kilómetros. 

El crédito piensa invertirlo en los gastos educativos para todo el año, ya que hará un gran esfuerzo para continuar con sus estudios, ya que iniciara la educación media en cursos nocturnos. Los cuales inician a las 5:00pm y finalizan a las 7:30pm, de lunes a viernes, lo cual permitirá, que continúe trabajando de día, para luego incorporarse a las clases.

Kevin sueña con terminar sus estudios en educación media, para luego continuar con su preparación académica en educación superior, y tener un título como profesional, con lo cual podría optar a un mejor empleo y a la vez podrá ayudar a sus padres, para que la calidad de vida sea mejor. Ya con el crédito se está contribuyendo a que este joven, tenga mayores posibilidades de cumplir estos sueños. Ya que es un ejemplo claro de superación.
texts.en:
Kevin, who is twenty years old, is a young man with many dreams. His wish is to continue studying. He completed his basic education (9th grade). He is single, has no children, and lives with his parents and siblings.

From the age of twelve, Kevin used to help his father sow corn and sorghum during his spare time when he wasn't attending school. He knows how to prepare the soil and crops for corn and sorghum production. The need to help his parents with household expenses led him to make a difficult decision: to withdraw from school and begin working. This was how he managed to get a job at a textile mill, where he is responsible for making elastic. His shift is from 7:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.; he has to travel every day by bus and his commute is approximately twenty kilometers.

He is planning to use this loan to cover his educational expenses for the entire year. He will make a great effort to continue studying, considering that he will start his high school education by taking night classes. The classes run from 5:00 p.m. to 7:30 p.m., Monday through Friday; this will allow him to continue to work during the day and attend classes afterwards.

Kevin dreams of graduating high school to then go on to higher education and earn a degree, which would allow him to look for a better job. At the same time, he will be able help his parents have a better quality of life. With the loan that is being contributed to this young man, he may have a better chance of achieving his dreams. He is a clear example of self-improvement.

loans.use: to cover his educational expenses for the entire year.

loans.name: Ulpat

texts.ru: Улпат 57 лет, замужем, многодетные родители семерых детей. Все дети семейные, проживают отдельно, самостоятельно, часто навещают родителей. Самый младший сын проживает с родителями и помогает по хозяйству. У Улпат - среднее образование, она на пенсии, имеет звание "Мать-героиня". В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Улпат занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 33 года назад, с 4,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Улпат, на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова с теленком, 8 овец, а также 1,35 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает овощи, арбузы и кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Улпат обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку семян овощей, семян арбузов, семян кукурузы и удобрений. Доходы от кредита Улпат планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Ulpat is 57 years old, married, and the parent of seven children. All the children are married, live separately, self-sufficiently, and often visit their parents. Only the youngest son resides with the parents and helps around the farm.

Ulpat has a secondary education. She is retired and has the distinction of "Mother-Hero". As a main source of income for her family, Ulpat raises crops and livestock, having begun 33 years ago with 4,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Ulpat currently has: one dairy cow with calf, eight sheep, and also 1.35 hectares of land, on which annually she grows vegetables, watermelons, and corn for on-farm consumption and sale. Monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her farm, Ulpat turned to the bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase seeds for vegetables, watermelons and corn, and fertilizers.

Ulpat plans to invest income from the loan in propagating the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for home repairs.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, watermelon seeds, corn seeds, and fertilizers

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto es un hombre soltero de 36 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja en unión de hecho y sus  cuatro hijos de los cuales son; dos hombres  y dos mujeres, ambos estudian por las mañanas y por las tardes ayudan a sus padres en los oficios de la casa, ellos viven en el Departamento de Sololá.
Don Gilberto es un hombre que lucha por salir adelante junto a su familia. El actualmente se dedica al oficio de la agricultura, eligió esta actividad porque su padre se dedicaba a lo mismo y es por ello que gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre, ahora cuenta con un trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos y ganancias que le ayudan a cubrir los gastos de su familia. Como también comenta que se dedican junto a su esposa a vender pollos porque es otra fuente de ingresos que les ayuda a salir adelante.
El ahora ha decidido solicitar un préstamo de Q 8,000.00 para la compra de una cuerda de terreno que servirá para cultivar sus verduras ya que por el momento esta alquilando el terreno.
Su mayor sueño es generar más ganancias a través de la labor que realiza, con el propósito de mejorar la economía y el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a 36 year old single man who lives with his common-law wife and his four children, two of whom are male and two female. They all study and in the evenings help with the housework. They live in the department of Sololá. Gilberto is a person who fights to get ahead with his family. He is a farmer and he chose this field as it was what his father did. By doing this and thanks to the teachings of his father, he now has work that generates good income and profit that helps cover the expenses of the family. He comments that along with his wife he also sells chickens as it is another source of income to get them ahead. 

Gilberto has decided to request a loan of 8,000 GTQ to buy a cuerda (about 715 square meters) of land which he will use to grow vegetables as at present he rents land. His main dream is to make more money from his labor with the goal of improving the finances and well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to cultivate.

loans.name: Maria Emilia

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive junto a su esposo, tres hijos y dos nietos, aprendió de sus tíos a elaborar comida, hoy en día su negocio ha mejorado y ya tiene dos años de poseer una tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, trabaja todos los días, de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar aceite, granos básicos, bebidas, carnes, detergentes, jabón, etc., para surtir más la tienda y lo necesario para la comida que vende, con lo que espera vender más y con las ganancias solventar sus deudas.
Sueña con mejorar la venta de comida y tener una tienda más surtida para cumplir puntualmente con los compromisos familiares.
texts.en:
María is married, and she lives together with her husband, three children, and two grandchildren. Her aunt and uncle taught her how to cook. Presently, her business has improved, and she now has had her store, where she sells essential products, for two years. She works every day from 7:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.

She will use this loan to buy oil, staple grains, beverages, meat, detergent, soap, and so forth to further stock her store as well as the necessary ingredients to make her food. With this, she hopes to increase her sales and use the earnings to pay off her debts.

She dreams of increasing her food sales and having a further stocked store in order to promptly meet her family commitments.

loans.use: to buy oil, staple grains, beverages, meat, detergent, soap, and so forth.

loans.name: Lucila Dalila

texts.es:
Lucila de 27 años de edad,  trabaja en la unidad de salud,  es soltera vive con sus padres. Lucila llego a realizar sus estudio hasta el bachillerato, ya que sus padres le dieron sus estudios y lograron que se graduara. 
Hoy en día ella trabaja para ayudar a los pequeños hermanos que están en secundaria, entre 8° y 9° grado ya que sus padre trabajan y los trabajo que tiene su padre no alcanza para los estudio de los hermanos, como  le ayudaron sus padres a ella, ella les ayuda a sus hermanos para que logren graduarse. 

Ella  no posee ningún tipo de negocio, pero si tiene un empleo en la unidad de salud, ella trabaja en el área de archivo y tiene como 3 años de experiencia. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar los útiles escolares como mochilas, cuadernos, etc. ya que la escuela les brinda los útiles y el uniforme, solo le toca lo demás para que ella compre.

Ella menciona que en el futuro, quiere ver a sus hermanos graduarse de bachillerato como lo logro ella, y que puedan lograr tener un buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Lucila is 27 years old, works in the health unit, is single, and lives with her parents. Lucila completed high school, since her parents supported her studies and made sure she graduated. 

Today she is working to help her younger siblings who are in middle school, between 8th and 9th grade. Their parents work but the work that their father has is not enough for the siblings' studies. Since her parents helped her, she is helping her siblings so that they are able to graduate. 

She does not have any type of business, but she has a job in the health unit. She works in the records department and has three years of experience. 

The loan that she is requesting is to buy school supplies like backpacks, folders, etc, since the school provides other supplies and the uniform; it is only up to her to buy the rest. 

She mentions that in the future, she wants to see her siblings graduate high school like she achieved, and for them to have a good job.

loans.use: to buy school supplies like backpacks, folders, etc.

loans.name: Jibson Limber

texts.es:
Jibson  tiene 19 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con su esposa y los suegros en Mocache Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Jibson se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, cacao y arroz.

Solicita el crédito para los insumos que necesita para la agricultura como  abono, insecticida,  fertilizantes, urea, fungicida. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas en el Comercial Donoso. El sueño es comprar una casa y un carro para poder sacar la cosecha. El desafío al que se enfrenta es las enfermedades y plagas. En su tiempo libre le gusta viajar con su familia.
texts.en:
Jibson is 19 years old and in a common-law relationship. He lives with his wife and in-laws in Mocache, Los Ríos province.

He is a member of the Victoria communal bank located in Recinto Pantano, which is part of Ventanas canton. The inhabitants farm and raise livestock.

Jibson is a farmer and grows corn, cacao and rice.

He is requesting a loan for the agricultural supplies he needs to farm, such as manure, insecticide, fertilizers, urea, fungicide. He makes his purchases in Ventanas at the Donoso store. 

His dream is to buy a home and a vehicle so that he can transport his harvest. The challenges he faces are crop diseases and pests. In his free time he likes to go on trips with his family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and manures for growing rice.

loans.name: Chunnu Lom Group

texts.en:
“My husband's physical torture still haunts me and beats the hell out of me.” says Rengmom. Rengmom has been an active member of Chunnu Group and she still is. She is a divorcee and lives with her two kids at her parent's house. She is the featured borrower for the group and she is pictured with her hand raised. All together, 16 women members joined the group and they co-operate well. They live in a village that is about 40 kms from the capital town of Manipur, one of the northeastern states in India.
 
Rengmom runs a grocery shop located on the front side of the house. The shop is her main source of income and she is actively involved in it. She sells different varieties of cereals, edible oils, shampoo, candles, matchsticks, potatoes, onions and other essential commodities. She usually gets the supplies from the main market at wholesale prices to earn more profits. She does not have a separate house for herself and the kids but she is planning to build one on her own once she is stable in her business and investment. She aspires to become one of the most successful grocery shop owners in the village and tries her best to be the largest retail supplier for the villagers. She says, “Thank you so much Kiva and WSDS for the support". She and her friends will always remain grateful and thankful. Her dream is to provide a separate shelter for her kids and provide them with a good education.

The other group members are engaged in poultry and piggery businesses.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her grocery shop,

loans.name: Karol Lizeth

texts.es:
Karol  es una Joven animada y responsable,  trabaja los fines de semana como vendedora en un almacén de ropa, es  reconocida  por tener una actitud respetuosa con la gente del trabajo  y  mantiene un buen desempeño laboral,  en el año 2008 obtuvo  reconocimientos por ser una gran deportista representando el  colegio “Fe y alegría” y  la localidad , fue seleccionada para participar en las competencia del IDRD enfrentándose  con todas las localidades,  obtuvo el primer puesto en la prueba de velocidad y resistencia siendo  la más pequeña de  las rivales es muy veloz y ágil , además de ganar menciones de honor en  la  clase de inglés y religión  es  muy apasionada por el deporte,  siempre le gusta  verse bien,  mantener el cuerpo ejercitado y la salud en buenas condiciones, la manicura le fascina,  todo lo que la haga verse bien  llega con algo nuevo, siempre hace practicas  con ella misma, trata de perfeccionarse cada día aunque tenga errores de ellos aprende y se alimenta en conocimiento.  
Karol  tiene una   familia  muy unida y ella ama a el hermano, si al hermano se lo llevaran a prestar el servicio militar, ella se sentiría muy mal, ya que es   por quien cada día lucha para que tenga todo lo que desea,  karol trabaja para pagar el estudio y el convenio que se ofrece con kiva seria de una ayuda grande, ella  quiere que la mama no tenga la responsabilidad,  si no que con la plata que podría gastar pagando el estudio de karol,  podría estar comprando algo para ella .
texts.en:
Karol is a young person who is full of life and responsible. She works on the weekends as a saleswoman in a clothing store. She is recognized as having a respectful attitude with the people at work and she maintains a good work performance. 

In 2008 she received recognition for being a great athlete, representing the "Fe y alegría" high school and the town. She was selected to participate in the IDRD competition, competing against all of the nearby towns. She received first place in the speed and resistance event, being the smallest of the competitors, she is very fast and agile. 

In addition to receiving honors mentions in her English and Religion classes, she is very passionate about sports, and she always likes to do well, exercise often, and keep her health in good condition. She likes giving manicures, it is a new skill. She always practices on her own nails, and she is trying to perfect her skills every day. Even though she makes errors, she is increasing her knowledge of the skill.

Karol has a very united family and she loves her brother. If her brother has to serve in the military, she would feel very bad, since it is for him that she fights everyday so that he has everything he wishes for. Karol is working to help pay for her studies, and the agreement that she has with Kiva would be a big help. She wants her mother not to have the responsibility, but rather with the money that she would be paying for Karol's studies, she would be buying something for herself.

loans.use: to pay one semester's registration fees.

loans.name: Agna Bailo's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé en Décembre 2009. Elles jouissent d’une grande expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois pour avoir faire en majorité plus de 5 cycles. Elles sont toutes issues du même quartier et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Agna (debout à l’extrême gauche avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette  du groupe, elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont 01 fille et 04 garçons. Elle est vendeuse de couscous à base de mil et de maïs. Elle achète les graines de mil ou de maïs et fait la transformation pour la revente le soir devant son domicile. Elle jouit d’une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité pour l’avoir pratiqué depuis plus de dix ans.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner au moins 5 sacs de 60 Kg de mil et de maïs à 11 000 et un seau de 20 Kg de patte d’arachide à 12 500.

Les bénéfices de son activité, elle les utilisera pour appuyer son mari dans le suivi scolaire des enfants et la gestion de la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
This group is made up of very active women from the "banc villageois" created in December 2009. They have a lot of experience in the "banc villageois" program as most of them have participated in more than 5 loan cycles..

All of the women come from the same neighborhood and get along well with each other. They are all in small business. Agna (pictured standing on the far left with her hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is married and the mother of 5 children, 1 girl and 4 boys. 

Agna sells couscous made from millet and corn. She buys millet or corn grains and processes them for resale at night in front of her home. She has much experience in this business after having conducted it for more than ten years.

With her loan, Agna plans to acquire at least 5 60-kg bags of millet and corn at 11,000 francs CFA and one 20-kg bucket of peanut paste at 12,500 francs CFA. She will use the profits from her business to help her husband pay for the children's schooling and to take care of daily expenses.

loans.use: to acquire at least 5 60-kg bags of millet and corn at 11,000 francs CFA and a 20-kg bucket of peanut paste at 12,500 francs CFA

loans.name: Lizeth Giovanna

texts.es:
Ella es lizeth, una joven emprendedora comprometida con lo que hace inquieta por lo que le gusta que es el área se la salud y la belleza, porque desde pequeña siempre ha sido vanidosa, es muy trabajadora y ve como motor principal la familia y la hermana que tiene un retraso de aprendizaje,  por esa razón debe exigirse más para sacarla adelante, escogió campo alto como institución para estudiar ya que es una institución que inspira y capacita las personas para crecer educativamente para poder tener mejor oportunidad laboral, se enteró de un subsidio que se llama convenio  kiva, le llamo mucho la atención y la emociono porque ellos la pueden ayudar y serian motivadores, ángeles que arian realidad la aspiración y sueño que ella desea cumplir, escogió el programa del área de la salud técnico laboral y cosmetología y estética integral porque trabaja como manicurista, es buena en lo que hace y le gusta aprender  cosas para tener un mejor futuro y lo importante sacarle provecho a lo que más le gusta que es capacitarse y a ayudar a la familia y a la hermana.
Gracias
texts.en:
Lizeth is a young entrepreneur who is committed to the things that make her curious. What she likes is the area of health and beauty, since she has been vain since she was young. She is very hardworking and is the principal driving force of the family. Her sister has a learning disability. For that reason, she needs to work harder to help her sister forward. She chose Campo Alto as an institution to study since it is an institution that inspires and trains people to grow educationally in order to have better work opportunities.

She found out about a loan that is called a Kiva agreement, and it drew her attention and excited her because they can help and motivate. They are angels that make her aspirations and dreams a reality. She chose the program in health, cosmetology, and aesthetics because she works as a manicurist. She is good at what she does and she likes to learn things to have a better future. The important thing is to train in the things that she likes the most, and help her family and sister.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's registration fees.

loans.name: Marta Elena

texts.es:
Marta es una señora casada de 50 años de edad, vive junto a sus cuatro hijos en el Departamento de Sololá.
Ella comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos de niños, en las diferentes calles de su comunidad. Ahora cuenta con dos años de experiencia en esta actividad que es bastante productiva y rentable. A través de lo que realiza obtiene ingresos y ganancias aceptables que le ayudan a contribuir a la economía de su familia.
Ella ahora esta solicitando un préstamo de Q 9,000.00 para la compra de ropa para niños ya que desea variar su negocio para darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes y así incrementar sus ganancias.
Su sueño es tener un local en su comunidad en donde pueda colocar su negocio para que se pueda apreciar de una mejor manera su producto.
texts.en:
Marta is a married woman who is 50 years old. She lives with her four children in the Department of Sololá.

She comments that she works in the sales of children's clothing and shoes, on the different streets of her community. She now has two years of experience in this activity, which is very productive and profitable. Through it she receives income and acceptable profits that help her contribute to the economics of her family. 

She is now requesting a loan of 9,000 GTQ for the purchase of children's clothing, since she wants to have a greater variety in her business to give a better service to her customers, and increase her profits. Her dream is to have a place in her community where she can put her business so that her products can be appreciated better.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing.

loans.name: Diarra's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 23 femmes fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 07 février 2002. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes qui habitent pour la plupart dans le même village. Des femmes qui entretiennent de bonnes relations et font comme principale activité le commerce de détails.
Aminata debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 30 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont 1 garçon et 3 filles.
Avec le prêt elle va acheter 4 sacs de carotte, le sac à 15 000fcfa et elle revend le kilo de carotte à 250fcfa.Elle achète 3 sacs de choux, le sac à 12 000fcfa, et elle revend le kilo de choux à 250fcfa. Elle achète aussi 1 sac de manioc à 20 000fcfa et revend le kilo à 400fcfa.
Avec les bénéfices, elle va entretenir ses enfants surtout en achetant de la nourriture et aussi réinvestir dans son commerce.
texts.en:
This 23-women group belongs to the “banc villageois” (financing group) which was created on February 7, 2002. It gathers women who for the most part reside in the same village, have good relationships, and whose main business is retail.

Aminata, who is standing to the right in the picture with her hand raised, is 30 years old. She is married and a mother of four, one boy and three girls.

With the loan, she will purchase four bags of carrots for 15,000 XOF each; she retails carrots for 250 XOF a kilo. She will also purchase three bags of cabbage for 12,000 XOF; she resells cabbage for 250 XOF a kilo. She will also purchase one bag of manioc for 20,000 XOF, and retail it for 400 XOF a kilo.

With the profit she will take care of her children, mainly by purchasing food, and she will also reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Thioro's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 23 femmes fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 07 février 2002. Ce dernier regroupe des femmes qui habitent pour la plupart dans le même village. Des femmes qui entretiennent de bonnes relations et font comme principale activité le commerce de détails. Anta debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont 2 filles,2 garçons. Avec le prêt elle va faire du commerce de poissons et de sucre.
Avec le crédit elle va acheter 1 sac de sucre à 25 000fcfa et elle revend le kilo à 600fcfa. Avec le reste elle achète aussi du poisson l'unité à 250fcfa et elle le revend à 300fcfa. Une activité qu'elle fait périodiquement 
Avec les bénéfices, elle va épargner,réinvestir dans son commerce et si possible faire de l'embouche.
texts.en:
This 23-women group belongs to the “banc villageois” (financing group) which was created on February 7, 2002. It gathers women who for the most part reside in the same village, have good relationships, and whose main business is retail.

Anta, who is standing to the right in the picture, with her hand raised, is 37 years old. She is married and a mother of four, including two girls and two boys. With the loan, she will retail fish and sugar.

With her loan, she will purchase one bag of sugar for 25,000 XOF; she retails it for 600 XOF per kilo. With the rest of the money, she will also purchase fish for 250 XOF each, to be retailed for 300 XOF, a business in which she is periodically active. 

With the profit she will save, reinvest in her business, and if possible start fattening animals.

loans.use: to buy sugar and fish

loans.name: Nguira's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 5 femmes fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 20 avril 2010.Ce dernier regroupe des membres qui habitent le même quartier. Ces femmes vivent une parfaite harmonie et font comme activité le commerce et l'embouche. 
Sokhna debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont 3 garçons. Elle s'active dans l'embouche bovine, une activité qu'elle pratique depuis qu'elle a intégré le banc villageois. En parallèle elle fait aussi le commerce e mil.
Le crédit va lui permettre d'acheter 3 bœufs à 375000f, qu’elle va élever en 3 mois. Une fois les sujets bien engraisser elle compte revendre l'un 200000f ou même 225000f. Ainsi pour assurer la nourriture des bêtes, elle fait comme activité parallèle le commerce de mil.
Les bénéfices lui servent à entretenir ses enfants et à renforcer ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This group of five women belongs to the “banc villageois” (financing group) which was created on April 20, 2010. These women live in perfect harmony and their businesses are retail and livestock fattening.

Sokhna, who is standing to the right in the picture with her hand raised, is 41 years old. She is married and a mother of six, including three boys. Her activity is cattle fattening, a business she has been in since she joined the “banc villageois.” In parallel, she also sells millet.

The loan will allow her to purchase three cows for 375,000 XOF. She will raise them for three months. Once the animals are well fattened, she is planning on reselling them for 200,000 XOF each, perhaps even 225,000 XOF. To ensure that she has feed for the animals, she has a parallel business trading millet.

She uses profit to provide for her children and to grow her savings.

loans.use: to purchase three cows.

loans.name: Jacqueline's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé en Décembre 2009. Elles jouissent d’une grande expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois pour avoir faire en majorité plus de 5 cycles. Elles sont toutes issues du même quartier et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Jacqueline (assise dans la première rangée à la 4ième position de la gauche vers la droite), est emprunteuse vedette du groupe,  elle est âgée de 29 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 02 filles. C’est l’une des leaders du banc villageois et c’est une femme très rigoureuse. Elle tient toujours sa gargote où elle prépare et vend le petit déjeuné dans son quartier.  …, une activité qu’elle fait depuis plus 5 ans.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner en denrée au niveau des grossistes du marché central de pour stocker et préparer (02 sacs de  sucre pour 25 000 F CFA l’un, un seau de mayonnaise à 7 000 F CFA, un paquet de 12 lait concentré sucré à 13 200 F CFA, du café traditionnel 3.5 Kg à 4 200 F CFA et divers autres produits nécessaires pour la préparation des mets.
 
Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront en plus d’assurer le suivi scolaire de ses filles d’achat un terrain dans un futur proche.
texts.en:
This group is composed of women who are very active in this “banc villageois” (financing organization) created in December 2009. They benefit from a great amount of experience in the “bancs villageois” program, since most of them have gone through five cycles or more. They all come from the same neighborhood and get along well. Their main business is retail.

Mrs. Jacqueline (sitting in the first row, fourth from the left) is the group’s star borrower. She is 29 years old, married, and the mother of two daughters. She is one of the leaders of the “banc villageois” and a very dedicated woman. She is always present at her diner, where she has been preparing and selling breakfast to her neighborhood for over five years.

With this loan she is planning on stocking up on wholesale goods from the central market, to store and to prepare food: two bags of sugar at 25,000 XOF each, a bucket of mayonnaise for 7,000 XOF, a pack of twelve cans of sweetened condensed milk for 13,200 XOF, 3.5 kilos of traditional coffee at 4,200 XOF, and a variety of other products necessary to prepare dishes.

In addition to guaranteeing her daughters’ schooling, profits from her business will allow her to purchase a lot in the near future.

loans.use: to stock up on wholesale goods from the central market to prepare food (two bags of sugar at 25,000 XOF each, a bucket of mayonnaise for 7,000 XOF, a pack of twelve cans of sweetened condensed milk for 13,200 XOF, 3.5 kilos of traditional coffee at 4,200 XOF) and a variety of other products necessary to prepare dishes.

loans.name: Ndeye Sophie's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 6 femmes fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 07 février 2002. Ce groupe regroupe des femmes qui habitent pour la plupart dans le même village. Des femmes qui entretiennent de bonnes relations et font comme principale activité le commerce de détails.
Ngoné debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont 2 filles, la cadette a 5 ans. Avec le prêt elle va faire du commerce, vente de légumes, d'arachide et de l'huile . Elle compte acheter 10 sacs de 100kg d’arachides à 20000f le sac pour le revendre à 27500f, transformés en huile ou revendus en graines.
Les bénéfices lui permettront de renforcer ses épargnes, de payer ses intérêts et d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille en appuyant ses enfants dans leurs frais de scolarité et d'habillement.
texts.en:
This group of six women belongs to the “banc villageois” (financing group) which was created on February 7, 2002. This group gathers women who for the most part live in the same village. They have good relationships and their main business is retail.

Ngoné, who is standing to the right in the picture with her hand raised, is 41 years old. She is married and a mother of four, including two daughters; the youngest is five. With the loan, she will retail vegetables, ground nuts, and oil. She is planning on purchasing ten hundred-kilo bags of ground nuts at 20,000 XOF each to resell it for 27,500 XOF, either processed into oil or resold as seeds.

With the profit she will increase her savings, pay interests, and improve her family’s conditions of living by helping her children with school and clothing expenses.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and ground nuts.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.es:
Bogotá  lugar de nacimiento  de jennifer,  tiene  26 años de edad  y durante el tiempo de vida ha sido una persona formada con principios y valores familiares y sociales que han permitido el cumplimiento de las metas a nivel personal y laboral,  de  igual manera se ha caracterizado por ser  una mujer emprendedora con sueños , metas  e ideales  los cuales en la mayoría ha cumplido, es graduada   como profesional  en administración de empresas comercial,  ahora para seguir la proyección competitiva quiere continuar estudiando  pero más enfocado para crear la propia empresa y la carrera seleccionada es cosmetología y estética integral, es por  eso que para ella es relevante la oportunidad que encuentra con el convenio KIVA, ya que puede lograr una meta más,  que no solo mejorara la calidad de vida sino la de la familia, puede ser un canal generador de empleo teniendo la oportunidad de construir empresa en un futuro, la meta después de terminar cosmetología y estética integral es crear un Spa en el cual se encontraran centralizados varios servicios estéticos como lo son: sauna,  jacuzzi, turco, masajes reductores, nutrición, gimnasio, depilación, limpieza facial, etc. con el fin de brindar un excelente servicio a los clientes potenciales según el segmento del mercado, este Spa es la imagen de una persona integra y especializada. 
Jennifer  ve una oportunidad empresarial en el mercado de estética, ya que  este va en crecimiento continuo en Colombia gracias a los nuevos mercados que se han creado a través del tiempo, la creación de una empresa en Colombia con servicios estéticos es un proyecto de vida que Jennifer tiene muy claro para lo cual necesita estar en capacitación continua en el área estética,  lo que quiere decir que los estudios no quedan solo en este técnico en cosmetología y estética integral sino que debe realizar seminarios, especializaciones y cursos que permitan crecer en el nivel estético y comercial para ser especializada en el spa marcando la diferencia con calidad y compromiso.
texts.en:
Bogota is the birthplace of Jennifer, who is 26 years old. Throughout her life she has been a person who was formed with principles and family and social values that have allowed her to accomplish her personal and career goals. In the same way, she has been characterized as an entrepreneurial woman with dreams, goals, and ideals, the majority of which she has accomplished. She graduated as a professional in commercial business administration. Now, to continue on a competitive route, she wants to continue studying, but more focused on creating her own business, and the career she has selected is cosmetology and integrated aesthetics. This is why the opportunity that she finds in an agreement with Kiva is relative, since she can accomplish one more goal, which will not only improve her quality of life but also that of her family. She can be a channel to generate employment, having the opportunity to construct a business in the future. Her goal after finishing cosmetology and integrated aesthetics is to create a spa in which various aesthetic services would be centralized, such as a sauna, jacuzzi, Turkish bath, reducing massages, nutrition, gymnasium, depilation, facial cleansing, and so forth, with the goal of offering excellent service to the potential customers according to the market segment. This spa is the vision of an honest and specialized person.

Jennifer sees a business opportunity in the aesthetics market, since it is in continual growth in Colombia thanks to the new markets that have been created over time. The creation of a business with aesthetic services in Colombia is a life project that Jennifer sees very clearly and for which she needs to be in continual training in the area of aesthetics, which means that her studies won't stop with being a technician in cosmetology and integrated aesthetics, but she will also need to complete workshops, specialized training, and courses that allow her to grow in aesthetic and commercial levels to become a specialist in the spa, differentiating her business with quality and dedication.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of educational fees.

loans.name: Adolfo Candido

texts.es: Don Adolfo, tiene un hijo de 12 años bajo su cargo,  labora junto a su esposa en la actividad de la agricultura, siembra papaya y guayabas taiwanesa, lo que comercializa para mantener a su familia. Solicita el crédito para seguir invirtiendo en este rubro, comprara abono y  más plantitas de papayas para  aumentar su cultivo.
texts.en: Adolfo is responsible for providing for his 12-year-old son. He works alongside his wife in the farming industry. He sows papaya and Taiwanese guavas, which he sells to provide for his family. He is requesting the loan to continue investing in his crops by purchasing manure and more papaya plants so that he can increase his yield.

loans.use: to buy manure and papaya plants to sow.

loans.name: Jose Ahirton

texts.es:
José tiene 19 años de edad  estado civil unión libre  vive con su esposa  en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

José se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de maíz,  arroz y soya.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos y para dar mantenimiento especifico a sus siembras.

Vende sus productos en Ventanas. El sueño es mejorar su vivienda. El desafío que se enfrenta  el mal tiempo y las enfermedades. En el tiempo libre le gusta viajar con su familia.
texts.en: José is 19 years old and lives with his wife in Ventanas in los Rios province. He is a member of the communal bank "Victoria" which is located in Pantano village in Ventanas canton and whose members all work in agriculture. José works in agriculture, growing corn, rice and soya. He is requesting the loan so that he can buy supplies to give specific maintanance to his crops. He sells his produce in Ventanas. His dream is to make improvements to his home. His greatest challenges are bad weather and diseases. In his free time he likes to go on trips with his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Las Tejedoras Group

texts.es:
María (ultima de izquierda a derecha en la fotografía) es una mujer de 49 años de edad, soltera, tiene dos hijos; actualmente vive junto a ellos en el departamento de Sololá.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y específicamente de trajes típicos que la gente de su comunidad usa. La venta de la ropa lo realiza en las diferentes comunidades de lado sur de Sololá. La venta de este producto la lleva a cabo especialmente con las mujeres quienes son las que más demandan este producto; Ella comenta que le gusta esta actividad porque a través de ella se ha dado a conocer con mucha gente, además de eso esta labor es honesta, y le genera los ingresos necesarios para aportar al sostenimiento de su familia. Tiene 15 años realizando esta labor.
Ella decidió organizar un grupo con el objetivo de ayudarse mutuamente  y unir esfuerzos y conocimientos para un fin común y asi mejorar sus niveles de vida. 
Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería (ropa típica).
María sueña con ampliar su negocio y darles formación académica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria (the last one from left to right in the photograph) is a woman of 49. She is single and has two children. She now lives with them in the department of Sololá.

She sells clothing, specifically, the traditional clothing that the people in her community use. She makes sales of clothing in the various communities in the southern part of Sololá. She especially makes sales of these products to the women, who are the ones who most request these products. She comments that she likes her work because through it she has come to know many people. In addition to this, the work is honest, and it generates the necessary income for her to support the sustenance of her family. She has been doing this work for 15 years.

She decided to organize a group so that the members could help each other and join their efforts and knowledge for a common goal and thus improve their levels of living.

She will use the loan to purchase more merchandise (traditional clothing).

Maria dreams of expanding her business and giving academic training to her children.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise (traditional clothing)

loans.name: Jefferson Orlando

texts.es:
Jefferson tiene 20 años de edad estado civil soltero vive con su tia en el Cantón Mocache,  Provincia de los Ríos.
Es integrante de la ventanilla Victoria que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.
Jefferson  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz.  Solicita el crédito para la compra  de insumos y fertilizantes agrícolas. 
Las compras lo realizan en la ciudad de Ventanas en el Comercial Fertisa. El sueño es tener una casa y un carro. Los desafíos que se enfrenta son las plagas y las enfermedades. En el tiempo libre le gusta compartir con la familia y viajar.
texts.en: Jeffersion is 20 years old and single and lives with his aunt in Mochache Canton in Los Rios Province. He is a member of the "Victoria" communal bank which is located in Pantano Village in Ventanas Canton and whose members work in agriculture. Jefferson work in agriculture growing corn. He is requesting the loan to buy supplies and fertilizers. He will make his purchases in Ventanas in the Comercial Fertisa. His dream is to have his own house and car. The main challenges that he faces at work are plagues and diseases. He likes to spend his free time with his family and he also enjoys traveling.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and urea.

loans.name: Batma

texts.ru: Батме 58 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Все дети женаты, проживают отдельно, кроме младшего сына, который живет вместе с родителями, помогая им по хозяйству. У Батмы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Батма занимается животноводством, стартовав 40 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Батмы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 17 овец, также имеется земельный надел мерою 4 ГА, где сажают фасоль. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Батма обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Батма планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на повышение уровня благосостояния семьи.
texts.en: Batma is 58 years old and has raised 4 children with her husband. All of the kids are now married and live separately, except the youngest son who still lives with the parents and helps run the farm. Batma has a high school degree and is raising livestock for a living. She started 40 years ago by buying livestock with 1000 som (KGS). Now there are two milk cows, two calves and 17 sheep in the family herd, and the family grows beans on 10 acres of land. Monthly income from the farm and livestock is 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further grow their business Batma has turned to "Bai-Tushum" for a loan which she will use to purchase more livestock. She plans to invest the profits by further expanding the herd, as well as saving money for her family.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Nasim

texts.ru: Насим 22-летний юноша со своим целями и взглядами на жизнь. Он проживает в районе Вахш с матерью, отцом и братом. Насим занимается собственным делом. Он разводит коров и бычков и в дальнейшем продает на местном скотном рынке. Окончив школу в 2010 году, Насим не смог поступить в ВУЗ из-за нехватки финансов и он стал зарабатывать на жизнь. Четыре года назад он открыл свой бизнес по откорму и продаже крупнорогатого скота и по сей день продолжает его. Насиму в его деятельности помогают родители, ведь он за счет прибыли с бизнеса обеспечивает семью. Так как сейчас в скотном дворе Насима остался всего один бычок, он хочет увеличить поголовье скота для развития бизнеса. С такой целью Насим запрашивает в кредит 2000 долларов США, на сумму которого собирается приобрести несколько голов скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь.
texts.en: Nasim is a 22 year old man with goals in life. He lives in Vakhsh region with his mother, father and brother. Nasim has his own business - he raises cattle for resale at the meat market. After finishing school in 2010 Nasim couldn't financially afford to go to university, so he started to earn his living. Four years ago he opened his livestock business and is managing it even now. His parents assist Nasim, as he is providing for the whole family. Nasim currently owns only one calf but he wants to expand his herd. With this goal in mind Nasim is requesting a loan of 2000 US dollars which he will use to purchase several heads of cattle. He hopes for your help.

loans.use: to purchase a few cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new equipment, increase her inventory and help with marketing

loans.name: Sitoramo

texts.ru: Эту трудолюбивую 58-летнюю женщину зовут Ситорамо. Она родом из района Хамадони и живет там с мужем, шестью детьми, внуками и невестками. Муж Ситорамо является учителем и преподает в сельской школе. Один сын занимается стройкой. У Ситорамо имеется 2 га орошаемого участка земли, на которой она и ее семья выращивают сельскохозяйственные культуры. Одновременно Ситорамо разводит крупнорогатый скот. Она занимается животноводством в течение 10 лет. Ситорамо обратилась за кредитом, чтобы приобрести одну корову и увеличить поголовье скота. Этот кредит ей очень важен.
texts.en: The hardworking 58-year old woman is called Sitoramo. She lives in Hamadoni region with her husband and six children, grandchildren and daughters-in-law. Sitoramo's husband is a teacher at the village's school. One of her sons is a construction worker. Sitoramo owns 5 acres of irrigated land where she and her family grow various crops. Sitoramo also has raised cattle for 10 years. She has turned to Kiva for a loan to purchase a cow and expand her herd. This loan is very important to her.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment and supplies

loans.name: Taratarini Group

texts.en:
Six women from Titilagarh town in the Bolangir district in Odisha, India formed a group named Taratarini to take a loan from Mahashakti Foundation and expand their businesses. Alibha, a headstrong and confident lady, is one of them. The lady sitting in front in the photo raising her hand is Alibha. She is 40 years old and lives with her husband, two sons (20 & 15 years old) and her daughter (12 years old). All her children are continuing their studies. Her elder son is studying for an engineering degree. Alibha resides in a rented house in the town, due to the lack of a proper house of her own. 

Alibha has been running a mixture and fried peanut supply business for the last eight years with the handholding support of her husband. She purchases raw peanuts in bulk, fries them, and puts them in small packets in polythene. Her husband supplies them to the retailers at a wholesale price. In addition to this, she supplies mixture at wholesale. Alibha usually supplies 300 kg of fried peanuts to the retailers in a week. She purchases her stock of peanuts from three nearby wholesale market who are 200 km away. She gets a monthly income of Rs 6000 from the existing business. Out of this income,  she is hardly able to manage her household expenses and the educational expenses of her children. As her elder son is studying for his engineering degree at a distant place, the money for managing all these expenses from her scanty income poses a problem. So she wants to expand her business by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. Alibha wants to purchase more stock of raw peanuts with the present loan. This will help her to reduce her purchasing and transportation costs, since she has to replenish her stock frequently. Alibha hopes to save enough to build a good house of her own. She dreams of giving a better education to her children. 

The other five members of the group are Ranjulata, Basanti, Bhanumati, Pushpajali and Surendri who are running a meals hotel, a tea stall, a screen printing business, a betel nut shop and a business selling leaf plates, respectively

loans.use: To pay for raw peanuts in bulk

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru:
Алишер, целеустремленный, честный и пунктуальный мужчина, в возрасте 35 лет. Он женат, имеет двоих детей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Алишер дружно живет со своей семьей в сельской местности Дж. расуловского района. Алишер с детство  любил кормит быков. В данное время у него 3 голов быка. Так как сейчас зимний период, корм для крупно рогатого скота очень подорожал, поэтому Алишер,  решил подать заявку на кредит для покупки корма для скота. 
Он планирует откормить скот до весны и продать их мясникам по выгодной цене. Алишер заранее благодарен организации Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Alisher is a goal-oriented, honest and punctual 35-year-old who is married with two children.  His wife works on a dekhan farm.  Alisher gets along well with his family in the rural countryside of the J.Rasulov region of Tajikistan.  Since he was a child, Alisher has loved feeding bulls.  He currently has 3 bulls.  As cattle feed has gone up in price over the winter, Alisher has decided to seek a loan to buy such feed.  He is planning on fattening cattle until spring, then selling them to butchers for a profit.  Alisher would like to thank Arvand in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: buy cattle feed

loans.name: Manikmoti

texts.en:
Manikmoti is 29 years old. She is living in Dhupguri with her three children. All of them are school going and her elder son Pradip is in class X (grade 10) now. He is a very moderate student but obtains passing marks in all his regular subjects. 

As Manikmoti has only read up to class V (grade 5), she is not capable of assisting her son in his studies. Still, she tries to make him eligible for the board exam so that he can achieve a passing degree in the school's final examination, which is organized by the West Bengal Board of Secondary Education. Manikmoti’s husband Krishnakanu, being a farmer, is helpless in running their family with all their basic needs due to his low income. He can hardly manage his children’s educational expenses. To avoid these problems Manikmoti, after hearing about BJS (Kiva’s partner), an organization that helps the rural community financially, applied for a loan to purchase all the educational equipment and fees for her elder son Pradip’s education to make him eligible for the upcoming exam.

She hopes that she will use all the loan money for Pradip’s education so that he can make himself mentally strong to go ahead for further education. Pradip aims to become a doctor in the future, since in their village, there is no proper treatment and the hospital is very far away. Pradip wants to give them proper treatment by becoming a doctor in the future.

Pradip could not proceed with his education without the financial assistance of Kiva and BJS.

Manikmoti and Pradip (in the photo), after receiving financial help, are thanking BJS and Kiva heartily. They are very happy now after getting the loan.
