loans.use: To purchase study materials and pay the fees for her son’s education.

loans.name: Arati

texts.en:
Arati, 28 years old, is a rural housewife from the small village of Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She is uneducated and can only sign her name. Her husband Gurudev is 39 years old and is engaged in cultivation.  They have three school-going children (two sons and one daughter) who are in grade 8, grade 7 and grade 5, respectively. They live in their own kachha house (mud, straw and bamboo made).

Arati is very much interested in educating her children to become established in life. Her elder daughter Malati is a very bright and sincere student.  She stands first in her class every year. The income from Arati's husband's agribusiness is not sufficient to afford her children's educational expenses. So, due to their poor economic condition, Arati is unable to give her daughter the necessary educational equipment and proper private tuition.

She heard that BJS gives education loans to poor meritorious students to go on with their studies. Arati has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, to purchase Malati's text books, pens, pencils, uniform, study materials etc. and to pay tuition fees and school fees. She hopes this will help her daughter to proceed with her goal of becoming a doctor in the future.

Arati and her daughter Malati (shown in the picture ) are very glad and grateful to BJS and Kiva for funding this educational loan.

loans.use: To pay tuition and private tuition fees and buy educational supplies for her daughter

loans.name: Aisuluu

texts.ru: Айсулуу 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Сразу же после окончания школы Айсулуу вышла замуж за Марата. Старшему из детей 16 лет и самому младшему 5 лет. Супруг находится на заработках в Казахстане, работает там продавцом, ежемесячно высылает зарплату своей большой семье. У Айсулуу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айсулуу занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айсулуу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 15 овец, также имеет земельный надел мерою 2,0 ГА на котором ежегодно выращивают фасоль и многолетние травы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айсулуу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айсулуу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Aisuluu is 34 years old, married and is raising five children with her husband. Aisuluu married Marat, her husband, right after finishing high school. Now her oldest child is 16 and her youngest - 5. While her husband is working abroad in Kazakhstan as a salesman, he sends money every month to support his family. Aisuluu has a high school degree and she supports her family by raising livestock and farming. She started the family farm 14 years ago by purchasing livestock with 20,000 som (KGS). Now the herd has grown and the family has one milk cow and 15 sheep, as well as 5 acres of land for cultivation of beans and feed grasses. The monthly income from the farm is 10,000 som (KGS). In order to expand the business Aisuluu would like to purchase mores cattle, so she turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. She hopes to use the profits from the loan to purchase even more livestock and save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Salimjon

texts.ru: Этому молодому человеку 28 лет. Он дехканин. Его зовут Салимчон. Многое юноши Таджикистана отказываются заниматься сельскохозяйственными деятельностями, как их родители, предки и не находя другую работу уезжают в другие страны СНГ, чтобы прокормить семью. Но Салимчон остался на Родине ради своей семьи и принял семейную деятельность земледелия. Он сажает урожай в любое время года. Так как зима в Таджикистане не очень холодная и не долгая, солнце светить почти постоянно. Поэтому три сезона он сажает урожай на земельном участке, а зимой у него есть парник (сзади Салимчона). Сейчас он просит кредит, чтобы посадить очередной урожай. У него не хватило денег, чтобы купить достаточное количество семян. Он надеется, что ему помогут, он во время закончит посев и у него будет богатый урожай, что способствует увеличению семейного бюджета.
texts.en: This young man is 28 years old. He is a farmer and his name is Salimjon. Many young Tajik men refuse to take up farming like their parents and ancestors and, unable to find other work, leave the country to feed their families. But Salimjon has stayed in Tajikistan for his family and is managing the family's farm. He plants crops at all times of the year, as Tajikistan has a mild and short winter and the sun always shines here. During spring, summer and fall Salimjon grows crops at his farming plot, while in winter he raises crops in his greenhouse (which you see behind him in the photo). Currently Salimjon want to take out a loan to purchase seeds for the upcoming planting season. His own savings aren't enough to purchase as many seeds as he'd like. Salimjon hopes that he will get help from Kiva and be able to plant in time and collect a bountiful harvest, which will help his family's budget.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es:
Rosendo de 63 años de edad,  nunca fue a la escuela es casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos,  tienen 3 hijos acompañados, pero de alguna manera ayuda en su hogar y en el trabajo de la agricultura de él. Toda la vida se ha dedicado a  trabajar en este tipo de labor, sus padres le enseñaron a ser una persona muy responsable. Se levanta muy temprano y tiene que caminar unos 30 minutos hacia su parcela,  para comenzar el día de labores.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para pagar el alquiler de la tierra y comprar los insumos agrícolas. Su sueño es algún día pagar sus deudas y quedarse trabajando con las ganancias que obtenga de su cultivo, aunque dice es bien difícil por que también tiene que cubrir los gastos del hogar y la ganancia no es mucha pero le ayuda a sobrevivir.
texts.en:
Rosendo is 63 years old and never attended school. He is married and his wife takes care of the household chores. They have three children who are married. Sometimes they help him with the work around the house and with the farming duties. Rosendo has spent his entire life in this type of work. His parents taught him how to be a very responsible person. He wakes up very early and walks about 30 minutes to get to his parcel of land so that he can begin his workday.

The loan he is requesting will be used to pay the rent for the land and to buy farming supplies. His dream is to someday pay off his debts and keep the profit that he earns from his crops. Although it has been difficult, Rosendo says that he has been able to cover his household expenses and survive off what little income he earns.

loans.use: to pay the rent on his farmland and to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Chanchala

texts.en:
Chanchala, 50 years old, is from Maynaguri. She has completed her education up to class IV (grade 4) and is blessed with her only son Ananda, a student in class X (grade 10).

She is a housewife and her husband is running a small business. Her husband has a very small income, which makes it difficult to run Ananda’s education smoothly. As Ananda is in Class X, he needs private tuition, notes, guide books, solved question paper sets etc. but due to insufficient income, Chanchala is unable to give those things to her son. For this reason, she decided to take a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

She hopes her son will be well educated and wants to prevent him from losing any years while he is receiving his education. The loan will help her to give her child a higher education that will help her child to be a good and renowned businessman.

Chanchala and her son Ananda (shown in the picture) are highly obliged to BJS and Kiva for lending this money to go forward smoothly with a proper education.

loans.use: To pay her son’s educational expenses

loans.name: Jyotsna

texts.en:
Jyotsna, 32 years old, is a housewife living in the small town of Maynaguri with her husband, son and daughter. Her daughter Sampa is studying in class IX (grade 9) and is a very ambitious and sincere student. Jyotsna is an illiterate woman who only knows how to sign her name, but is well versed in her daughter’s regular studies because she knows that her daughter will not succeed if she does not pay proper attention to her studies. That is why she requests a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) for her daughter’s uninterrupted education. Her husband is a daily laborer and is struggling hard for more income but is helpless to cover the expenses of her daughter’s education. Her daughter Sampa has a very sharp memory. Jyotsna wants to give her the proper opportunity to be a knowledgeable and enterprising person who will take on the whole responsibility of her family in the future. 

Jyotsna and her daughter Sampa are very much satisfied now after getting the educational loan and thank BJS and Kiva because their dreams will come true.

loans.use: To pay her daughter's school expenses

loans.name: Kabita

texts.en:
Kabita, 26 years old, lives in Maynaguri with her husband and two children. Their children are studying in different classes. She is a housewife while her husband cultivates tea plants in their own field and sells tea to the local market. Their income is very inconsistent as the whole income depends on the quality of the tea because the local people are fond of the best quality tea. That is why Kabita cannot manage the household expenses and is unable to save money for her son’s education.

Now she asks BJS (Kiva’s partner) for a loan to purchase books, study materials, and uniforms for her elder son Vibek, who is reading in class VI (grade 6). She wants to make her son well educated for a suitable job where he can earn sufficiently to contribute to their family. With the help of this loan, Kabita wishes to give a bright future to her elder son so that he will not have to look backward anytime in his school life. She also wants to buy a cycle with this loan money, as the school is too far from their house and the conveyance expense is too high for them to bear.

She and her son Vibek are thankful to BJS and Kiva for this financial support.

loans.use: To pay for school expenses and to buy a cycle for commuting to school

loans.name: Bienvenu Guy

texts.fr: Guy est une homme de 44 ans fiancé père de 2 enfants de 12 et 18 ans. Il est commerçant et vend du poisson frais dans un marché de la capitale depuis 10 ans. c'est grâce à ça qu'ils s'occupe de sa famille. Le fait d'acheter le poisson détail ne rapporte vraiment grand chose pour lui. D'où l'importance de ce crédit pour son activité parce que ça lui permettra d'augmenter le stock de poisson, Cela lui évitera les déplacements quotidiens et diminuera ses frais de taxi, ça augmentera aussi ses bénéfices. Il réinvestira une partie de ses bénéfices dans son activité et le reste l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Guy is a 44-year-old man who is engaged to be married and the father of two children, ages 12 and 18 years old. He has been selling fresh fish in a market in the capital for 10 years. This business has allowed him to provide for his family. 

Purchasing fish at retail does not produce very much profit for Guy. That is why this loan is important for his business because it will allow him to increase his stock of fish. This will help him to avoid daily trips and will reduce his taxi costs, which will also increase his profits. He will reinvest a portion of his profits in his business and the rest will help him to provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: increase his stock of fish

loans.name: Furki

texts.en:
Furki is a married woman of 28 years. Her family consists of her husband and four children (one son and three daughters).  Her husband Saheb, 46, is a carpenter by profession. Both husband and wife are illiterate and can sign only their names. But they are providing an education to all their children, who are in grades 9, 6, 4 and 3 respectively. They live in Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.

The earnings of Furki's husband is too low to meet the daily expenses of the family of six members, so they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not allowing them to afford their children's educational expenses.

Furki's daughter Santana is in now grade 9. She is very much serious with her studies as well as with her examinations.  She always makes herself busy with her studies, as she has no private tutor. Furki's husband earns very little from his carpentry business, so he can't give financial sustenance to the family. Moreover, it is hardly possible for him to afford the educational expenses of his children

Furki learned that BJS gives education loans to poor meritorious students. She has taken a loan from them to purchase education articles such as pens, pencils, books, uniform and others and to pay for a private tutor and school fees for her daughter,

Furki and her daughter are very much grateful to BJS and Kiva for giving them the loan to continue her studies.

loans.use: To pay tuition and school fees and to purchase education equipment.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 34 years old. He lives with his wife in a village near Ramallah city called Almughayer. He has five children, and four of them attend primary school. Ahmad hopes to be able educate his children and give them the best in their life, so he is working hard for that. His main job is construction work.

Ahmad is asking Ryada for this loan to buy flagstones to pave his house and repair the ceiling to prevent the water from flowing down, which will help him to take a step forward, because he has a shortage of money to buy the things he needs. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy flagstones to pave his house and repair the ceiling to prevent the water from flowing down.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to merchandise her mini market.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Because Muna is a conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. 

Muna was born in 1978. She is married mother of four children, living in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat with her retired husband. Muna has been helping her husband in oil painting on wood for ten years. Her husband started his project as a hobby and started selling his work which was profitable to him. 

Now, her husband needs to buy more raw materials that he needs, such as wood and oil to be more productive and to raise his profits. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, Muna decided to help him by applying for this loan.

loans.use: to assist her husband to buy more raw materials for oil painting on wood.

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en:
Duaa is a conservative lady, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. 

Duaa was born in 1994. She lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat with her husband and two daughters. For the past two years, Duaa has been running her project of making detergents that her husband sells. She started her project selling a small amount of them. Now she needs to buy more materials for selling detergents in order to raise their profits and improve their living conditions. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more materials for selling detergents.

loans.name: Suad

texts.en:
Suad is a single lady who was born in 1989. She lives in a sector in Joran called Irbid with her three siblings and her parents. 

Suad has been trying her best to help her family in improving their living conditions by running her project of selling clothes for the last two years. She started her project selling a small amount of clothes and started expanding it gradually. Now she needs to add variety to her clothes in order to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of this, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a 20 years old lady who lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her parents and five siblings. 

Sanaa is studying for a Bachelors’ Degree majoring in Life Science. She is in her second year. She is planning to work in her field of study after graduation, to start her working life in order to help her family financially, as they are currently facing financial crisis which is not helping them pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Juan Vidal

texts.es:
Juan, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y dos hijos de 9 y 5 años, en casa de un amigo, se dedica a la compra y venta de hierro, bronce y lamina, lo aprendió de un amigo y su hermano, hoy lo hace de forma independiente.
El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de chatarra, para luego venderla, lo hace de forma ambulante, espera tener mejores ventas y aumentar sus ganancias con las que cancelara la deuda adquirida.
Aspira  a lograr tener un negocio que sea auto sostenible para tener mejores beneficios.
texts.en:
Juan has a partner, and he lives with his life partner and two children of 9 and 5 years old, at a friend’s house, he works buying and selling iron, bronze and sheet steel. He learned this trade from a friend and his brother, and now he does this independently.

He will use the loan to buy scrap iron, to then sell it, which he does as a street vendor. He hopes to have better sales and improve his earnings with which he will pay back the loan he takes out.

He aims to be able to have a self-sustaining business, in order to get better profits.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal.

loans.name: Maad

texts.en:
Maad is 20 years old. He is living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with his family consisting of five brothers and his parents. 

Maad is studying for a Bachelors’ Degree majoring in air-conditioning engineering. He is in his third year, and is planning to find a job that suits his field of study after graduation in order to start supporting his family financially. They are currently facing financial crisis which is not helping them to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 19 years old and lives with his family in Gaza. His living conditions prevented him from completing his higher education, so he is working distributing gas bottles to customers on his hand truck, which he has been doing since 2012. He earns approximately $500 per month. 

In order to improve his business and to make it easier and faster, Ahmad asked Ryada for this youth loan. He plans to buy a small motorcycle to transport the gas bottles.

Ahmad hopes that this loan will help him to support the needs of his family, and reinvest in his business. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy a small motorcycle to transport gas bottles.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is a conservative lady, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. 

Nawal was born in 1970. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her four sons and daughter. Her husband works at a governmental entity. Nawal has been trying her best to help her husband in improving their living conditions by running her project of raising goats and selling them and their products for the last five years. She started her project with a few goats. Now, she is facing a problem with feeding them, as she can’t afford to buy their food. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy food for her goats.

loans.name: Tharwah

texts.en:
Tharwa was born in 1974. She is a divorced lady living in an area of Jordan called Baqaa. Tharwa has been trying her best to support herself financially by running her own beauty salon in her house for the past years. She started it at home. Then she opened a special room for it. She took her experience from courses that she took in the past. 

Now she needs to buy more cosmetic products with added variety in order to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetic products with added variety for her salon.

loans.name: Rawan

texts.en:
Rawan is a 20-year-old lady who lives in a sector of Jordan called Mafraq with her parents and five siblings. She is studying for a Bachelors’ degree, majoring in History. She is in her second year and is planning to work in her field of study after graduation. 

She wants to start her work life in order to help her family financially as they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay her semester fees.

loans.name: Rawheyeh

texts.en:
Rawheyeh was born in 1991. She is a married lady living in an area of Jordan called Wihdat with her husband who is a truck driver and her only son. For two years, she has been trying her best to support her husband improve their living conditions and cover their son's needs by running her project of selling blankets from her house. 

She needs to expand it more now by buying a larger quantity of blankets and adding variety to them in order to attract more customers and raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more blankets for her business.

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en:
Tamam was born in 1991. She is a married lady living in an area of Jordan called Dairalla with her husband who is in the military. For a year, she has been trying her best to support her husband and improve their living conditions by running her project of selling clothes from her house. 

She needs to expand it more now by buying a larger quantity of clothes and adding variety to them in order to attract more customers and to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables and pickle containers.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 20-year-old and is from Gaza. He thought to do something to contribute to the family income, as his parents' income alone is not sufficient to fulfill the demands of all family members.

Starting a year ago, he has been sewing clothes for many shops in his area. He distributes them with help from his brothers. His dream is to make his own brand and sell in large areas.

Fadi is asking Ryada for this youth loan to buy another sewing machine and shelves. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success.

loans.use: to buy another sewing machine and shelves.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal was born in 1992. She is a single lady living in a rented house in an area of Jordan called Irbid with her five siblings and her parents. For two years, Amal has been helping her parents financially by running her project selling cosmetic products. 

She started her project selling a small amount of them to her relatives. Now she is receiving more customers and needs to purchase a larger quantity of cosmetic products with added variety, in order to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics products for her business.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa was born in 1994. She is a married lady living in an area of Jordan called Irbid with her husband who works in agriculture and her only son. For two years, she has been trying her best to support her husband, improve their living conditions and cover their son's needs by running her project of selling blankets from her house.

She needs to expand it more now by buying a larger quantity of blankets and adding variety to them in order to attract more customers and raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more blankets for her business.

loans.name: Sa'ed

texts.en:
Sa'ed is 28 years old and married with one child. He is a photographer of photos, and he lives in Hebron, which is a Palestinian city located in the southern West Bank, 30 kilometers south of Jerusalem. 

Sa'ed's house has three rooms and he wants to make it better. So he is asking Ryada for this loan to extend his plumbing and repair his bathroom. This will help his family take a step forward because he is short on money. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to extend his plumbing and repair his bathroom.

loans.name: Khalid

texts.en:
Khalid is 22 years old; he lives with his wife and child in the village of Zeita, which is a Palestinian town located in the eastern West Bank, 11 kilometers southeast of Tulkarm. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics, Zeita had a population of 2,852 inhabitants in 2007.

Khalid was working as a farmer, but now he is an employee at a local school in the village.

Khalid is asking Ryada for this loan to bleach and paint his house. This will help him take a step forward, because he is short on money to buy the materials he needs. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to bleach and paint his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her son improve his coffee shop by expanding it.

loans.name: Bisal

texts.en:
Bisal is a 19-year-old single young lady from Gaza city. She lives with her family in a very small simple house. Bisal is a second year law student. She would like to get a Bachelor's degree and find a job as a lawyer to help her family with part of their expenses.  

Bisal took a 505 USD Murabha loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. Bisal will use the laptop to do her homework and write reports. Bisal is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her brother appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies

loans.name: Yasmin

texts.en:
Yasmin is a 19-year-old single young lady from Gaza city. She lives with her family in a very small simple house. Yasmin is a second-year English Literature student. She would like to earn her Bachelor's degree and find a job as a teacher to help her family with part of their expenses.  

Yasmin took a 561 USD Murabha loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. Yasmin will be able to do her homework and write reports with the laptop. Yasmin is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her brother appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 24-year-old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a very small simple house. He works as an employee in a local firm where he earns a low income. This income helps him pay part of his university fees. Mohammad is a Literature student in his last year. He would like to earn his Bachelor's degree and find a job to help his family with part of their expenses.  

Mohammad took a 505 USD Murabha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new laptop for his studies. Mohammad will be able to do his homework and write reports with the laptop. Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Michell Stefany

texts.es:
Ella es michell,  ella necesita del beneficio ofrecido por el programa KIVA, que de acuerdo a la información que le suministraron, permite el tener un descuento para el semestre de Michel stefany quien es una Niña de 16 Años, Quien decidió estudiar En Campo Alto el Programa Auxiliar de Enfermería, ella siempre ha demostrado Gran interés en el Área de la salud , Además de ser una estudiante Responsable, Es muy difícil que ella y la familia puedan cubrir todos los gastos de los estudios superiores, ya que solamente el papa es quien sostiene y tiene un trabajo fijo.
Ellos son siete en la casa, las tres hermanas los papas y La Abuela, michel se ha preparado para aportar el granito de arena en construir una sociedad, Siendo este el programa que ella quiere estudiar tan importante , especialmente en un área donde ay tanta necesidad como lo es en el área de la salud.
Ellos en este momento lo están viviendo, con la abuela quien sufre de vértigo y no puede valerse por sí sola, y ve como a pesar de la juventud ella lo  convierte en un gran deseo en cuidar y ayudar a la abuelita sin importar lo que tenga que hacer, y siempre está con una buena actitud, ella ve ese espíritu de servicio en ella que le parece algo muy importante, especialmente en una persona que va estudiar una carrera como esta en la que tendrán que lidiar con tantas personas.
texts.en:
This is Michell Stefany. She needs a loan from Kiva as, according to the information given to her. she is allowed a discount on her semester of studies. Michell is 16 years and decided to study to be an auxiliary nurse at Campo Alto. Michell has always shown herself to be particularly interested in health. She is also a very responsible student. It would be very difficult for Michell and her family to cover the costs of further education as only the father of the family has a job to support everybody.

There are seven people living in Michell's home - Michell, her three siblings, her parents, and one grandmother. Michell is getting ready in order to be a small part of society through this important programme, especially as there is a big need for health care workers.

The grandmother currently lives with the family as she suffers from vertigo and cannot cope on her own. In spite of how young she is, Michell very much wants to look after and help her grandmother, no matter how much work it takes. Michell always has a good attitude and sees having a spirit of servitude as being very important, particularly for somebody studying for a career in which she will have to cope with so many people.

loans.use: to pay matriculation fees for one semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products - such as fizzy drinks, cereals, rice, sugar and more - in bulk.

loans.name: Genesis Mabel

texts.es:
Genesis es una joven de 22 años, vive en casa de sus padres en Santo Domingo de los Colorados, una ciudad con un clima cálido húmedo agradable. 
Genesis se dedica a la venta de medicina natural, distribuye su producto a sus compañeros de clase ya que está por terminar los estudios superiores, también los fines de semana recorre vendiendo de puerta en puerta. Es una joven muy trabajadora, con este negocio ha podido pagar sus estudios.
Es su primer crédito en Fundación Alternativa, está muy feliz porque la institución le ha brindado la ayuda para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración del producto medicinal, ya que tiene mucha clientela y no cuenta con el capital suficiente para invertir. Se siente muy agradecida con la institución y con Kiva por hacer posible su crecimiento laboral.
texts.en:
Genesis is 22 years old and lives with her parents in Santo Doming de los Colorados, a city with a pleasant, warm climate. 

Genesis makes a living selling natural medicines. She sells her products to her classmates, as she is also finishing her higher education. At the weekends Genesis also sells door-to-door. Genesis is very hard-working and, with this business, she has been able to pay for her studies.

This is Genesis's first loan from Fundación Alternativa and she is very happy because the organisation has provided her with help to buy basic supplies for preparing her medicinal products. Genesis has many customers but does not have enough capital to invest in her business. Genesis is very grateful to Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for making her professional growth possible.

loans.use: to buy basic materials to make her products.

loans.name: Abd Alsalaam

texts.en:
Abd Alsalaam is 22 years old. He works in a stone factory near his town. He lives with his wife in Deir al-Ghusun, a Palestinian town in the Tulkarm Governorate, located eight kilometers northeast of the city of Tulkarm in the northern West Bank. The town is near the Green Line. The town had a population of 8,242 in 2007.

Abd Alsalaam asked Ryada for this loan in order to paint his house and install doors and windows. That will give warmth to his family at home and provide better living conditions. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to paint his house and install doors and windows.

loans.name: Mopaikar

texts.ru:
Мопайкар 39 летняя женщина-предприниматель из района Хамадони. У нее есть дилерский центр на рынке района, где она занимается продажей сим-карт мобильных компаний, аксессуаров для телефона, а также перечисляет счета на телефоны. Мопайкар открыла свой дилерский центр 4 года назад. Сейчас она занимается этим делом одна, так как муж находится в России на заработках. У Мопайкар трое детей. Все они учатся в школе.  
Мопайкар обратилась за кредитом, чтобы приобрести ассортимент панелей для телефонов, а также перечислять счет в телефон. Ее собственного сбережения не хватает, и она очень надеется на вашу финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mopaikar is a 39 year old entrepreneur who lives in Hamadoni. She has a shop at the local market where she sells sim cards for mobile phones, phone accessories, and also adds minutes to phone accounts. Mapaikar opened her shop four years ago. She runs it alone now that her husband is working in Russia. Mopaikar has three children who are in school.

Mopaikar requested a loan to purchase a minutes for mobile phones and a variety of phone cases. Her own savings are insufficient, and she has high hopes for financial support.

loans.use: to buy cases and minutes for mobile phones

loans.name: Wael

texts.en:
Wael is a 44-year-old married man from the city of Jabalia. He lives with his wife and two kids, a son and a daughter, in a very small, simple house. He owns a stall in the local market where he sells pastry and candy products, from which he gets a low income. This income is barely enough to cover all of the family's needs. Wael would like to improve his business.

Wael took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products for his store to resell. By taking this loan, Wael will be able to increase his sales and also his income. 

Wael appears in the photo while working.

loans.use: to buy more pastry and candy products for his store to resell

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.

Khitam is a 36-year-old married woman from the city of Jabalia. She is the mother of two sons and two daughters. Her husband works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He also has a workshop for making furniture. It is a good business and helps them to pay for part of the family's expenses. 

Khitam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy textile for making furniture. With this loan, the workshop productivity will increase and so will the family income.

loans.use: to buy textile for making furniture.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 19-year-old single young man from Jabalia City. He lives with his family in a very small simple house. His father works as an employee in a local firm where he earns a low income. This income is barely enough to cover all of the family's expenses. Mohammad is a law student in his last year. He would like to earn a Bachelor's degree and find a job to help with part of the family's expenses.  

Mohammad took a 673 USD Murabha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new laptop for his studies. Mohammad will be able to do his homework and write reports with his laptop. Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh is 30 years old. She lives with her husband and two children near Nablus in Beit Furik. Beit Furik is a Palestinian town located nine kilometers southeast of Nablus, in the Nablus Governorate in northern West Bank. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics, the town had a population of 10,339 inhabitants in 2007.

Fatmeh asked Ryada for this loan to paint her house and install doors and windows that will help keep it warm, especially now in the winter. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her. Fatmeh's husband appears in the photo. Fatmeh apologizes, but she cannot publish her photo online for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to paint her house and install doors and windows that will help keep it warm, especially now in the winter.

loans.name: Bajes

texts.en:
Bajes is 47 years old. He works in a public institution. He lives with his wife and five children in Gaza in Sheikh Radwan, a district of Gaza City located nearly 3 kilometers northwest of the city center. It borders al-Shati camp to the southwest, Rimal to the south, and Jabalia to the east.

Bajes wants to make one room in his house better, so he is asking Ryada for this loan to paint the bathroom and repair it. This will help him to take a step forward, because he has a shortage of money. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to paint his bathroom and repair it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her husband buy a new sewing machine and textiles for his workshop.

loans.name: Ganijon

texts.ru: Ганичон жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 44 лет. Ганичон женат и имеет троих детей. Жена Ганичона домохозяйка, она работает по дому и воспитывает своих детей. Чтобы иметь постоянный доход в семье Ганичон занимается собственным бизнесом. Он продаёт мобильные телефоны и принадлежности для телефонов. Для этого у него имеется собственный магазин на местном рынке. Он покупает телефоны по оптовой цене на большом базаре и продаёт в своем маленьком городке. Этот товар имеет большой спрос среди населения такого вида города. Но всё равно прибыли от этого бизнеса хватает Ганичону только на пропитание. Он даже отправил старшего сына на заработки в Россию, чтобы тот приносил в семью дополнительный доход. Сейчас Ганичон хочет расширить свой бизнес для получения больше прибыли. Для этого он хочет расширить свой магазин и увеличить ассортимент своего товара. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку одной партии телефонов и некоторых принадлежностей для телефонов. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en: Ganijon is a cheerful and hardworking 44-year-old who is married with three children.  His wife tends to their home and takes care of their kids.  To have a steady source of income, Ganijon sells mobile phones and accessories from his own store at a local market.  He buys them wholesale at a large bazaar and sells them in his own small town.  There is a huge demand for these kinds of products there, but Ganijon is just barely able to make ends meet in spite of that.  He's even seen his son off to Russia, who went there as a migrant worker in hopes of being able to send money back home to his parents.  At the moment, Ganijon is hoping to expand his business, and thus increase his income.  He would like to be able to sell a greater variety of goods.  As such, he's turned to Arvand for a loan to stock up on cell phones and some accessories for them.  He would like to thank Arvand in advance for their help, and is hoping for a positive outcome.

loans.use: stock up on mobile phones and accessories for his business

loans.name: Mulloahad

texts.ru:
Муллоахаду 57 лет. Он уроженец одного из районов города Худжанда. Он дружелюбный и веселый мужчина. Муллоахад с женой воспитал двоих детей. Они уже взрослые им по 30 и 25 лет, они самостоятельные. 
  Муллоахад растил своих детей от дохода деятельности животноводства. Более 20 лет Муллоахад выращивает скотов. Он очень сильно любит свою работу, ему нравится сам процесс работы и то, что он получает свой честный доход.
  На сегодняшний день Муллоахад решил увеличить поголовья скота, но к сожалению достаточной суммы денег у него не оказалось, он решился взять кредит. Муллоахад верит, что ему помогут и его поставленные планы осуществляться. Помогите ему.
texts.en: Mulloahad is a 57-year-old resident of one of the various districts of Khujand.  He is friendly and cheerful, and has two children aged 30 and 25 who are already independent adults.  Mulloahad and his wife raised them using the money he made from farming livestock, which he's been doing for more than 20 years.  He loves what he does, both in and of itself as well as the fact that it's an honest living.  Currently, Mulloahad is seeking to add more cattle to his farm but lacks the money to do so.  As such, he's requesting a loan to buy cattle, and has hope that he'll be able to see his plans to fruition with your help.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Ranju

texts.en:
Ranju is a woman of 30 years. She is married, a housewife, and uneducated (can only sign her name). She is married to Subhas, age 38, who is a green grocer by profession, and he is also uneducated. Together they are raising three children (sons), two of whom are students and read in grade 6 and grade 1. They live in their own "kachha" house (mud-, straw- and bamboo-made) in the small village of East Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.

Ranju's husband grows green vegetables on his land and sells in the local market. His small business is their only source of income, which is too low to give enough financial sustenance to the family. He works hard but, due to lack of capital, he is unable to grow more vegetables on his land. So, he cannot cover all the needs of the family.

Ranju has decided to help her husband start another business by taking out a loan from Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS). She will use the loan to purchase a dairy cow and start a milk and milk products (butter, milk, paneer, cheese, etc.) business. Ranju chose BJS for this loan because they help small-scale farmers to grow economically. This loan will help to purchase a dairy cow, which will lead milk production, and to start a dairy products business. They will thus increase their income. This will ensure that the children receive a good education and also improve the family's living standards.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to start a milk supply and dairy products business.

loans.name: Sandhya

texts.en:
Sandhya is a 26-year-old married woman from a remote village North Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She is married to Satyen who is 28 years old and engaged in a bakery business.  Both of them are illiterate and can only sign their names. Satyen is the only earning member of the family and is responsible for earning the living of four members of his family.  They live in their kachha house (mud, bamboo and straw-made). Their son and daughter are getting an education in grade 6 and grade 5 respectively.

Sandhya's husband has been working in his bakery for three years, and he is specialized in preparing, baking and selling bread, cake and biscuits. His regular customers are his neighbours and the local community. He has a very good reputation in his domain with the special taste and ingredients he provides.  Now he is in difficulty to run his family well with his small income.  He needs to expand the business but lacks the capital.

Sandhya has decided to help her husband by taking a loan. She has applied for a loan from BJS to purchase flour, sugar, butter, and edible oil.  This will help them to bake more products for sale.  The earning will be reinvested in his business, and some will be saved to pay for his children's schooling.

Sandhya will be working hard to keep on expanding and developing their business to provide her family with a secure living.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase flour, sugar, butter, and edible oil for her existing bakery business.

loans.name: Amirjon

texts.ru: Амирчон как ответственный отец старается обеспечить своих родных во всем. Он женат и воспитывает двоих детей.  Его старшей дочери 23 года, она учится в Университете. Сыну 20 лет он помогает отцу по хозяйству. Амирчон около 5 лет ведет деятельность скотоводства. У Амирчона нет высшего образования, но он очень хочет, чтоб его дети учились. На данный момент для Амричона его деятельность является основным источником дохода. Он старается увеличить поголовья скота и тем самым увеличить доходность, но чтобы купить необходимое количество скотов, у Амирчона не хватает средств. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Помогите ему купить скотов.
texts.en: Amirjon, as a responsible father, tries very hard to provide for his family and see that they lack for nothing.  He is married and raising two children; his oldest is his daughter, who is 23 and currently a college student, while his other child, his 20-year-old son, helps him tend to their farm.  Amirjon has been raising cattle for the past 5 years.  He lacks a college education, but would like his children to have one.  Currently, Amirjon's main source of income comes from raising cattle.  He's trying to buy more cattle to increase his income, but lacks the money to do so.  As such, he's seeking your help to get a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: buy cattle for resale

loans.name: Laura Lucinda

texts.es: La señora Laura actualmente se encuentra en santa cruz , vive en alquiler junto a su esposo y su hijo, se dedica  a la confección de poleras de niños  y arreglos de ropa, como modista; su esposo es cocinero en un campamento, ambos trabajan muy duro para salir adelante y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su pequeño hijo, el crédito solicitado es para la compra de rollos de tela y otros insumos para confección, ella paso unos cursos de capacitación en los que logro adquirir más conocimientos acerca de este rubro, con todo esto incrementara su trabajo y también sus ventas.
texts.en:
Laura currently lives in Santa Cruz in a rented home with her husband and son.  She works sewing children's shirts and making clothing repairs.  Her husband is a cook at a camp.  They both work very hard to move forward and give their young son a better quality of life.

She is requesting this loan to purchase rolls of fabric and other sewing supplies.  She took some training courses to get more knowledge, and these have increased her work and her sales.

loans.use: to purchase rolls of fabric and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Manashi

texts.en:
Manashi is a woman of 27 years.  She is married to Rabin, aged 43 years. Together they are raising two children (sons). Manashi and her husband are uneducated but their children are receiving education.  They are in grade 6 and grade 3. They live in their own kachha house (mud, straw and bamboo-made) in the small town Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri.

Manashi is a wholehearted and industrious woman. For five years, she has been working with breeding cattle. She has a dairy cow, which gives 6 litres milk every day and she sells this to her neighbours and friends. Her husband works as a farmer in their own small piece of land, where he grows different vegetables in different seasons.  Their income is stable but not sufficient to manage all the expenses of their family, specially when the prices of essential goods are growing by leaps and bounds.

Therefore. Manashi has taken a loan from BJS to purchase another cow which means more milk and thus more income. She has also decided to make milk products such as paneer (fresh cheese), curd, and butter and sell the products in the local market, as these have good demand in the present days.

She dreams of supporting her family financially with the extra income and at the same time upgrading their house to a concrete-made house.

She is thankful to Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for milk supply business

loans.name: Nilima

texts.en:
Nilima is a 62-year-old housewife, illiterate and can only sign her name. Her family consists of her husband, two sons and one daughter. Her husband Hirendranath, aged 60 years, is engaged in agriculture. They live in their own house in the small village Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri.

Nilima's husband is an experienced farmer.  With the help of his wife Nilima he works hard in their agricultural business.  They grow green vegetables in their own piece of land. He sells the agricultural produce in the local market, and that is an important source of the family's income.  However, his income alone is not enough to cover the everyday needs of the family. To continue running his agricultural business in a sustainable way, Nilima has decided to cultivate potatoes.

Nilima heard about BJS who give loans to rural women for business.  She needs the loan to purchase potato seeds and buy some fertilizers to start cultivation of potatoes.  She has chosen this business as the product has a great demand in the market.

Nilima and her husband sincerely rely on the goodwill of the lenders (BJS and Kiva) and will appreciate their support for giving them the needed amount of loan.  She dreams of providing the family with a decent lifestyle as well as giving proper education to her children with the profit from their new business.

In future, they want to purchase a tractor with the profit from her business.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivation of potatoes.

loans.name: Firoja

texts.en:
Firoja is a 41-year-old woman who lives with her husband, Abdul, and two sons. They live in their own "kachha" house (made of bamboo, straw and mud) in North Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. Both of them are uneducated and can only sign their names. Their two sons are students; one is in college and the other is in grade 9.

Firoja's husband is extensively engaged in agricultural work. He is in hard labour from dawn to dusk growing vegetables, which he sells in the local market. In order to make money to support the family, Firoja runs an animal husbandry business. Now she has one dairy cow. She sells the milk of the cow to her neighbours. In spite of the hard labour of both Firoja and her husband, their financial condition is not stable.

Firoja has decided to take out a loan from Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to purchase a cow in order to grow her business. She hopes she will sell more milk and thus earn more profit. She plans to give her family a decent lifestyle and to invest loan income in further increasing their number of domestic animals. 

Firoja gives her thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for business purposes.

loans.name: Shibani

texts.en:
Shibani is a rural woman of 29 years.  She is a housewife and has a secondary education.  She is married to Monoj, aged 33 years.  He also attended school up to grade 10. They have one son, who is a student in grade 2. They live in their own house in Khalpara in the small town Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri.

Shibani's husband is engaged in a clothing business.  He buys clothing ( sarees, frocks, shirts, etc.) from the wholesale market and sells them to his neighbours.  He has been running this business from his house for the last 10 years.  He is completely dedicated to his job.  He also has the support of Shibani who helps him to sell in their neighbourhood.  But of late, it has become very difficult for him to cover all the necessities of his family with his small income. He wants to expand his business by purchasing more clothing to fulfill the needs of their customers, especially in the winter season, but they don't have the capital.

Shibani has applied for a loan from BJS to purchase more clothing to help her husband to expand the business. She estimates that this loan will help them satisfy their customer demand and with the profit she will be able to cover the basic needs of her family.  She is also hopeful to give her son better education to be successful in life. Her plans for the future are to maintain her business, and build a concrete-made shop for her business.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for existing business.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is a 44-year-old housewife from the remote village Millpara in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri.  Together with her husband, she is raising two sons.  She is married to Sushil who is 50 years old.  Both  Rita and her husband have primary education.  One of their sons is in university and the other is engaged in some odd jobs. They live in their own small house.

Rita's husband runs a grocery shop in their locality.  It is the only source of income for the family. He purchases different varieties of grocery items and products needed in his business from the wholesale market to sell in his shop.  His earnings ware a big help with their children's education and the household expenses for their family and business expenditures.  But of late he has to face the problems of the growing prices of essential goods, so it is hardly possible for him to run the family.

Rita has decided to help her husband.  She has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to expand the business.  With the loan she wants to purchase grocery items like rice, oil, biscuits, lentils, flour, soft drinks, etc. to add to her inventory.  The more items displayed at the store, the better.  More items to sell should result in greater profit.

Her profits from business will definitely help cover her family's daily needs and her son's educational expenses.  She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rita dreams of being more successful in business and hopes to build a concrete-made big grocery shop.

She thanks her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items for their existing grocery shop.

loans.name: Nelson Gilberto

texts.es:
Nelson Gilberto es un joven de 27 años, soltero, originario del municipio de El Sauce done la gente se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora y honrada.
Este joven vive al lado de sus padres los cuales se sienten muy orgullosos de él porque es muy trabajador que ayuda a llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.
Nelson a pesar de ser joven es muy centrado con sus actitudes siendo responsable en su trabajo como operario de limpieza, ya que piensa en su futuro de llegar a tener una vida mejor.
Todos los días se levanta muy temprano porque inicia a laborar desde las seis de la mañana barriendo las principales calles del municipio.
Nelson se presentó a la oficina de Ceprodel a solicitar un préstamo a los inversionistas de Kiva, ya que tiene la necesidad porque trágicamente hace algunos meses atropellaron a su papá lo que le ocasionó una serie de problemas en sus pies por lo que requieren operarlo para mejorar su salud.
Espera y confía en Dios que estas personas de buen corazón apoyen su solicitud para poder operar a su padre y recuperar su salud.
texts.en:
Nelson Gilberto is a 27-year old single man original from the municipality of El Sauce, where people are known for being very hardworking and honest. He lives with his parents, who are very proud of him for his hard work and for helping to bring home the bacon every day. 

Despite his young age, Nelson is very focused and responsible in his job as a cleaning worker and has the goal of having a better life in the future. He wakes up very early every day and starts working at 6am sweeping the main streets of the city. 

Nelson requested the loan at the Ceprodel office, as he needs support after his father was tragically run over a few months ago. This caused him some problems in his feet and now needs to have surgery. He expects and trusts in God that these good people will support his request so that his father can have surgery and recover.

loans.use: to pay for his father's surgery.

loans.name: Yessika Nathalya

texts.es:
Ella es nathalya, quiere darle  a ustedes a conocer  el  interés de hacer parte del convenio que ofrece KIVA para  que este sea de apoyo para la carrera técnica en auxiliar de enfermería, la cual inicio este año en el instituto CAMPO ALTO .
La enfermería es una carrera que la ha motivado a estudiar desde que era niña con el fin de ayudar  a las personas que están en mal estado de salud y dándoles una palabra de aliento y recuperación.
De igual hacer  provecho de este convenio porque le ayudaría con gran parte de la formación académica,  ya que la familia pasa por una situación económica no muy buena, a pesar que el padre actual mente no tiene un trabajo estable y la madre quien ha sacado  toda la familia adelante trabajando en oficios varios; y es por esta razón es que es responsable de pagarse la carrera trabajando.  Se dirige a ustedes por que sabe que con la ayuda de este convenio van a  reducir las cuotas de la carrera,  y esto sería de gran ayuda para poder culminar el técnico en auxiliar de enfermería que es la meta que quiere  cumplir
texts.en:
This is Nathalya. She wants to show her interest in Kiva so that she can receive support for her studies of Nursery Assistant, which she started this year in the institute Campo Alto. She has wanted to be a nurse since she was a little girl, as she has the goal to help people who are ill and to give them hope and encouragement. 

This support from Kiva will help with a significant part of her tuition expenses now that her family is going through a difficult financial situation. Her father does not have a stable job at the moment and her mother, who has help the whole family to get ahead, has been working several jobs. This is why she needs to work to pay for her studies. The loan will be of significant help to finish her nursing studies, which is the goal she wishes to reach.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies and uniforms.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies, to pay tuition, and to buy uniforms.

loans.name: Jhoumlyn

texts.es:
Esta historia cuenta el sueño de una joven llamada jhoumlyn  que desde niña quiso ser cheff.
Desde muy pequeña le gustaba estar al lado de la madre viendo como ella cocinaba,fue así como empezó a practicar. Aunque en el comienzo no era experta ella no desistía de la idea de aprender.
Pasaron unos años y  ya ella era mas dedicada , la familia contenta por que ya no hacia desastres en la cocina y las ganas de aprender seguían creciendo; en este tiempo ya iba terminando el colegio y los padres a pesar de ver el talento le decían que esa no era una carrera productiva.
Ella a pesar de los sueños empezó a estudiar otra carrera para ver así tal vez estaba equivocada y la vocación no era esa.  Transcurridos varios semestres de lo que estaba estudiando se dio cuenta que de verdad eso no era lo que ella quería . Como ya era una persona adulta empezó a trabajar para buscar los medios y poder costearse el sueño que tenia.
Fue así como conoció a CAMPO ALTO donde le brindaban la oportunidad de realizarse en lo que siempre había sido el sueño de ella.
En la actualidad va a iniciar los estudios para concluir la meta propuesta, pero le comentaron sobre el convenio que ofrece kiva y se sintió a gusto al saber que puede hacer parte de este convenio ya que el pago de las cuotas se hace mas cómodo.
texts.en:
This is the story of a young woman named Jhoumlyn, who had had the dream of becoming a cheff since she was a little girl. She always liked to be next to her mother and see how she cooked. That is how she started to practice. Although she was not an expert at first, she did not give up. A few years passed by and she became much better. Her family was happy seeing that she did not make messes in the kitchen anymore and that her willingness to learn kept growing. 

By that time she was already finishing school but, despite her talent, her parents thought this would not be a productive career. She left her dream aside and started to study something else, thinking that maybe she was wrong and cooking was not her vocation. After studying for several semesters, she realized she did not enjoy what she was studying. Being already an adult, she started to work and earn income to cover the costs of her dream. This is how she heard about Campo Alto, where she could have the opportunity to make her dream come true. 

She is currently about to start her studies towards her goal. She has found out about Kiva and would like to count on its support, which would represent a significant help in paying for tuition.

loans.use: to pay one semester tuition.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: El señor Reynaldo es de condición muy humilde, tiene dos hijos a quienes apoya económicamente junto con su esposa; percibe ingresos de las dos actividades que desarrolla, se dedica a ser repartidor de helados de una empresa y por otro lado tiene un vehículo que lo hace trabajar como transporte público con una persona que le entrega todos los días la renta. Ahora solicita un crédito para reparar su vehículo y poder percibir sus ingresos de manera normal ya que quiere superarse económicamente y darles un mejor estatus de vida a su familia, comprando una vivienda donde puedan vivir solos y más cómodamente sin tener que compartir con sus hermanos como actualmente lo ha venido haciendo ya que vive en la casa de sus padres quienes dejaron la casa como herencia.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is a modest man who has two children, whom he supports financially together with his wife. He earns income from his two activities, one as ice cream deliveryman and one as lessor of his vehicle for public transportation, by which the lessee pays him a daily rent. 

He is requesting a loan to repair his vehicle and so that he can keep receiving income normally. He wants to improve their financial situation and give his family a better quality of life. He would like to buy a house where they could live alone and more comfortably, without having to share with his siblings the house they inherited from their parents.

loans.use: to repair his truck so he can sell ice cream and transport goods

loans.name: Eunice

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de eunice, una mujer emprendedora, soñadora e ilusionada por conseguir y lograr lo que siempre había querido ser en la vida; “una gran cosmetóloga y esteticista” y de lo cual, estaba segura que la familia se iba a sentir muy orgullosa, especialmente los dos hermosos hijos varones, de 12 y 8 años de edad, quienes siempre la han visto como una luchadora, guerrera y un ejemplo de tenacidad a seguir.
Es así como los sueños y planes de esta mujer enfocados a tener y administrar el propio negocio, toman un especial valor y sentido al encontrarse en el camino un centro educativo que a través de la amabilidad, experiencia y calidad le ofrece la oportunidad de hacer realidad el sueño que tiene.
Es entonces cuando eunice decide aprovechar tan maravillosa oportunidad, y capacitarse en  el ámbito de la cosmetología y estética integral, brindando bienestar y satisfacción, a quienes lo necesiten. Con lo cual, está segura de que con el empeño, dedicación y disciplina lograra labrarse un camino hacia el éxito para garantizar un mejor futuro a la familia.
Para eunice el destino de una mujer no es tener suerte, sino el camino que se traza aprovechando oportunidades para alcanzar las metas, con este convenio de kiva ella esta segura que lo podrá lograr, ya que se podría ahorrar una parte de la matricula para así poder empezar hacer realidad el sueño que ella tiene, sabe que siempre de la mano de Dios y  bajo la bendición ella lo puede lograr.
texts.en:
Eunice is an enterprising, hopeful woman with big dreams about what she has always wanted to be in life: a successful cosmetician and esthetician. She is sure that her family is going to be very proud of her, especially her two wonderful sons aged 12 and 8. They have always seen her as a hardworking, feisty woman, a role model of tenacity. Eunice's dreams and plans are focussed on owning a business, and she is on the road to an education to help her realize her dreams.

Eunice has decided to take advantage of such a great opportunity and train to become a cosmetologist and esthetician, bringing well-being and satisfaction to those who need it. She is sure that with hard work, dedication, and discipline she will be successful and guarantee a better future for her family.

For Eunice a woman's path is not a lucky one, but one she has to design, seizing opportunities to achieve her goals. With this agreement with Kiva, she is certain she will be successful since she would be able to save a part of her fees and begin to fulfill her dream. She knows that with God's help and blessing she can be successful.

loans.use: pay fees for a term

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables to expand her business.

loans.name: Esther Marilu

texts.es:
Esther tiene 38 años de edad estado civil viuda, tiene dos hijos de 14 y 13 años de edad vive en  Cantón Chimbo Provincia de Bolivar.

Esther se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz suave. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abono, urea, insecticidas, herbicidas.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta para trabajar en el campo e invertir en los fertilizantes y poder progresar.
El sueño es comprar terreno para aumentar las utilidades en las cosechas.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades y el mal clima.
En el tiempo libre le gusta pasar tiempo con su familia.
texts.en:
Esther is 38 years old, widowed, and has two children who are 13 and 14 years old.  She lives in the Chimbo canton in the province of Bolivar.  She works as a farmer planting soft corn.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, urea, insecticide, and herbicide.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to purchase what she is missing to work in the fields, invest in fertilizers, and be able to progress.    

Her dream is to buy land to increase the utility of her crops.  She faces challenges such as disease and bad weather.

In her free time, she likes to spend time with her family.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Roman

texts.es: El señor Román tiene 51 años de edad, nació en la ciudad de Chuquisaca, es soltero y tiene 2 hijos (independientes) tuvo una instrucción hasta el nivel primario ya que los escasos  recursos de sus padre no le ayudaron a seguir superándose,  empezó a trabajar desde muy joven, se separó de su concubina y se vino a Cochabamba con sus hijos, donde trabajo ayudando en las cosechas y ahorro hasta comprar su propio lote agrícola donde cultiva arroz, yuca y plátano, actualmente solicita un crédito para ampliar su cultivo de plátano así lograra aumentar su producción y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Román is 51 years old.  He was born in the city of Chuquisaca.  He is single and has two adult children.  He went to school through primary school since his parents has limited resources and he started to work when he was very young.  He separated from his wife and came to Cochabamba with his children, where he works helping with the crops.  He saved to purchase his own plot of farmland where he plants rice, yucca, and plantains.  

He is requesting a loan to expand his plantain crop so that he can increase his production and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to expand his plantain crop.

loans.name: Rubenia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Rubenia de 35 años de edad,  estudio hasta séptimo grado está acompañada, juntos con su compañero de vida quieren iniciar un negocio propio, no tienen hijos la abuela del esposo de ella vive con ellos, ella recibe ingresos de sus hijos.     

Rubenia desea iniciar el negocio de vender verduras en un vehículo, por todas las comunidades y pueblos vecinos, para tener un ingreso al hogar, han decidido iniciar el negocio. No tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, es su primer negocio el cual le pondrán mucho interés.
El crédito será invertido en el negocio, para la compra de todas las verduras que piensan vender, eso ayudara a tener más ingresos a su hogar y poder cumplir su sueño.

Rubenia podrá iniciarlo poco a poco ir creciendo las ventas y la clientela, tener una estabilidad mejor espera que el negocio de resultado, eso le ayudara a poder tener su propio capital de trabajo. Las ganancias serán invertidas en el pago de la cuota y ampliación del negocio.
texts.en:
Rubenia is 35 years old and lives with her life companion. They want to start their own business. Rubenia studied until Grade 7. She has no children. The grandmother of her husband lives with them. She receives income from her children. 

Rubenia wants to start a business selling vegetables from a vehicle in the neighboring communities and towns. She's decided to start this business as she wants to have income to support the household. She has no other activities that make money and this is her first business so she is quite involved in it. 

The loan will be used to buy all the vegetables she is thinking of selling. This will help create more income for the household. Rubenia can start little by little increasing her sales and clientele and gain more stability. She hopes the business will be successful as this will allow her to have her own working capital. The profit will be used to pay off the loan and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Dúo Esmeraldas Group

texts.es:
Dúo: Esmeraldas
Dúo conformado por Ana Elizabeth es comerciante y madre de familia, Ana se ha dedicado por más de 5 años a la crianza y engorde de cerdos ella ha sido responsables en sus pagos, está agradecida por el apoyo de Kiva y solicita el crédito para la compra de cerdos para la crianza, ya que sus animalitos tienen buena demanda  en el área de San Martin Jilotepeque, esperando que ustedes le puedan seguir ayudando, ya que el primer credito que cancelo no callo en mora.
texts.en:
The Esmeraldas Duo:

Ana Elizabeth is one member of this twosome. She is a businesswoman and a mother, and for more than five years has raised pigs. She has been responsible and made all her repayments. 

Ana Elizabeth is grateful for Kiva's help and is now asking for a loan to buy more pigs to raise. These animals are in great demand in the San Martin Jilltepeque region. She is hopeful that Kiva donors can continue to help her as her first loan was repaid without delay.

loans.use: buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Dúo El Calvario Group

texts.es:
Dúo El Calvario
Este dúo está conformado por Ligia Marily de 29 años de edad es propietaria de un moto taxi y solicita el crédito para comprar llantas, aceites, filtros y hacerle un servicio a su moto taxi.ella es originaria del área de san Martin Jilotepeque, es una persona trabajadora y luchadora, ella agradece el apoyo brindado por Fape y Kiva ya que atreves de esta ayuda está apoyando a sus familias con los gastos del hogar y estudio de sus hijos. ella ha pagado muy puntualmente y no caido en mora.
texts.en:
The "El Calvario" Duo. One of the members of this duo is Ligia Marily who is 29 years old. She is a native of San Martin Jilotepeque and is hard-working and a fighter. She owns a motorcycle taxi. 

She is requesting a loan to buy tires, oil, filters to service her motorcycle taxi. Ligia is grateful for the support given her by Fape and Kiva as because of this help she can support her family's household expenses and her children's studies. She has paid her previous loans punctually and has never defaulted.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia Rosa se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de mochilas,camisetas y gorros la socia vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa deportiva.La socia solicita el credito para comprar gorros,mochilas y buzos.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos.
texts.en: The member Rosa continues to sell back-packs, t-shirts and hats in various markets. She works from 8 am until 5 pm. She has been in this business for a number of years and the business is doing well. Her dream is to expand her business and sell sports clothing. Rosa is requesting a loan to purchase hats, back-packs and sweaters. She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy hats, back-packs and sweaters.

loans.name: Francis Verónica

texts.es: la señora Francis, desea poder terminar su casa de habitacion para que sus hijos tengan mejores condiciones, su esposo la apoya con los gastos del hogar ya que trabaja como taxista desde hace varios años, ella por su parte labora para una casa privada como domestica, el credito lo solicita para la compra de materiales como: Bloques, zinc, cemento. Agradece el apoyo que ha recibido de Kiva y Afodenic.
texts.en: Francis wants to finish her house so that her children live in a better environment. Her husband helps her with the household expenses. He has worked as a taxi-driver for a number of years. Francis for her part works as a domestic in a private house. She is requesting a loan to buy materials like cinder blocks, zinc sheeting and cement. She is grateful for the support she has received from Kiva and Afodenic.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Julia  Nelida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” SUMAC SONCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia Nélida; la socia continua con su negocio de veterinaria, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

 La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de medicinas para los animalitos. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Julia Nélida belongs to the ” SUMAC SONCCO” communal bank located in the district of Cusco in the Province and Department of the same name. Julia continues with her veterinary business. She has been in this business for quite a while. Things are going well for her, thanks to the effort she puts in every day. She is a responsible and persevering person. She wants to continue her work in order to support her family. Julia is requesting a loan to buy medicine for animals. She is happy to have the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy medicines for animals.

loans.name: Carmen Rocio

texts.es:
En el cantón de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, un lugar muy comercial y productivo vive Carmen, una señora de 28 años. Es madre soltera, tiene cuatro hijos, tres de ellos están estudiando en una escuelita cerca de casa. 
Carmen ha tenido que sacar adelante a su familia ya que de ella dependen sus hijos, se ha esforzado en darles educación y alimentación para sus pequeños. Por ello todos los días se dedica a la venta de salchipapas en un coche que tiene, donde ella acuden varios clientes.  Ahora necesita incrementar su negocio, por eso acudió a Fundación Alternativa ya que anteriormente trabajó con la institución, con este crédito podrá comprar una carpa y mesas para su negocio ya que  también va a vender comida porque tiene una buena sazón y mucha clientela, está segura que le va a ir muy bien con este nuevo negocio ya que donde tiene su puesto es una zona comercial.
Carmen no se queda de brazos cruzados, también vende cosméticos para ayudarse con los gastos de casa. Se siente muy agradecida porque la institución y el proyecto Kiva le ayuda a crecer poco a poco en su negocio.
texts.en:
In the commercial and productive canton of Santo Domingo de los Colorados lives 28-year-old Carmen. She is a single mother and has four children - three of them are in school, near to their home.

Carmen has had to help her children to get ahead as they depend on their mother. Carmen has put in a lot of effort to give them an education and food. To do this, every day Carmen goes out to sell sausages and chips from the car that she owns. Carmen now needs to expand her business and so has come to Fundación Alternativa as she previously worked with the organisation. Carmen will use this loan in order to buy awnings and tables for her business. She is going to sell other meals and her food tastes good and she has many customers. Carmen is sure that this new business will go very well for her as her business is located in a very commercial area.

Carmen is no slacker - she also sells cosmetics in order to help with household costs. Carmen is very grateful because Fundación Alternativa and Kiva and helping her grow in her business little by little.

loans.use: to buy an awning and tables for her business.

loans.name: Rocio Del Carmen

texts.es:
En Santo Domingo de los Colorados una ciudad muy conocida de Ecuador con un clima muy agradable vive Rocío una señora de 39 años;  casada con el señor Edison, quienes formaron una familia con ahora tres hijos, dos de ellos aún se encuentran estudiando en una escuela fiscal. Todos viven en casa de un familiar, ya que por falta de recursos aun no cuentan con una vivienda propia.
Rocío es una señora muy trabajadora, todos los días desde la mañana atiende en su pequeño local ubicado en el mini terminal de la ciudad, ella vende helados y confites, es muy conocida en el sector por la atención que brinda a sus clientes. Su esposo recorre vendiendo correas y billeteras. Ambos aportan en su hogar, se han dado el apoyo mutuo para sacar adelante a su familia.
Rocío es clienta nueva en la institución, y con este crédito ella comprará más mercadería para surtir mejor su negocio y así poder incrementar sus ventas. Se siente enormemente agradecida por darle este apoyo, con esto podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
In Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a well known city of Ecuador with a pleasant climate, lives Rocío, a woman of 39 years old. Married to Mr. Edison, they form a family along with their three children, two of them still studying at a public school. They all live in the house of a relative because they lack of enough resources to have their own place to live.

Rocío is a hardworking lady. Every morning she goes to her small business located at the city terminal where she sells ice cream and sweets. She is well known in that part of the city for her customer service. Her husband goes through the city selling belts and wallets. They both contribute for the household expenditures and support each other to get ahead in life. 

Rocío is a new client in the institution, and with this loan she will be able to buy more and better merchandise for her business so she can increase her sales. She is greatly thankful for this support, which will allow her to get a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more and better merchandise for her business.
