loans.name: Elmurodjon

texts.ru: Элмуроджон 32 года, женат, вместе с супругой воспитывают 1 дочь. У Элмуроджона - среднее образование, по-сезонно занимается частным строительством, а в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Элмуроджон занимается полеводством, стартовав 12 лет назад, с 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Элмуроджона, на сегодняшний день имеется: 0,58 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, хлопок, кукурузу и овощи для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Элмуроджон обратился в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку семян картофеля, минеральных удобрений и ядохимикатов. Доходы от кредита Элмуроджон планирует вложить в расширение хозяйства, и планирует накопить средства на покупку автомашины.
texts.en: Elmurodjon is 32 years old, married and is raising a daughter with his wife. He has a high school education and works as a seasonal construction worker, but primarily earns a living by farming. The family farm was started 12 years ago with initial investment of 5,000 som (KGS). Hard work paid off and he now farms 1.4 acres of land where he grows potatoes, cotton, corn and vegetables for personal consumption and resale. The monthly profit from the farm is 10,000 som (KGS) (~200 US dollars). In order to plant a bigger harvest this year Elmurodjon has turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. He plans to use the money to purchase seedling potatoes, fertilizer and pesticides. Elmurodjon will use the profits from this loan to further expand his farming activities and hopes to save money for a car.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes, fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар 21 год, не замужем, проживает вместе с родителями, они помогают ей по хозяйству. У Нилуфар - среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Нилуфар занимается полеводством, стартовав 3 года назад, с 7,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нилуфар, на сегодняшний день имеется: 0,18 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает кукурузу, картошку и хлопок для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нилуфар обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку семян хлопка, минеральных удобрений и ядохимикатов. Доходы от кредита Нилуфар планирует вложить в расширение хозяйства, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Nilufar is 21 years old, single and lives with her parents who help her run the household. She has a high school education and earns a living by farming. She started 3 years ago with initial investment of 7,000 som (KGS). Hard work paid off and she now farms 0.4 acres of land where she grows corn, potatoes and cotton for personal use and resale. The monthly profit from the farm is 8,000 som (KGS) (~150 US dollars). In order to plant a bigger harvest this year Nilufar has turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. She plans to use the money to purchase cotton seeds, fertilizer and pesticides. Nilufar will use the profits from this loan to further expand her farm and hopes to save money for house remodeling.

loans.use: to buy cotton seeds, fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Malikakhon

texts.ru: Маликахон 50 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Старшую дочь выдали замуж, остальные помогают по хозяйству Маликахон. У Маликахон - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Маликахон занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Маликахон, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 11 овец, также обрабатывает 0,48 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -кукурузу и картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Маликахон обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Маликахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового помещения для содержания скота.
texts.en: Malikakhon is married 50 year old woman and a mother of four children. She recently married off her eldest daughter, but the rest of the kids still help around the farm. Malikakhon has a high school education and earns a living by raising livestock. The family farm was started 30 years ago with initial investment of 2,000 som (KGS). It was hard work but now the family owns  11 sheep and 1.2 acres of land where they grow corn and potatoes. The monthly profit from the farm is 10,000 som (KGS) (~200 US dollars). In order to expand Malikakhon has turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. She plans to use the money to purchase more sheep. Malikakhon will use the profits from this loan to further expand the herd and hopes to save money for a new barn.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Evert Lito

texts.es:
Evert Lito tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el caserío de Cabra Chica del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se caracteriza por su clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio de frutales, café entre otros, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, tiene una experiencia de 10 años en este rubro, es conocido en la zona por dedicarse a este rubro, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para darle mantenimiento a sus cultivos y pago de mano de obra y de esta manera le ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en:
Evert Lito is 35 years old and lives with his wife and children in the small village of Cabra Chica in the Pucará district, a community characterized by its sweltering cimate. Its population works in agriculture, trading in fruit and coffee among other things, located two hours away from the city of Jaén, which belongs to the Cajamarca Region in the northern highlands of Peru. 

He is dedicated to agriculture, specifically to growing pineapple. He has 10 years of experience in this field and is known in the area for dedicating himself to this sector. He has asked for a loan of 2500 nuevos soles for the purchase of fertilizer in order to maintain his crops and payment of labor. This way he will help physiological, morphological and productive improvement of cultivation, as well also to have timely harvesting, by which he will have better production and a better quality product, by which he will have no problems in selling it.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his pineapple crops.

loans.name: Maria Anselma

texts.es:
María, es madre soltera de un hijo de 27 años de edad, en su vivienda solo viven dos personas, no posee otro tipo de ingresos más que los que genera vendiendo antojitos y tortillas, es algo que aprendió de su madre, lo hace cinco días a la semana, ya tiene 7 años de experiencia.
Con el crédito efectuara la compra de maíz, aceite, leña, carnes, yuca, plátano, etc., con lo que trabajara sin dificultades por un tiempo, espera aumentar la productividad, tener más clientes y mejorar su economía.
Aspira a tener un negocio que le dé mayores ingresos para cancelar sus deudas y mejor el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Maria is the single mother of a 27 year old son. There are only two people living in her house. She does not posses any other type of income other than what she generates selling appetizers and tortillas, which she learned from mother. She does this five days a week and already has 7 years of experience. 

With the loan she will make the purchase of corn, oil, firewood, meat, yucca and plantains, with which she will work without difficulty for some time. She hopes to increase productivity, to have more customers and to improve her economy. She aspires to have a business that gives her better income in order to get rid of her debt and improve her family lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, firewood, meat, yucca, and plantains.

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зууракан 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Двое старших-студенты, младший сын - школьник. У Зууракан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зууракан занимается животноводством, стартовав 24 года назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Зууракан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 10 овец, 2 козы, для содержания скота имеются все условия и заготовлены корма: 500 снопов кукурузы, 400 килограмм кукурузы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зууракан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку ягнят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Зууракан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Zuurakan is 51 years old, married and has raised three children with her husband. Her two eldest children are already college students, but the youngest is still in school. Zuurakan has a high school education and earns a living by raising livestock. The family farm was started 24 years ago with initial livestock purchase worth of 1,000 som (KGS) and now they own a milk cow, 10 sheep and 2 goats. The animals are well provided for, have a comfortable barn and a lot of feed: 500 bails of corn stalks and 400 kilograms of corn. Monthly profit from the farm is 11,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand Zuurakan has turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. She plans to use the money to purchase lambs. Zuurakan will use the profits from this loan to further expand the herd and hopes to save money for her kids' education.

loans.use: to buy lambs

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул 25 лет, не смотря на свой молодой возраст она замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Дети все маленькие, Назгул занимается воспитанием детей и ведет домашнее хозяйство. А супруг работает в военной части начальником караула, имеет стабильную ежемесячную зарплату. У Назгул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Назгул занимается животноводством, стартовав 6 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Назгул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, 5 овец, 5 коз, 1 козленок.  Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Назгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Nazgul is only 25 years old but she is already married is raising three children with her husband. All her kids are still little so Nazgul takes care of them and the household. Her husband works for the military as the head security guard and has a stable monthly salary. Nazgul has a high school degree and supports her family by raising livestock. The family farm was started 6 years ago with initial livestock purchase worth of 20,000 som (KGS) and now they own a milk cow, a calf, 5 sheep, 5 goats and goat kid. Monthly profit from the farm is 17,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand the herd Nazgul has turned to bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan. She plans to use the money to purchase more sheep. Nazgul will use the profits from this loan to further expand the herd and hopes to save money for her kids' education.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 40 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа одна воспитывает 3 детей. У Айнуры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айнура занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айнуры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь. Корма и сено в количестве - 400 снопов заготовлены. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку жилого дома для старшего сына.
texts.en: Ainura is a 40-year-old widow who is raising 3 children.  She has the equivalent of a high school education, and is a livestock farmer by trade.  She first started 10 years ago with 12,000 som worth of animals.  Thanks to her persistence, she currently has 3 dairy cows and a horse on her farm, as well as 400 sheaves of hay to feed them with, while her monthly income is around 10,000 som.  To further develop her farm, she is seeking a loan from Bai Tushum and Partners to buy some calves.  She plans on using any extra money earned due to the loan to buy even more livestock for her farm and set aside money for a house for her oldest son.

loans.use: buy calves

loans.name: Qamariddin

texts.ru:
Камариддину 27 лет. Он живет и работает на районе Хамадони. Он отец двоих маленьких дочерей, которые служат ему мотивацией продвижению вперед. Камариддин один кормит семью. Его родители пенсионеры, а жена домохозяйка. Она ухаживает за родителями Камариддина и следит за детьми. 
   Камариддин около 3 лет занимается продажей обуви на местном рынке. И на сегодняшний день эго маленький бизнес является основным источником дохода. Камариддин решил привести больше обуви и расширить ассортимент продукции. Он надеется, что таким образом, он увеличить доходность от данного бизнеса. Но его финансовое положение не позволяет ему совершить данную покупку, и он обратился за кредитом.
texts.en: Qamariddin is 27 years old. He lives and works in Hamadoni region. Qamariddin is a father of two little girls who are his motivation to achieve success in business. He is the sole provider for his family, as his parents are retired and his wife is a home maker. She takes care of his parents and his children. Qamariddin has been selling shoes for three years at the local market. Currently this business is the sole source of income for the family. Qamariddin has decided to purchase more shoe inventory and expand the variety of shoes in his store. He hopes that this will allow him to expand his business. However, his financial situation prevents him from making this purchase, so Qamariddin has decided to take out a loan to fiance the venture.

loans.use: to import more inventory and offer more variety of goods

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el caserío de Naranjitos una zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad que se caracteriza por un clima cálido, su población en la mayoría se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cafeto, con una experiencia en el rubro de 13 años, es un padre emprendedor, que se esfuerza junto a su familia, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevo soles para la compra de abono para proteger de la plaga de la roya a su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Benito is 35 years old and lives together with his children in the village of Naranjitos, a rural area in the district of Pomahuaca, a community characterized by its warm climate. The majority of the population is dedicated to agriculture, trade and ranching, located in the Jaén province, which belongs to the Cajamarca Region in the northern highlands of Peru. 

He is dedicated to agriculture, specifically the cultivation of coffee, with 13 years of experience in this field. He is an enterprising father, which gives him strength. Together with his family he has requested a loam of 1500 nuevo soles for the purchase of fertilizer in order protect his coffee crop from the rust plague. This way he will have a timely production to offer to his customers, generating better income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Erkinjon

texts.ru: Эркинчон опытный растениевод из города Турсунзаде. Ему 34 года. Он женат и отец четверых детей. Все его дети школьного возраста. Жена Эркинчона работает вместе с ним. На протяжении 15 лет Эркинчон и его жена занимаются растениеводством. Они целый год выращивают огородные культуры. Зимой Эркинчон выращивает овощи в своем парнике, который вы видите на фотографии. Эркинчону нравится его работа. Он любит работать с почвой и получать плоды своих трудов, и к тому же за счет дохода с урожаев он кормит семью. В данный момент Эркинчон проводит посевные работы в своем парнике. Он запрашивает кредит, чтобы закупить семена овощей, целлофаны и нити.
texts.en: Erkinjon is an experienced farmer from Tursun-zoda. He is 34 years old, married and has four school-age kids. For the last 15 years he and his wife have been working on the family farm together. They can grow vegetables year-round, as they own several greenhouses which are visible on the photograph. Erkinjon likes his work, for he loves working with soil and see the fruits of his labor grow and is happy that he can support his family by doing something that he loves. Currently he is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable seeds, plastic and string to repair the greenhouses and plant another harvest.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seeds, plastic and string for planting in his greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд житель района Хамадони. Ему 49 лет. Махмуд добропорядочный семьянин. Он вырастил четверых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Один из сыновей уехал за приделами страны на заработки. Махмуд более 10 лет работает водителем маршрутки. Сейчас он водит мини автобус, которого в народе называют "Тангем". Его машина "Тангем" срочно нуждается в ремонте. Но чтобы его отремонтировать, Махмуду необходимо купить запчасти. Запчасти мини автобуса стоят дорого. Махмуд просит кредит, чтобы собрать недостающую часть суммы, купить запчасти и отремонтировать мини автобус.
texts.en: Mahmud is a resident of Hamadoni region. He is 49 years old and a goodnatured family man. He has raised four children and his wife is a home maker. One of Mahmud's sons is working abroad as a migrant worker, while Mahmud himself has been running a shuttle taxi service for 10 years. Currently he drives a shuttle bus of the "Tangem" brand, which is in dire need of repair. But to repair his vehicle Mahmud needs to buy spare parts, which are really expensive, so he is taking out a loan to help finance the purchase.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his shuttle bus

loans.name: José Balmore

texts.es:
José de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta  segundo grado en la escuela. Es acompañado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, con ella ha procreado 4 hijos. la 1ra estudio bachillerato, la segunda estudia octavo grado, la tercera estudia 5to grado y la 4ta estudia 4to grado y tiene 10 años. Solo él y su familia viven en su hogar.

José se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos, desde joven le ha gustado esta actividad sus abuelos fueron quienes le enseñaron este trabajo y por otra parte técnicos del ministerio de agricultura y ganadería, que les han apoyado en la asistencia técnica es si, como ha aprendido su oficio y sacar adelante su familia. El lugar donde trabaja le queda a un km de distancia de su casa y se transporta a pie, nunca ha tenido otra actividad, siempre ha dependido de la siembra de hortalizas, en su trabajo se involucra muchas veces su esposa y su hija mayor y generalmente trabaja de 7:00 am a 1:00pm.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 2 quintales de fertilizante, 1 litro de herbicida, abonos y foliares para que la producción sea mejor.  El crédito mejorara su calidad de vida, ya que obtendrá más ganancias de sus siembras y dará a su familia una mejor atención en cuanto a alimentación, salud educación, vestuario. Será satisfecha la necesidad  de poder comprar de una sola vez sus insumos agrícolas y no tener que incurrir en tantos gastos.

El sueño de José, es convertirse en un productor potencial, para ello comprara un sistema de riego adecuado, para regar más efectivamente su terreno, ayudar a sus hijas a que salgan adelante con sus estudios y que un día puedan tener otras fuentes de ingresos diferentes.
texts.en:
Jose is 43 years old and only studied to the 2nd grade in school. He is married and his wife is devoted to the household and domestic chores. The couple has produced 4 children: the 1st is in secondary school, the 2nd is in 8th grade, the 3rd is in 5th grade, and the 4th is in 4th grade and is 10 years old. Jose and his family are the only residents in his home.

Jose grows basic foods. Since his youth, he has enjoyed this activity. His grandparents taught him these skills and, in addition, technicians from the Ministry of Agriculture and Livestock have provided technical assistance. This is how he has learned to farm and advanced his family. The place where he farms is located a kilometer from his house and he goes there on foot. Jose has never pursued another activity He has always depended on sowing basic foods. He is often assisted in the work by his wife and eldest daughter, and generally, he labors in the fields from 7:00 am until 1:00 pm.

The loan Jose is requesting through CREDICAMPO is for purchasing 2 quintals of fertilizer and 1 liter of herbicide, plus manure and fungicide, in order to improve production. The loan will increase their quality of life, since they will obtain better earnings from the harvests and the family will benefit in terms of food, health, education, and clothing. The loan will fulfill the need to buy agricultural inputs all at once, without having to incur so many extra costs.

Jose's dream is to become a prominent producer. To do that, he wishes to purchase an adequate irrigation system to water his land more effectively, aid his daughters to forge ahead in their studies, and, one day, to be able to generate other and different sources of income.

loans.use: buy 2 quintals of fertilizer, 1 liter of herbicide, plus manure and fungicide, so that his field's production may improve.

loans.name: Muborak

texts.ru:
Муборак продолжает предоставлять свои услуги в дилерском центре на протяжении 8 лет. Она повторно кредитуется в МДО "Хумо". Первый свой кредит Муборак брала для ремонта помещения и приобретения сим-карт, сумму которого она использовала целенаправленно. Она благодарит кредиторов KIVA за финансовую поддержку. Муборак ведет свой бизнес самостоятельно. Ее муж и двое сыновей уехали на заработки в Россию, а дочь устроилась поваром в хлопкоочистительном заводе. 
Дилеркский центр Муборак расположен рядом с рынком, что является хорошим местом для привлечения клиентов. Сейчас Муборак нуждается в кредите для развития своего дела. Ей необходимо закупить сим-карты мобильных компаний и пополнить баланс телефонов. Она снова надеется на вашу отзывчивость.
texts.en: Muborak has offered her mobile cell phone services for the last eight years. She was granted several loans by micfolending bank "Humo" already. Her first loan was used to remodel the store space and purchase a batch of sim-cards and she used the money well. She is grateful to Kiva for that financial assistance. Muborak runs her business independently as her husband and sons are working abroad in Russia, while her daughter works as a cook at the cotton mill. Muborak's cell phone store is located next to the central market, which is busy location and attracts many clients. Currently Muborak would like to take out another loan to further expand her store. She needs to buy more sim-cards of different cell phone companies and also refill balances on existing phones. She again hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase mobile sim cards and refill cell phone balances

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru:
Чумагул целеустремленная и усердная женщина в возрасте 34 лет. Она по сей день вместе с мужем занималась земледелием и животноводством в своем районе Вахш. Накопив сбережение Чумагул и ее муж у дороги построили помещение. Они собираются открыть в своем селе продуктовый магазин и обеспечить жителей свежими, качественными и необходимыми продуктами питания. Помещение готово к эксплуатации, осталось только привезти товар. На это у Чумагул не хватает своих средств. Она обратилась за кредитом и просит Вас помочь ей.
У Чумагул растет сын и трое дочерей. Она уже сейчас думает об их будущем и хочет обеспечить их хорошим образованием.
texts.en: Jumagul is a goal oriented and tenacious 34 year old woman. She has a son and three daughters. Her children's future life and education are always on Jumagul's mind. She has been farming with her husband and raising livestock in the Vakhsh region of Tajikistan. After saving enough money Jumagul and her husband built a store space next to the main road. They are planning to open a grocery store in their village and provide the residents with fresh quality groceries and other necessities. The store space is ready for use but they need to purchase a batch of groceries wholesale and the family's savings are exhausted. For this reason Jumagul has turned to Kiva for a loan and hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale groceries and open her own store

loans.name: Saidamo

texts.ru: Саидамо жительница столицы Таджикистана -  города Душанбе. Ей 34 года. Она деятельная, старательная и предприимчивая по натуре женщина. Саидамо живет с мужем и двумя дочками. Ее муж повар. Он работает в столовой на центральном рынке и предоставляет там свои услуги. Саидамо поставила перед собой цель открыть свой торговый бизнес. Она в хорошем месте города приобрела помещение для магазина, а на остальную сумму сбережения купила 2-витринные холодильники. Саидамо будет заниматься продажей продуктов питания. У нее имеется хороший бизнес план. Чтобы открыть магазин осталось закупить продукты питания. На это у Саидамо не осталось достаточных средств. Саидамо просит у Вас финансовой поддержки. Она действительно нуждается в данном кредите и просит дать ей возможность открыть свой продуктовый магазин.
texts.en: Saidamo is a resident of Tajikistan's capital city - Dushanbe. She is 34 years old. She is a naturally energetic, diligent, and entrepreneurial woman. Saidamo lives with her husband and two daughters. Her husband is a chef. He works, providing his services, at a cafeteria in the central market. Saidamo has set herself the goal of opening her own store. She has a place for the store in a good location in the city, and she used the rest of her saved money to buy two glass front refrigerators. Saidamo is going to sell grocery items. She has a good business plan. The only thing left that she needs to do to open the store is to buy the inventory of groceries. She doesn't have enough money left through, so she is asking for your financial help. She truly needs this loan and is asking to be given the opportunity to open her own grocery store.

loans.use: Buy groceries to open a grocery store in the city

loans.name: Jazgul

texts.ru: Жазгуль 31 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Жазгуль -высшее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жазгуль занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жазгуль, на сегодняшний день имеется: 8 дойных коров, 1 лошадь и 25 овец, а также 2,34 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает овощи и фрукы для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жазгуль обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку семян овощей, а также удобрений и ядохимикатов для обработки земли. Доходы от кредита Жазгуль планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство незавершенного дома.
texts.en: Jazgul is 31 years old, married, and is raising two children with her spouse. Jazgul has a college education. She earns the primary source of income for her family by farming and raising livestock. She started the business 14 years ago with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her tireless work, Jazgul now owns eight milk cows, a horse, 25 sheep, and 2.34 hectares of land, where she grows fruits and vegetables for family use and sale. Her monthly income is 9,000 som (KGS). With the goal of further developing her business Jazgul approached the Bai Tushum bank for a loan to buy vegetable seeds, as well as fertilizers and pesticides for farming activities. Jazgul plans to invest income from use of the loan into expanding her livestock herd, and also plans to save toward construction of an unfinished house.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: José Candido

texts.es:
José  de 49 años de edad, es una persona dedicada  a la agricultura, estudio hasta cuarto grado por la situación económica que pasaba su familia no logro seguir estudiando. Él es casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su hogar, actualmente en su vivienda viven sus 3  hijos que se encuentran estudiando y que en los momentos libres le ayudan en los trabajos agrícolas y que son las únicas personas que dependen de él.  

 
José se dedica a la agricultura en la siembra de hortalizas en invernadero comenta que  es apoyado por una institución que le proporciona materiales y asistencia técnica para el cultivo,  él tiene ya varios años de trabajar en esta actividad desde que estaba pequeño sus padres le enseñaron a aprender este trabajo,  como era la única alternativa de trabajo y de ingresos en aquellos  tiempos,  por eso se dedicaba a la agricultura. Para llegar a su lugar de trabajo tiene que caminar 30 minutos a pie que también recibe el apoyo de sus hijos y esposa para realizar los trabajos en la hortaliza

El préstamo lo utilizara para la compra de un sistema de riego para sus cultivos de hortalizas,  que tiene plantados pues en época de verano es necesario regarlas con agua. Con la ayuda del préstamo le se facilitara el  riego de las plantas esto será más eficiente  y le ahorrara tiempo para realizar otra actividades.

José desea  ser un productor en grande con sus  cultivos y poder ampliar más su invernadero, con la tecnología existente y poder tener más personal de trabajo que le ayude, en sus cultivos y  mejorar su condición de vida para él y su familia, vivir cómodamente en una casa digna para su familia y que sus hijas sigan estudiando que logren sacar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
José is 49 years old and works in agriculture. He only studied through the fourth grade because his family's financial situation would not allow him to continue school. José is married and his wife takes care of the household chores. They currently live at home with their three children who are in school. During their free time, his children help with the farm work and they are the only ones who are dependent on him.

José's method of farming involves planting vegetables in greenhouses. He says that he receives support from an institution that provides materials and technical assistance for growing his crops. José has been in this line of work for several years, from a young age. His parents taught him this trade since it was the only means of working and generating an income at the time. This is why he works in agriculture. In order to arrive at the place where he works, José must walk 30 minutes. His wife and children help him with growing the vegetables.

This loan will be used to buy an irrigation system for his vegetable crops that he planted over the summer since it is necessary to keep them watered. With the help of the loan, the task of watering the plants will be more efficient, which will free up time that he can devote to other activities.

José wants to become a large producer of vegetables, so he plans to expand his greenhouse with existing technology and hire more staff to help him with the work related to his crops. This will improve the living conditions for José and his family. He wants to live comfortably with this family in a decent home and also see his daughters continue their studies so that they can earn a university degree.

loans.use: to buy an irrigation system for his vegetable crops.

loans.name: Abdumutal

texts.ru: Абдумуталу 38 лет, женат, вместе с супругой воспитывают 2 дочерей. У Абдумутала - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Абдумутал занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Абдумутала, в его хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 17 овец, а также арендует земельный надел размером 1,0 ГА, на котором выращивает овощи и фрукты. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Абдумутал обратился в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Абдумутал планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство недостроенного дома.
texts.en: Abdumutal is 38 years old, married, and has two daughters with his spouse. Abdumutal has a high school education, and provides his family's primary source of income through livestock husbandry, which he began 18 years ago with the purchase of 10,000 som (KGS) of animals. Thanks to his tireless work Abdumutal now owns four dairy cows, seventeen sheep, and he also rents a 1.0h hectare plot of land where he grows fruits and vegetables. His monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop his business he came to Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy sheep to add to his herd. He plans to invest income from use of the loan into further expanding his herd, and he also plans to save money for construction of an unfinished house.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Juan David

texts.es:
En la fotografia aparece Juan, con su pequeño hijo.

Juan de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta 5° grado  y luego viajo a los estados unidos,  donde resido por un periodo de 7 años, regreso  y se acompañó; su pareja se dedica  a los oficios domésticos, han comprado dos vacas, su hijo se encuentra estudiando la parvularia.

Juan trabaja la agricultura desde que era un niño, tuvo que dejar por un tiempo ese trabajo por el hecho de encontrarse fuera del  país.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 2 cerdos, con los cuales iniciara su negocio  de compra y venta de cerdos.

El cliente planea seguir cultivando el maíz, y el préstamo le ayudara para su negocio de la compra y venta de cerdos que era un medio de ingreso económico, para dar a su familia el sustento diario, pues el cultivo de maíz le genera ingresos pero solo por temporada, mientras con el negocio será en todo el año.
texts.en:
Juan appears in the photo with his young son.

Juan is 27 years old and studied through the fifth grade.  He later traveled to the United States where he lived for seven years, then he returned and got married.  His wife works at home and they have purchased two cows.  His son attends pre-school.  

Juan has worked as a farmer since he was a child.  He had to stop his work when he was outside the country.  

He is requesting this loan from CrediCampo to purchase two pigs, which he will use to start his business buying and selling pigs.  He plans to continue cultivating corn, and the loan will help him because his business buying and selling pigs will earn money to support his family. Cultivating corn generates income seasonally, while this new business will be year-round.

loans.use: to purchase two pigs.

loans.name: Bahrom

texts.ru:
Это Бахром из района Носири Хусрав. Он опытный дехканин в возрасте 47 лет. Бахром отец троих детей. 
Вот уже 10 лет как Бахром и его семья занимаются растениеводством. Они на приусадебном участке земли выращивают овощи и зелень. Прибыль с продажи урожая является основным источником дохода семьи. Бахрому сейчас необходимо обработать посеянный урожай. Он просит кредит для купли минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: This is Bahrom from the Nosiri Khusrav district. He is an experienced farmer at the age of 47. Bahrom has three children. It has been 10 years since he and his family started farming. They grow potatoes and herbs on the land around their house. Sale of their harvest provides the main source of income for the family. Bahrom needs to cultivate the plants that are growing now. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Sherkuzi

texts.ru: Шеркузи проживает в районе Носири Хисрав с родителями, женой и двумя детьми. Он в семье главный добытчик. Шеркузи 32 года. У него среднее образование. Шесть лет назад он начал заниматься земледелием. Он продолжает ремесло отца и дедушки. Шеркузи и его семья на большом участке земли занимаются посевом огородных культур. Иногда Шеркузи в свободное время занимается предоставлением услуги такси, чтобы обеспечивать и финансово поддерживать семью. В данный момент Шеркузи провел вспашку земли, подготовил грядки для посева семян. Он берет кредит для купли семян картофеля и минеральных удобрений, чтобы закончить посевные работы. Шеркузи ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Sherkuzi lives in the Nosiri Khusrav area with his parents, wife, and two children. He is the family's main breadwinner. Sherkuzi is 32 years old and has a high school education. He began farming six years ago, continuing the work of his father and grandfathers. Sherkuzi and his family grow vegetable crops on a large piece of land. Sometimes Sherkuzi provides taxi services in his spare time in order to provide for and financially support the family. Sherkuzi recently plowed his land and readied the rows for planting. He is taking out a loan to buy seed potatoes and fertilizer to complete planting. Sherkuzi is waiting for support.

loans.use: To buy seed potatoes and fertilizer

loans.name: Oscar Rául

texts.es:
Oscar de 20 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, tiene un negocio propio de venta y reparación de teléfonos celulares, vive con su pareja. Ella también tiene su propio negocio un tigo money, nadie más vive con ellos.

Oscar se dedica a la reparación de teléfonos, cuenta con cuatro años de dedicarse a la actividad, le gustaban los aparatos electrónicos es así como fue aprendiendo ese trabajo, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique. El negocio lo tiene en la casa donde vive, nadie más se involucra en la actividad.
El crédito será invertido en ampliar más el negocio de reparación de teléfonos, con lo que mejoraran sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, eso ayudara a un mejorar la vida en su hogar, con el crédito podrá logra un capital de trabajo propio.

Oscar piensa ir creciendo en las ventas y la clientela, preparando desde ya económicamente para cuando venga sus  primeros hijo/a y tener una estabilidad para él y los suyos. Las ganancias serán dirigidas a la compra da más mercadería, con el crédito ampliara el negocio adquiriendo más mobiliario para la mercadería.
texts.en:
Oscar is 20 years old, studied through high school, and has a partner.  He has his own business selling and repairing mobile phones.  He lives with his partner.  She also has her own business, a Tigo Money (money transfer company).  No one else lives with them.  

Oscar works repairing telephones and has been doing this work for four years.  He liked electronics, so he learned this work.  He does not work doing anything else.  His business is located in the house where he lives, and no one else helps him with the business.

He will use this loan to expand his business repairing telephones, which will improve his income and quality of life.  This will help him improve life for his household and allow him to have his own working capital.

Oscar wants to think about growing his sales and customer base so he can be financially prepared when his first child arrives so that they can have stability.  His profits will go towards the purchase of more merchandise.  The loan will help expand his business by acquiring more furniture for his merchandise.

loans.use: to expand his business repairing telephones.

loans.name: Everardo

texts.es:
Everardo es un joven de 26 años de edad, padre de dos hijos de 6 y 1 año, respectivamente, ambos aún se encuentran estudiando y viven Suchitepéquez.
El es un hombre trabajador que lucha junto a su esposa para sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes ubicada en la comunidad donde viven. 
El empezó esta actividad hace 3 años ya que en su comunidad no existen muchos negocios similares, es por ello que tomó la decisión de emprender este negocio que le ha ayuda a contribuir a la economía de su familia a través de sus ingresos y ganancias que obtiene a través de ello.
El solicita un préstamo de Q 10,000.00 para la compra de productos de consumo diario (café, maíz, azúcar, etc.), para poder incrementar sus ganancias y brindarles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
El sueño de Everardo es hacer más grande su tienda y tener más variedad de productos; además quiere comprar otros terrenos.
texts.en:
Everardo is a young man of 26. He is the father of two children, ages 6 and 1, who are not yet in school. They live in Suchitepéquez. 

He is a hard-working man who strives every day, along with his wife, to raise his family. He now has a grocery store located in the community where they live. He began this business three years, since there weren't many similar businesses in his community. This is why he made the decision to begin this business, which has helped him to contribute to the economy of his family through the income and earnings that he obtains from it.

He is applying for a loan of 10,000 quetzales to buy products of daily consumption (coffee, corn, sugar, etc.) to be able to increase his earnings and offer better service to his customers.

Everardo's dream is to enlarge his store and have a greater variety of products. In addition, he would like to buy other plots of land.

loans.use: to buy basic products (coffee, corn, sugar, etc.) for his store

loans.name: Yeison

texts.es:
El es yeison es un joven inteligente con ganas de ser un profesional y exitoso y apunto de empezar la carrera en ensamble y mantenimiento de hardware, es un joven de mente abierta, el nos cuenta como esa carrera le ayudara en el futuro.
El piensa y nos  dice que estudiando sistemas sera una persona con grandes conocimientos y libremente con las puertas abiertas para cualquier circunstancia.
En el ámbito laboral para establecerse en una gran empresa o formar la propia empresa para crear experiencias laborales y personales.
El asegura que con el respaldo de kiva podrá cumplir las metas trazadas en la vida, ser un joven emprendedor que cada día mas desea seguir adelante.
También cuenta que desea hacer una especialización en la universidad con respecto a la carrera y por medio de ella colaborar a la comunidad y seguir creciendo como persona.
texts.en: Yeison is an intelligent young man with the desire to be a successful professional and he is about to begin a degree in hardware maintenance and assembly. He is an open minded young man and he told us how this degree will help him in the future. He thinks, and he told us, that by studying these systems he will become a person with a lot of knowledge who has access to a lot of open doors for whatever circumstances arise. It will create both work and personal experiences, whether he works at a large company, or starts his own business. He assures us that with the Kiva loan he will be able to accomplish the goals he has mapped for his life. He will be a young businessman who desires to continue getting ahead each day. He also told us that he desires to specialize his degree at the university and to collaborate with his community through his education and to continue growing as a person.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Musurmonqul

texts.ru: Мусурмонкул искусный сварщик, проживающий в районе Шахритус. Ему 53 года. Он разведен и живет у своей сестры. Мусурмонкул занимается производством. Он изготавливает железные двери, окна и решетки. Мусурмонкул 5 лет назад открыл свой мини цех, под его руководством работают несколько рабочих. Он решил расширить производство и запрашивает кредит, чтобы купить новый сварочный аппарат. Ему очень важен этот кредит. Он ждет финансовой поддержки.
texts.en:
Musurmonqul is a skilled welder, living in the region of Shahrituz. He is 53 years old. He is divorced and lives with his sister. Musurmonqul works with manufacturing. He produces iron doors, windows and lattices. 

Five years ago, Musurmonqul opened his own mini-workshop, and a few workers work under his leadership. He decided to expand the production and requests a loan in order to purchase a new welding machine. This loan is very important to him. He awaits the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine for the production of iron doors, windows and lattices

loans.name: Dúo Patzicia Group

texts.es: Dúo Patzicia, este duo esta conformado por la señora Maria Mercedes de 55 años de edad,ella se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos para la venta,se ha dedicado a la venta de este producto desde hace 5 años, gracias a Dios le a ido bien, ella ya ha trabajado otros creditos anteriores y no a caido en mora, en esta ocacion esta solicitando este credito para la compra de cosmeticos para la venta, esperando que ustedes le puedan seguir ayudando para que ella suga adelante en su negocio.
texts.en: This group is Dúo Patzicia. One member of the duo is Maria Mercedes who is 55 years old. She works selling cosmetics. She has worked selling this product for more than 5 years. Thanks to God it has gone well. Maria has worked with other loans before and she has not been delinquent. This time she is seeking this loan to purchase cosmetics to sell. She is hoping that you all can continue helping her so that she can get ahead with her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Oscar David

texts.es:
Oscar david es un joven estudiante el cual esta estudiando segundo semestre de cosmetologia, antiguamente estaba estudiando auxiliar de enfermería termino el primer semestre y se cambio a estética integral porque le llamo mas la atención, tenia un convenio antes con otra entidad, peor lamentablemente se lo cancelaron y el no tiene un apoyo para poder seguir con la carrera técnica, por eso esta interesado en kiva, que le puede ofrecer un descuento para poder terminar los estudios de estética para a si poder ejercer la profesión y seguir con los proyectos mas adelante, lo cual quiere segur estudiando al terminar estética el quiere seguir con el curso de peluquería y cuando acabe ya pueda estar trabajando, poder seguir con la carrera profesional de psicologia y a si poder cumplir el sueño como estudiante y los proyectos como persona.
Todo lo que esta realizo como estudiante, lo hace pensando en un buen futuro para poderle agradecer a la familia y a la institución donde le dan un apoyo para salir adelante y para poder dar una calidad de vida buena, tanto para el como para la familia.
texts.en:
Oscar David is a young student who is in his second semester of the cosmetology curriculum. He formerly was studying to be a nursing assistant. He finished the first semester and changed to integrated aesthetics because the field attracted his attention more. He had a [loan] agreement before with another institution, but unfortunately, they cancelled it, and he doesn't have support to be able to continue with the technical course. For this reason, he is interested in Kiva, which can offer him an allowance to be able to finish his studies in aesthetics so that he can thus practice his profession and continue forward with his career, which he wants to continue studying. After finishing the aesthetics course, he wants to continue with the course in hairdressing, and when he finishes he will already be able to work and to continue with the professional course in psychology, and thus be able to accomplish his dream as a student and his goals as a person.

Everything that he is accomplishing as a student, he does thinking about a good future to be able to show appreciation to his family and to the institution, where they have given him support in order to advance and to give a good quality of life to his family as well as to himself.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school fees

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru: Рафоат добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж работает в хлопковом заводе. Рафоат работает в детском садике. Она работает в детском садике уже более 6 лет. Она имеет 15 лет стаж работы. Рафоат умная женщина и отлично выполняет свою работу. Она очень любит маленьких детей и с удовольствием работает с маленькими детьми. Рафоат и ее муж получают маленькую зарплату. Их старший сын не имеет работу и поэтому он хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию и зарабатывать там. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки авиабилета. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rafoat is a conscientious woman. She is married and has two children. Her husband works in a cotton factory. Rafoat works at a kindergarten. She has worked there for six years already. She has 15 years of work experience. Rafoat is a smart woman and carries out her work very well. She loves the small children very much and works with them with pleasure. 

Rafoat and her husband receive a small pay. Their eldest son does not have a job, and therefore he would like to go to the Russian Federation and earn money there. Rafoat requests a loan of the amount of 1,000 somoni in order to purchase a plane ticket. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a plane ticket for her son, who is going to Russia

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.ru: Дилфуза добрая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж авто слесарь. Дилфуза с целью обеспечения своих детей хорошим образованием 2 года назад начала свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Она начала свой бизнес с ручной швейной машинки. Вначале она предоставляла свои услуги своим соседям. Дилфуза постепенно развевала свой бизнес. Теперь она имеет своих регулярных клиентов. Ее старший сын студент. Ее второй сын в этом году окончил школу, но у них не было возможности платить за учёбу в университете, и таким образом он не поступил в университет. Теперь он хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию и зарабатывать там. Дилфуза запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для своего сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilfuza is a good woman. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a car mechanic. Two years ago, Dilfuza started her business of sewing women's clothing, with an aim to provide her children with a good education. She started her business with a handheld sewing machine. In the beginning she offered her services to her neighbors. Step by step, Dilfuza developed her business. Currently she has regular customers. 

Dilfuza's eldest son is a student. Her second son finished school this year, but they did not have the opportunity to pay for his tuition at the university, and therefore he did not start there. Currently he would like to go to the Russian Federation and earn money there. Dilfuza requests a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni in order to purchase a plane ticket for her son. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a plane ticket for her son, who is going to Russia

loans.name: Oscar De Jesús

texts.es:
Oscar de 26 años de edad estudio, octavo grado de educación básica, hoy en día está acompañado desde hace cinco años, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, cuidando la niña ya que todavía no asiste a la escuela. Antes que no tenían la niña si trabajaba en la agricultura con su esposo  

 Oscar se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de granos básicos y frutales como plátano, este trabajo lo realiza desde hace unos 14 años, sus padres le enseñaron a dedicarse a este trabajo. El lugar donde trabaja está a un kilómetro, viaja en bicicleta todos los días trabaja ocho horas diarias.

Oscar invertirá el crédito en la compra de 200 pollos de engorde, piensa construir un lugar donde criarlos y hacer con estos ingresos una mejor su calidad de vida, a de más quiere aprovechar que hay una institución que está capacitado para poder desarrollar negocios. 

Oscar su sueño en un futuro poder extender su negocio, y poder vender pollos a los restaurantes de los pueblos más cercanos, y por qué no llamarse micro empresario  y así poder sacar adelante a su hija con el estudio quiere verla una profesional.
texts.en:
Oscar is 26 years old and studied up through the eighth grade of basic education. Now he has been married for five years and his wife takes care of the home and their little girl, who isn't in school yet. Before they had their daughter, she worked in agriculture with her husband.

Oscar works in agriculture, sowing basic grains and fruits such as bananas. He has been doing this work for some 14 years; his parents taught him how. The place where he works is one kilometer away. He goes there by bicycle every day and works eight hours a day.

Oscar will invest the loan in buying 200 chicks for fattening. His idea is to build a place to raise them and to use the income to better his quality of life, and he also wants to take advantage of the fact that there is an institution equipped with resources to be able to develop businesses.

Oscar's dream for the future is to be able to extend his business and sell chickens to the restaurants of the nearest towns. Why not call himself a micro-entrepreneur? Then he will be able to lift his daughter up through education; he wants to see her become a professional.

loans.use: to buy 200 chicks for fattening and to build a place to raise them

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio de 23 años de edad es un joven que estudio sexto grado de educación básico, está soltero únicamente vive con su madre y dos hermanas, por lo que están de pendiendo de él tres personas.
 Julio hoy en día tiene un negocio de mantenimiento de un centro de recreación para niños, específicamente en unas piscinas que las tiene como arrendadas y necesita invertir porque necesita darles una buena presentación, antes de hacer este trabajo se dedicaba a la agricultura a sembrar granos básicos, trabajo que su padre le enseño algo que lo hacía solo cuatro horas diarias,  hoy trabaja 12 horas al día.
Con el crédito solicitado  comprara una máquina para limpiar las piscinas y construir dos desvestideros, para el público y así mejorar las condiciones eso permitirá  tener más asistencias de personal.

Julio su gran sueño es poder en un futuro poner un comedor, en un local donde existía en un tiempo pasado, quisiera también tomarlo rentado pues considera que tiene la capacidad de administración.
texts.en:
Julio, 23 years old, is a young man who studied up through the sixth grade of basic education. He is single and he lives alone with his mother and two sisters, so there are three people depending on him.

Julio now has a business maintaining a recreational center for children, specifically, some pools that he is renting. He needs to invest because he needs to make them look nice. 

Before this work, he worked in agriculture, planting basic grains, which his father taught him and which he did for only four hours a day. Today he works 12 hours a day.

With the requested loan he will buy a machine to clean the pools and build two changing rooms for the patrons. This will improve the conditions which will allow the pools to be used by more people.

Julio's great dream is to be able to add a cafeteria, in a building where there used to be one in the past. He would also like to rent it, as he considers himself capable to administrate.

loans.use: to buy a pool-cleaning machine and build two changing rooms

loans.name: Dúo Eva De Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
Duo Eva de Vista Hermosa
La señora Eva Kelita quien tiene una tortillería desde hace varios años. Al lado de su esposo y sus hijos está muy agradecida con Dios por las oportunidades que recibe para poder superarse cada y sacar adelante a sus hijos dándoles lo que ella nunca recibió en su niñez.  Necesita varios quintales de maíz que comprar, pero el dinero que tiene no le alcanza,  le están ofreciendo una buena cantidad a un buen precio si compra varios y quiere aprovechar la oferta. Tiene varios clientes que la visitan todos los días ya que el negocio esta a orillas de la carretera principal de su casa.  Su sueño es llegar a ser una gran administradora y tener varias tortillerías como también empleadas.
texts.en:
Eva Kelita has had a tortilla business for several years.  Along with her husband and children, she is very grateful to God for the opportunities she gets in order to be successful and to get her children ahead.  She is giving them what she never had in her childhood.

She needs to buy several ‘quintales’ [a quintal is a hundredweight] of corn.  But, she does not have enough money.  They are offering a good quantity at a good price if you buy several, and she wants to take advantage of the offer.

She has various customers who visit her every day because the business is on the edge of the main road to her house.  Her dream is to become a great administrator and to have various tortilla businesses and employees.

loans.use: to buy corn in order to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Pablo Leonel

texts.es:
Pablo de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado por el momento está acompañado, es papá de dos hijos solo uno estudia, la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y el cuidado de los hijos. 

Pablo se dedica a la prestación de servicio con un picak, transportando granos básicos de los miembros de la comunidad, oficio que aprendió con su papá desde antes cuando vivía con él, además también se dedica a la siembra de maíz de regadillo, donde cultiva es en la misma comunidad a un kilómetro de sus casa, el viaja en bicicleta el dedica unas cuatro horas diarias a trabajo de campo, cuando no tiene viajes con el vehículo.

El crédito será invertido en hacerle mejoras al vehículo, como comprar de llantas, cambio de aceite y comprar cuatro quintales de abono para 350 metros cuadrados de maíz, que está cultivando de regadillo y es así que estará satisfaciendo su necesidad.

Pablo sueña en un futuro  trabajar siempre, para darle una buena alimentación a su familia y luego brindarles educación a sus hijos. Para verlos en el futuro unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Pablo, 38 years old, went to school until sixth grade. He has two children; only one of them goes to school. His wife does domestic chores and takes care of the children. With a pickup truck, Pablo works offering transportation services of basic grains to members of the community. He learned how to do this job with his dad, when he lived with him. He also works growing corn by irrigation. The place where he grows it is located in the same community, one kilometer from his house, and he travels there by bicycle. He spends four hours a day working in the fields when he does not have trips with his vehicle. 
The loan will be invested in improving his vehicle, by buying tires, changing the oil, and buying four quintals (400 pounds) of fertilizer for 350 square meters of corn, that he is growing by irrigation, and so he will satisfy his needs.
Pablo dreams to always work to give good food to his family and later educate his children, so that they become professionals.

loans.use: To buy tires, a change of oil, and to buy four quintals (400 pounds) of fertilizer

loans.name: Banco Mujer Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es: Ana Yancy es una de las integrantes de Banco Mujer Nuevo Amanecer, tiene 36 años, vive en unión libre con el padre de sus 2 hijos, quienes estudian, el menor de ellos  en primaria y la adolescente en secundaria.  Tanto ella como su esposo trabajan en una pequeña parcela propia, y se dedican a la cría de animales, además la siembra de frutas y hortalizas, está actividad es una única fuentes de ingresos al hogar, por ello todos trabajan de una forma muy dedicada a cuidar de sus tierras. Doña Ana Yancy piensa invertir en la compra de terneros y todos los insumos necesarios para su desarrollo. Los créditos anteriores le han permitido mantener su producción y con eso cubrir todos los gastos familiares, así como los estudios de sus hijos. Su mayor deseo es mejorar la calidad de vida, reparando su casa que está en muy mal estado y seguir pagando los estudios de sus hijos, que en ocasiones se vuelve muy difícil, cuando el precio del ganado decae mucho. Junto a ella integran el grupo 4 socias más que van a invertir en actividades agropecuarias.
texts.en:
Ana Yancy is a member of Banco Mujer Nuevo Amanecer. She is 36 years old and lives with the father of her two children. Their youngest child is in primary school and the teenager attends secondary school. Both herself and her partner work in a small piece of land they own and make a living breeding animals and cultivating fruits and vegetables. This is their only income source, which is why they work so hard to take care of their land. 

Ana Yancy plans to buy calves as well as the necessary supplies for their maintenance. Her previous loans allowed her to keep production and to cover both household expenses and her children's tuition. Her biggest dream is to improve their quality of life repairing their house, which is in bad condition, and to keep paying for her children's tuition. This becomes difficult when livestock prices fall significantly. 

There are four more members in the group who also plan to invest in farming activities.

loans.use: to buy calves, food, vitamins, condensed food and other supplies.

loans.name: Ulises Antonio

texts.es:
Ulises de 26 años de edad, es soltero, solamente estudio hasta sexto grado,  tiene una pequeña panadería, vive solo ya que su mamá vive en otro lugar, su madre  tuvo que dejarlo para trabajar, actualmente ella depende económicamente de él. El trabajo lo realiza todos los días, el negocio de vender pan le resulta muy bueno hace más de ocho años que se dedica a esta actividad, el oficio lo aprendió con un amigo que le enseño,  hace más de diez años, su negocio está en el mismo lugar donde él vive, trabaja con sus amigos los cuales les ayudan con su negocio.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar materia prima, para remodelar el horno, ya que desde hace tiempos que desea hacerlo más grande y así tener más producto elaborando y horneando con más facilidad, este le ayudara al crecimiento del negocio.

Su sueño es tener una panadería bien establecida, seguir ayudándole a su mamá, mejorar su estado de vida y tener su propia casa para vivir tranquilo y no ande rodando como lo hace actualmente, sabe que lo lograra trabajando fuertemente y ahorrando poco a poco.
texts.en:
Ulises is a 26-year old single man who owns a small bakery. He only attended school until sixth grade and now lives alone because his mother lives in another city. She had to leave him for work but now depends financially on him. He works every day selling bread and has been in the business for 8 years. He learned from a friend over 10 yeas ago. His business is located in his house and he works with friends that give him a hand. 

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies to make improvements to the oven. He has been willing to make it bigger for some time, so that he can produce more quantity and bake more easily. This would help him to expand the business. 

His dream is to have a well established bakery, to keep helping his mother, to improve his quality of life and to have his own house to live peacefully without having to move often. He knows he will get there working hard and saving little by little.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make improvements to his oven.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food to breed the pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair the truck used in her business and to restock her inventory.

loans.name: Andy Abraham

texts.es:
Andy es cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.
El trabajo y la responsabilidad son una constante en mi vida. Soy Andy, padre soltero de una niña de 2 años. Construyo el presente de mi hija con mi trabajo. Con el crédito pagaré su guardería; lo mejor está por venir ese es mi lema, con esfuerzo y conciencia de lo que implica un crédito, me considero una persona trabajadora y responsable que hace frente a cualquier reto.
texts.en:
Andy is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is his story:

"Work and responsibilities are a constant part of my life. My name is Andy and I am a single father of a two-year-old daughter. The present life I have built with my daughter is a result of my work.

With this loan, I will pay for her daycare. 'The best is yet to come' is my motto.

Since a loan requires effort and conscientiousness, I would consider myself to be a hardworking and responsible person who is able to face any challenge."

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's daycare expenses.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Ella es Lina una joven emprendedora la cual le gusta salir adelante,  gracias a dios con el apoyo incondicional de la mama y de la oportunidad que se le está brindando ahora de cumplir el proyecto, el cual es ser enfermera ya que a ella le gusta prestar  atención a las demás personas, sentir que las puede ayudar incondicionalmente. Lina es responsable, respetuosa, honesta lo cual sabe conservar los valores éticos, es una bachiller académica que ha emprendido el camino Asia el campo laboral. 
Está creando el proyecto de vida el cual ha querido ser desde niña toda una enfermera profesional y así poder lograr el proyecto con éxito. Es una joven con buena presentación, le gusta trabajar en equipo, tiene una actitud muy positiva  para así mismo poder aprender cosas  nuevas día a día, tiene la habilidad para enfrentar situaciones de desafío y superación.   
Académicamente  fue una bachiller muy buena, ya que fue muy emprendedora colaboradora, los propósitos que se proponía, los lograba con mucha dedicación y responsabilidad es muy buena compañera, trabaja muy bien en equipo. Esta dispuesta a superar los obstáculos o reglas que se le pongan para así poder tener el proyecto tal y como siempre lo ha soñado, una joven profesional satisfecha de poder ayudar a las demás personas y tener  una buena estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
This is Lina, a young entrepreneur who wishes to get ahead in life. She likes to take care of people and feels she can help them unconditionally. Because of this she would like to become a nurse, and thanks to her mother’s unconditional support and the opportunity she has now been given, this is the time for her to become one. Lina is a responsible, respectful, and honest person with ethical values. She now has her high school degree and is on her way of becoming a part of the workforce. 

She is making her life project as she intended to since she was little girl: becoming a nurse, and by doing so, culminating her project with success. She is a young woman that enjoys team work and has an excellent presentation and a positive attitude with the objective of learning new things every day. She also has the ability to confront challenging situations.

Academically, she was a good student at high school. She was an entrepreneur and collaborative person, always achieving her own goals with hard work, dedication and responsibility. She was a good classmate and knew how to be a good team worker. She is willing to overcome every obstacle in life and achieve her life project as she always intended to: become a young professional with the opportunity of helping other people and have financial stability.

loans.use: to pay the tuition of one semester.

loans.name: Savorn

texts.en:
Savorn (in the photo) lives in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has four children: two sons and two daughters. Two of them attend school and the other two are still young. Her husband is a mason.

Savorn is a construction worker.  She wants to stop working as construction worker and launch a new business selling Lies. Hence, she decided to apply for a loan. She will also use the rest of the loan to repair the house where she lives because it is broken in some parts. 

About Lies: it is a Khmer word, it’s a kind of small freshwater clam.

loans.use: To launch a new business selling Lies (clams) and repair the house where she lives.

loans.name: Gerwin

texts.en: Gerwin is 27 years old and single. He lives in a rural community, together with his beloved parents. Due to a lack of job opportunities, he engages in the buying and reselling of fruits and vegetables in the market. He uses his motorcycle in selling those products. He aims to acquire more fruits and vegetables to sell, but he has limited capital. For this reason, he is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. He is hoping that his loan request will be granted in order for him to continue and improve the business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Andres Felipe

texts.es: El es  Andrés Felipe estudiante de La Institución Campo alto, entro a estudiar a Primer semestre, es un joven de 17 años, de Bogotá, que le encanta jugar Fútbol, el área de mecánica le llama mucho la atención, el automovilismo y todo lo que tenga que ver con los carros y la tecnología moderna es la pasión, él se encuentra desempleado en el momento a causa de la edad y ya que él es un recién graduado del bachiller, por ser menor de edad no ha logrado conseguir trabajo para poder pagar los estudios, motivo por el cual el padre es quien le va a financiar los estudios en la Institución de Campo alto, la madre es ama de casa, por lo tanto no puede colaborar con los gastos, el padre al ganar un poco más del salario mínimo puede apenas cubrir los gastos del hogar, por ello Andrés pide el apoyo económico del convenio KIVA, el de verdad necesita la ayuda ya que siempre es un ahorro en la casa y un apoyo económico tanto para el como para los padres, Andres anhela verse como profesional en 5 años en la carrera de Mecánica Automotriz, desea graduarse este año con el título de Técnico Laboral en Mecánica Automotriz en La Institución Campo alto, luego podrá Homologar para poder terminar la carrera Profesional en una Universidad, desea montar un taller de mecánica durante los estudios y ser un promotor de venta en todo tipo de carros, siendo reconocido por varias marcas de automóviles, luego de tener el taller avanzara a tener a mediano plazo el propio concesionario en la ciudad de Cali.
texts.en:
Andrés Felipe is a 17-year old student at La Institución Campo Alto. He is originally from Bogotá and just started his first semester. He loves playing football and feels very attracted by the field of mechanics, the automobile industry and everything that has to do with cars and modern technology. He is currently unemployed because of his age. He recently finished high-school and is still a minor, so he has not been able to find a job to cover his tuition expenses. This is why his father will cover tuition at La Institución Campo Alto. His mother is a housewife and cannot contribute any income, and his father's income is just slightly above the minimum wage and barely covers their household expenses. 

Andrés is requesting financial support from Kiva. This help would allow them to save for the house and would represent a financial support for him and his parents. Andrés expects to become a professional in 5 years once he graduates from his studies in Motor Mechanics. His goal is to graduate this year as an Industrial Technician in Motor Mechanics from La Institución Campo Alto. He would then be able to use this title to finish the professional degree at a university. He would like to start his own garage while he studies and to become a sales promoter of all types of cars, known by several car brands. Once his garage was working well, he would look at having his own authorized car dealer in the city of Cali.

loans.use: to pay a semester tuition.

loans.name: Soheng

texts.en:
Soheng is a farmer. She grows rice on her farmland in the village where she lives. Her husband is a taxi driver, and he assists his wife in rice farming when he is free.

Soheng lives in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City, and she has three children. One is a garment worker, another one works for a factory that produces bread, and another one attends school.

Soheng is applying for a loan to buy a new motorcycle for her husband. Because the old motorbike is breaking down and does not work well, it has upset his business.  

Photo: Soheng is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To replace her husband's old motorcycle.

loans.name: Obed Salomon

texts.es:
Obed es un hombre casado de 38 años de edad, padre de 1 hija de 6 años viven junto a su familia en el departamento de Suchitepéquez. El es un hombre trabajador que desea que su familia salga adelante y tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Actualmente presta el servicio de mototaxi en su comunidad, ya que es una forma que puede ayudar a sus clientes a trasportarse de un lugar a otro. Eligió esta actividad porque tiene la oportunidad de conocer otros lugares y porque obtiene ingresos y ganancias aceptables que le ayudan a cubrir los gastos de su familia.
El ha observado que tiene una fuerte demanda en cuanto al servicio de mototaxi, por lo que ha decidido solicitar un préstamo de Q 1,600.00 para la compra de repuestos para su mototaxi
Su mayor sueño es sacar adelante a su familia  a través del incremento de sus ingresos comprando otro mototaxi.
texts.en:
Obed is a married man of 38 years old, father of a 6-year-old girl, and together they live alongside their family in the department of Suchitepéquez. He is a hardworking man who wishes to provide for his family and give them a better quality of life. Currently, he has a mototaxi (motorcycle taxi) business in his community since it is a way to help his clients to move from one place to another. The reason why he chose this activity is that it allows him to get to know other places and by doing so, he obtains acceptable incomes that help him to pay for the family’s expenses. 

He has noticed a strong demand for his mototaxi service, and therefore he has decided to ask for a loan of Q1,600.00 to buy parts for his mototaxi. His biggest dream is to support his family by increasing his incomes through the purchase of another mototaxi.

loans.use: to buy parts for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Chinda

texts.en:
Chinda (pictured) lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three children - one son and two daughters. Two of her children are in school and another one is still young. 

Chinda sells fish in a market that is about four kilometers from her house. Her husband is a construction contractor. 

Chinda hopes to expand the volume of fish she buys and sells, and to also increase her income to better support her standard of living. Hence she decided to apply for a loan to help her increase her capital.

loans.use: to expand her business by buying more fish to resell.

loans.name: Sreytouch

texts.en:
Sreytouch (pictured) is 21 years old and lives in a Phnom Penh suburb. She has been married since 2013 and has no children.

Sreytouch is a garment worker alongside her husband. They commute to work by taking their own motorbike. But, the motorbike is old and uses more gasoline than a new one.

Hence Sreytouch decided to apply for a loan to add to her own money to buy a new motorbike.

loans.use: to add to her own money to buy a new motorbike for commuting to work

loans.name: Dy

texts.en:
Dy (in the photo), age 43, lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh City. She has three sons. One is a garment worker, another one is a driver, and the youngest attends school.  

Dy is a rice farmer and raises cow at home. She has one cow and one calf. Meanwhile, her husband grows small mango trees for sale and assists his wife in farming was well. 

Dy wants to buy one more cow to raise, but she does not have money, so she decided to apply for a loan.

loans.use: To purchase one more cow to raise.

loans.name: Madel

texts.en:
Madel previously accessed a 25,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts and cover maintenance costs of her computer shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy parts and cover maintenance costs of her computer shop. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Madel dreams that her business will last longer and hopes to give her children a good life and education. Every week, she meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of their work and to find strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for computer parts and maintenance needed in her business.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena previously accessed an 11,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, in their personal, household, and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add in her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expense. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rowena dreams that her business will continue to grow and hopes that her children will finish their education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Phally

texts.en:
